The main train station is accessible by public transport (30-45´). To the "Alte Fasanerie" of Lübars or the Botanical Volkspark Blankenfelde in 30 minutes by public transport.
Within a 10-minute walk, a REWE supermarket, as well as a bakery. Numerous shopping opportunities in Pankow, e.g. City Hall Center.

This is my actual apartment – which means it's equipped for someone to really live in it: unique furniture, fully stocked kitchen (I love to cook), lots of blankets and a warm and inviting atmosphere. It's a shared flat, but we're quite relaxed & welcoming :)

name: 65 m² Apartment w. Spreeview directly at Ostkreuz
description: Quiet 2-room apartment with Spree view on the Stralau peninsula in the middle of Berlin. In 5 minutes by foot at the Ostkreuz S-Bahn station, in 15 minutes at the Eastside Gallery and in 20 minutes at Alexanderplatz. Fully equipped flat with its own kitchen, bathroom, dining area, bedroom and large living room with a wonderful balcony with a view of the greenery and the Spree. Ideal for 2 people. Elevator available. Barrier-free. Fast and free Wi-Fi. There are no additional costs on site.

name: Cosy Flat next to waterside
description: Beautiful apartment with sun-flooded terrace (quiet there). The flat is located in a lively area with many restaurants, cafés, (flea)markets etc. It`s located on the banks of a river, which provides excellent opportunities to go for a walk or relaxe.

name: Traumhafte 2-Zimmer-Wohnung
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located accommodation in the middle of Berlin-Schöneberg.

name: Nice room available
description: One nice room available in a 3 room flat, located in Charlottenburg with very good transport connection: Metro station U2 (1 stop to the famous Ku'dam shopping street, S/U-Bahn Zoologischer Garten), Bus 101, X9 (to the airport), 245 and M45, Tube U7.

name: Licht-durchflutete, moderne 3-Zi Whg. mit
description:
Fantastic, light-flooded old building apartment with high ceilings (3.40m) and beautiful original stucco, in Berlin Mitte.
Right from the vineyard park, Rosenthaler Platz, Bernauer Straße, and walking distance to Hackische Markt and Mauerpark.

You can't live more centrally, yet absolute peace and relaxation in the courtyard on the south-facing balcony with so much sun. Pure relaxation. Balcony with foresight.
The apartment is fully equipped, so you can move in and stay directly.

name: Urban Oasis: Rooftop in Fhain
description:
Stay at our green oasis in the heart of the bustling city!

This stylish 50 sqm rooftop apartment in Friedrichshain offers a serene retreat with lush plants, a large kitchen and a spacious balcony.

With a vibrant vibe and endless bars and restaurants just steps away, you'll experience the perfect blend of urban energy and peaceful comfort.

name: Charming bright apartment with balcony
description:
Beautiful & cozy apartment on the top floor with high ceilings, nice floorboards and lightness. The apartment is located to the courtyard with a little fountain, a small balcony and is quietly located.
Very good connection and central location with nice cafés & restaurants in the neighborhood.

name: Spacious room in the center of Friedrichshain.
description: Our cozy room in a 2-room apartment is located in a historic Berlin building just two stations from Alexanderplatz. It provides enough space to be ideal for couples as well as for singles. All you need during a short trip or a longer stay is close at hand: supermarkets (including vegan&organic), 24/7 stores, restaurants, bars, and main hubs of public transport.

name: sunny 2room flat, big balcony, Neukölln
description: Sunny old building apartment (64 sqm), 2 rooms, south-facing balcony, plank floor, bathtub, kitchen-living room,Wi-Fi and views of 2 large parks. Very quiet but right around the corner are Neukölln's hip clubs and cafes, supermarkets and spätis. Guests are very welcome!

name: Modern, beautiful apartment in Mitte / Arkonaplatz
description:
Beautiful apartment in the best Berlin location in Mitte, just a few meters from Zionskirchplatz and Kastanienallee, all shops for daily life in the immediate vicinity.

Modern solutions throughout the building create a high standard and comfort (underfloor heating, smart lights). A balcony and a the high-quality interior and equipment make this the perfect apartment for your Berlin getaway.

FYI: The apartment is on the 4th floor of the building and the building has NO elevator.

name: Room in the heart of Kreuzberg
description:
You can rent a big (28 m squared) bedroom in our shared flat.
Myself and two flatmates (Georg and Loay) live here. We are nice friendly flatmates in our twenties.
It is a beautiful big bedroom with two windows overlooking the sunny streets of Kreuzberg Berlin.
You have access to our kitchen, as well as our two bathrooms (one with just a toilet, the other with a proper shower).
There is one queen or king sized bed (160x 200 m) bed in the room, so up to two guests could comfortably stay.

name: Big and cosy room in Neukölln
description: Our spacious, bright and comfy flat has everything you need for a pleasant stay: living room, fully equiped kitchen, bathroom with tub, etc. Your room is 27m2 with double bed, desk, couch, plenty of space and super cosy!

name: 1 Room in a sunny apartment in Friedrichshain
description: Our apartment (154qm) is a beautiful place in the heart of Friedrichshain which we love to share. Great location: close to bars, restaurants, parks and sights. Our kitchen is the most important part of the flat and awesome shared space with friendly Berliners (3 roommates) where you can also watch movies on the projector, listen to music, cook and hang out. The apartment is perfect for couples or people to explore.

name: Apartment in Berlin-Pankow
description:
Two-room apartment with terrace, private bathroom and kitchen. Bedroom with double bed and desk, living room with dining table and sofa corner, fast WiFi, washing machine.
Quiet area in the north of Berlin, good transport links, 15 minutes to Alexanderplatz. 20 minutes by tram to city center/Hackescher Markt.
Several parks and supermarkets in the immediate vicinity.
8 minutes walking to the Berlin Mauerweg, commemorative shortage of the former Berlin Wall.

name: Bright Cosy Room
description:
My accomodation is located in close proximity to the Tempelhofer Feld, other than that you can easily go to Kreuzberg / Mitte by Subway U6 within 10-15 minutes.

You'll love my flat / room 'cause of the nice calm athmosphere as a contrast to the fast pace of Berlin, the high sealings and the comfort of the room.

Perfect for couples or solo travelers.

(I changed the decoration in my room a little bit, nothing major, and it's still just as comfy.)

name: Room in shared appartement - great for art-lovers
description: Recently renovated flat in the heart of Berlin. The flat is located in Prenzlauer Berg, between Kollwitzkiez and Winsviertel, two very trendy parts of the city. The room we offer is part of a shared appartment with two rooms (+kitchen and very modern bathroom). The room is perfect for a short-trip to Berlin, it is furnished with nothing more than a beed, a desk, a commode and a chair, but with it's modern artwork it still makes you feel welcome and breathes the spirit of Berlin. You'll love it!

name: Central room in Berlin Wedding
description:
The room is furnished and faces towards the inner courtyard. Therefore the room is quiet.
Desk, wardrobe, bed etc. is contained.
You will be living together with my 3 flatmates and you should enjoy and/or have experience in a flatshare.
The community rooms are roomy and furnished as well. Two bathrooms and two balconies are included.
Public transport is close by. (circle line, U6, S1, M47)

name: Studio in the heart of Berlin
description: Studio in the best and still quite area with a bit of loft feeling in Berlin -Mitte (Spittelmarkt), 10 minutes walking distance to major points of interest (check point Charlie, Gendarmenmarkt, Friedrichstraße, Brandenburger Tor-  20 minutes)

name: Super ruhiges Zimmer mit Balkon - erlebe Berlin -
description: My 2-room apartment is located in the backyard of a nice quiet street and yet very central. Breakfast on the balcony, listening to a nice record or playing some guitar yourself. Anything possible with me. We share the apartment but it is likely that I will not be there during your stay. In the kitchen you can cook well and there is a lot to explore in the area. Restaurants, bars, clubs, cafes, nice shops, parks. The location is just fantastic.

name: Cozy Room In The Heart Of Kreuzberg, Top Location.
description:
This is a Private room, in a new fully renovated flat which located at the best neighborhood in Berlin, the heart of Kreuzberg. There is a U-bahn station in 1min walk, and plenty of Bars, Cafes and Restaurants.
The flat is in the back side of the building, so although it is on a main street,its very quiet.
You will share the flat with my great flatmate, he is super easy going person, and he also works as a tourist guide in the city, so you can ask him anything you want, and he will like to help.

name: kinderfreundliche Whg in Neukölln
description: Apartment has one living room and one bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. In the sleeping room there is a 160 cm wide bed. There is also a 90 cm wide guest mattress on the floor.

name: Peaceful 2-room-appartment in Schöneberg
description: I am renting out my friend's beautiful 2-room-appartment from 3rd until 10th of February. It is very quiet and peaceful with a living/bedroom with a big bed and a sleeping couch. The other room is a kids room with lots of toys, so kids are welcome! There's a balcony and a bathroom with bathtub, and a kitchen with everything you need. Towels and bed sheets will be provided and you can use all you need, of course taking good care of everything :)

name: Bright 3 room-flat in the middle of Kreuzberg
description: The flat is right in the middle of one of the nicest neighborhoods within Berlin.  There are a lot of bars, galleries and restaurants. It´s very green around here and there are some nice parks and the Landwehrkanal, a canal to chill out. You can reach the Kottbusser Tor (subway station) in less than 5 minutes. So the way to Mitte, Friedrichshain or Neukölln is really short.

name: 85qm Penthouse Altbau mit Balkon
description:
I rent my stylishly furnished light-flooded attic apartment. It is an 85sqm renovated old building with balcony. The apartment has very high ceilings and is very bright & open cut.

I usually live in the apartment myself, so the apartment is perfectly equipped, you will find everything you need to live and you are welcome to use everything.

name: Appartamento accogliente.
description:
Relax in this peaceful and centrally-located place.
Nearby you can find the former airport "Tempelhofer Feld" and three minutes away is the subway.
license:
First name and Last name: Roberta Valeria Trizio
Contact address: Weisestraße 31 , 12049, Berlino, Germania
Listing address: Weisestraße 31 , 12049, Berlino, Germania

name: Schloss Bellevue 2BR 70m2 Designer Apt w/ balcony
description:
The appartment is freshly renovated, at walking distance to the Brandenburg Gate and Reichstag, 3 mins from the subway (U-Bahn) and city trains (S-Bahn). The supermarket is 2 min away.

Comes with:

– Plenty of Pots/Pans/Platters
– Serving utensils
– Chef knives
– 1 oven, 1 grill, 1 dishwasher.
– Almost any condiment you need

We keep the fridge and pantry stocked with eggs, bread, olive oil, butter, salt, pepper, hot sauce, BBQ sauce, mustard, ketchup, mayo, spices, sparkling water and wine.

name: Holiday cottage Floramühle
description: Recreate with friends, family, or just people you like. There is space for up to 17 guests in our house. Peaceful in a backyard but still centrally located, in the middle of Florakiez. Known for its retail, cafes, restaurants, parks, parks, and green spaces. S. and U-Bahn are 5 min. Walking distance and in just 5-10 min. popular places can be reached, such as Prenzlauer Berg and Alexanderplatz. We are family friendly and looking forward to seeing you soon.

name: Berlin-Mitte: Cosy Apt. Rosenthaler Platz Center
description:
Excluding city tax!

The flat is very central, close to Rosenthaler Platz, located in Berlin-Mitte/Center. There is bunch of public transportation and shopping is within walking distance.

You will rent the entire place, except my bedroom which will be locked during your stay.
The sleeping couch in the living room is 144 x 250cm and pretty conformable.

I am renting it out when I am on holidays or business trips, so please respect my personal belongings.

name: Bright renovated 23qm room near Tempelhofer Feld
description:
Hi everybody,

I offer my room in Berlin Tempelhof in our beautiful renovated 115sqm flat from the beginning of the 20. century which I share with two flatmates.
It’s on the 3rd floor and facing the south, thus you can enjoy the sun all day long.
The flat is is located directly at S+U Tempelhof, you need one minute to get into the subway, you really don't need extra time to get there. From there you reach the city centre in 10 min.
To get to the Tempelhofer Feld you need 5 min.

name: Wonderful room in Kreuzberg
description: The room is comfortable, very bright, fully furnished (2x2bed). Perfect location, 5min walk from Mehringdamm U-bahn station, 248 bus to Alexanderplatz. The neigborhood is full of life, restaurants and markets, close to Viktoriapark and Tempelhof

name: Big , bright room with balcony & TV in Neukölln
description:
I’m offering a large, cozy, bright and furnished private room. You’ll be located in hip Neukölln and have a great starting position for your Berlin Adventure. The Apartement is located in a quiet place and you have a big balcony :)

The room is equipped with a sofa bed, dining table & a TV.

Please note that drugs, smoking and partying is forbidden in the apartment. Shoes must be taken of at the entrance.

10 Minutes to U7 Parchimer Alle &Britz-Süd U Bahn Stations and 171-M46 Bus stop nearby
license:
First name and Last name: Alisan barca
Contact address: Berlin, 12351, Berlin, Deutschland
Listing address: Berlin, 12351, Berlin, Deutschland

name: Comfortable central apartment
description: Stay with your family in the heart of Berlin, where the sights will be within walking distance. A spacious apartment with two full bedrooms, each equipped with large comfortable beds, will give you a comfortable stay after a busy day. In the living room there is a large bed, elegantly hidden behind the curtains, which creates an additional private space. For even more convenience, there is a folding sofa, which easily turns into an extra bed.

name: Zentral und dennoch ruhig am Boxi
description:
Welcome right in the heart of Friedrichshains
Quietly located in the back house, the room offers you a perfect starting point for tours of any kind. Culture and nature are not far away with all kinds of cafes, clubs, the Spree and the parks. And if you are still traveling far away, an ideal connection to the S-Bahn, tram and U-Bahn is guaranteed.

I myself also live in the apartment and we would share the kitchen and bathroom if I am there.

name: Bright design room at hip Boxi in Friedrichshain
description: Sleep, work, relax, eat! Enjoy a beautiful super centrally located space in trendy Friedrichshain - for couples or women till 01.01. after this women only :) as my roommate is a nice, calm woman.  Enjoy 2 Balconies and 200meters to Boxhagener Platz - food market on Saturday and the famous fleamarket on Sundays, a lot of amazing Cafes and Restaurants just 1 minute away :) Public transport in 50m walk „Samariter Str“ tram access U 5 with direct connection to the main train station in 20minutes

name: Bright and Spacious Studio Flat
description: A spacious and bright 1 bedroom studio with a nice view to the inner garden. The bedroom has a comfortable double bed and a big table for working.  Big kitchen, where you can cook food and a bathroom with a shower stall and a washing machine.

name: Comfortable room in Moabit
description: The appartment is located in a quiet neighbourhood in north-west Berlin, near a park, supermarkets, cafés etc. I am also living in the appartment, but I am studying and working quite a lot. So we would share the kitchen and the bathroom. In the appartment there is everything you need and you can use all of it. I am a pretty quite person, but I can help you if you need anything, give you hints, where to go or show you nice places. The room is pretty big and directed to the inner courtyard.

name: Newly refurbished Loft Apartment
description: Welcome to the cool part of town! Our recently renovated apartment is very spacious and fully furnished. It comes with its natural "Altbau" charme, high ceilings (3.5m!), big windows, wooden floors and underfloor heating in the huge kitchen and bathroom. The kitchen is fully equipped and a great place to dine and socialise. The flat is a 1 min walk to S-Bahn Sonnenallee, which quickly connects you to all central stations. The immediate neighbourhood has lots of restaurants, cafes and bars.

name: 120sqm boho penthouse roof terrace Prenzlauer Berg
description:
You arrive with a delegate elevator to the rooftop penthouse which is
characterized by a luxurious interior that includes a 75 inch Smart TV, huge coworking space, fireplace, library, Harman Kardon soundsystem, beautiful design & art pieces and super fast Wifi.
The spacious, open living room, kitchen and bedroom are framed with glass fronts with respective terraces.

A private roof garden is located on the penthouse.
You can let your gaze wander over the roofs of Berlin and the television tower.
license:
First name and Last name: Lukas Auer
Contact address: Bergmannstraße , 10961, Berlin, Deutschland
Listing address: Bergmannstraße, 10961, Berlin, Berlin

name: BRIGHT AND SPACIOUS APARTMENT IN SCHÖNEBERG
description:
Cosy, large apartment in Schöneberg, right next to the beautiful and trendy „Akazienkiez“ and only a short ride away to the city centre, Kreuzberg, Neukölln or Ku‘Damm.

The apartment is a typical „Berliner Altbau“ with high ceilings and oak parquet. The apartment is very bright and has a great size with 154 m2 and 2 bedrooms, 1 living room & 1 dining room. The apartment is very well equipped which makes it ideally for couples, families or a group of friends.

name: Kleine 25qm Wohnung am Bayrischen Platz
description: I like to rent my small apartment by the day. You will find everything you need. Bathroom Kitchen, bedroom with a bunk bed and a balcony to lie in the sun. You can sleep in the loft bed. Two people. The apartment is very close to the U7. It is perfect for travelers who like to be on the road during the day and need a place to relax in the evening.

name: Spacious, lovely Prenzlauer Berg Live/Work space
description:
Experience creative Berlin life in this popular East Berlin neighbourhood. Walking distance to some of the cities best restaurants, cosy bars, hip cafés, markets, boutiques and many supermarkets.
Well appointed, fully furnished live and work space.
Perfect for solo travellers, couples and small families.
Available between Dec 12 2017 - late Feb 2018.

name: Schöne 2,5-Zimmer Altbauwohnung in TOP-Lage
description: Enjoy the full life in the middle of Berlin and still reside quietly and exclusively in this stylishly furnished, bright and optimally cut old building apartment, located in one of the most beautiful streets in Berlin, the famous Oderberger Straße. A few minutes walk to the Mauerpark, with an almost infinite selection of good restaurants and beautiful cafes in the neighborhood, many other historic destinations in Berlin are not far from this special place in the middle of Prenzlauer Berg.

name: Wohnen auf Zeit- Bergmannkiez
description: You can't live more centrally in Berlin. The property is within walking distance of Potsdamer Platz, Unter den Linden and Bergmannstraße - the Ku'damm of Kreuzberg. In a few minutes you can reach the main underground stations that run throughout the city. Rents for a long-term stay up to 6 weeks max.

name: Sunny flat in a tree
description: Enjoy the simple life in this quiet and centrally located accommodation. Very spacious room, bright with a view of the greenery. Nice and modern bathroom, practical and well equipped kitchen, huge balcony with squirrel visit. Cosy and warm with floor heating. When you go out, you are directly on Mariannenplatz, a green area with a lively art center. The Markthalle is next door. Very well connected with many parks around. All shopping facilities within walking distance.

name: 3 Bedroom Home Cinema Apartment
description: A home from home or a place to get things done? With our 3 bedroom Apartment with Home Cinema you’ll have all the room you need. A private cinema to cuddle up with your loved ones and catch a film? Space for that brainstorming meeting or to entertain clients? A stylish, relaxed space that can be adapted for whatever suits you best.

name: 22m2 Big sunny room with balcony in Berlin wedding
description:
Big room in Berlin wedding, ideal for young people. In the area are many bars, clubs and also a lake, where you can swim in the hot days !
The metro U9 ist just 2 minutes walking from the apartment so you can reach the zoo in less than 15 minutes. Also the lines U8 (to Kreuzberg) and U6 are quite near.

name: beautiful room with balcony in Kreuzberg
Gemütliches 22qm Zimmer in Schöneberg mit Balkon
description: My place is close to the S Friedenau. You can shop well here and everything necessary is within walking distance! The apartment has very nice high ceilings, nice people, a good location, and lots of coziness. My accommodation is nice for couples, solo adventurers and furry friends (pets) and also ideal for young people.

name: Townhouse mit sonniger Terrasse in Berlin-Mitte
description:
We rent our residential house centrally located in Berlin-Mitte during our holidays.
The house is spread over 3 floors:
3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living rooms and a kitchen with terrace on the top floor with great views and lots of sun.

It is located directly at the park "Memorial Berlin Wall" (U-Bahn Bernauer Straße). From the central train station it's about 10 minutes by tram M10.

The terraces of our friendly neighbors adjoin the terrace.

name: Stylish room in center of hip Berlin Kreuzberg
description:
This listing is only for long-term rentals with a notice period of 3 months. Ein unbefristeter Wohnraummietvertrag wird abgeschlossen.

LOCATION:
The room is located in a very beautiful building in the middle of the hip Berlin district Kreuzberg close to Berlin Mitte. The underground station Kottbusser Tor can be reached by foot within few minutes. It is the hotspot for charming cafes, bars and restaurants that serve specialities from all over the world.

name: +Beautiful Duplex Penthouse in Berlin City Center+
description:
This luxury duplex penthouse in the Berlin city center has everything you need and even more. The 150 sqm two-bedroom apartment is located in the best area possible. Tasty restaurants, luxury design & clothes shops and the most successful galleries can be found here.

Either you wish to stay inside and hang on one of the private two roof tops or grab a bite and stroll around. There is barely anything like it.

name: Vegan, no plastic, no Ikea! Zeitgeist living!
description:
Straight from a lifestyle mag! That’s a common remark people will drop when they see this apartment for the very first time.
 
Industrial style meets sustainability. We used organic and vegan materials throughout the entire apartment. Zero Ikea. This is contemporary living at its very best.
 
As the flat is facing a treed backyard it has such a relaxing vibe and is so quiet you can hardly believe you are in the middle of the city of Berlin.

name: Großes Zimmer in wundervoller WG
description:
I am on vacation for a good two weeks and my room in a wonderful shared apartment is available!
You would live with three nice people in a 136 sqm apartment, have a large bathroom and an even larger kitchen (with a stove, microwave, dishwasher, etc.) and a approx. 27 sqm room just for you. Here you will find a desk, cabinets, plenty of space and private balcony!
The connection to the city is great, otherwise it is quiet and relaxed with us:)

name: Mitten drin und ruhig in Friedrichshain
description: My cozy private room offers you the perfect blend of rest and entertainment. Surrounded by lively Friedrichshain, concerts, bars and restaurants are very close. Public transit is available 24/7 to explore the city. Your room offers an oasis of tranquility where you can relax and unwind. Whether you want to take a park walk or immerse yourself in Berlin's nightlife, here you will find everything.

name: Lovely & warm place in Neukölln.
description:
Enjoy the spacious 73 sqm two-room old building centrally located in Neukölln – very comfortable and clearly furnished.
In the middle of the lively Körner-Kiez, you live in a quiet but ideally located apartment. Train connection is great with the Ringbahn and the U8 (25 minutes to Alex), Tempelhoferfeld and Körner Park offer space to chill and play sports.
The Körner-Kiez and surroundings also offer good shopping/ and nightlife options plus two weekly markets.

A place to feel good.

name: Renovated Altbau in Kreuzkölln
description: Beautiful and light flat near the canal in the hip neighborhood of Neukölln, 2 blocks away from Kreuzberg. The flat was re-furbished in the summer 2015 by an architect, and is fully equipped. 2 double BR, 1 open kitchen/living room, 1 reading room

name: Appart calme et lumineux proche quartier branché
description: My place is between Kreuzberg and Neukölln. It is close to Wrangelkiez, Friedrischain, Maybachufer, Landwehrkanal. You'll love my place because of the calm and brightness. The 1 + sdB room is perfect for couples, solo travelers and the child room is suitable for 1 person or even 2 young children. Please note that theapartment is on the 5th floor without access.

name: Spacious and light apartment
description: Welcome to our spacious and carefully designed apartment right at the border of Kreuzberg and Neukölln! This is a comfortable place with all necessary amenities for your Berlin getaway. Our favorite part of the apartment is the living room, which is very light due to the large and south-facing windows, with access to a lovely balcony and integrated kitchen. The apartment is situated in a residential neighborhood, yet in walking distance of the hustle and bustle of both Kreuzberg and Neukölln.

name: Central design apartment direct at the River Spree
description:
Live directly on the river Spree in an award-winning wave apartment designed by GRAFT Architects in 2019. The apartment has 1 ½ room with designer furniture, work place and Smart Home technology. Enjoy your Sundowner on the Rooftop on the community area

TRANSPORT
Public transport are only a few minutes away with the stops Warschauer Straße, Treptower Park and Ostkreuz

Restaurants/Bars
The banks of the Spree are close to Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain with culinary restaurants and trendy bars

name: The heart of Kreuzberg, right next to Viktoriapark
description: It’s in the heart of the famous neighborhood Kreuzberg near the lovely Viktoriapark. It’s 8 minutes walking from the U6/U7 U-Bahn station Mehringdamm.

name: Lovely huge flat in Berlin
description: We are renting out lovely huge flat in Berlin Schöneberg. Living- and bedromm are broad rooms and connected with double door. You find a little balcony at the bedroom. In the kitchen is everything you need for cooking including dish washer. A shower and bathtub exists in the new renovated bathroom. Also there you find a washing machine, which you can use.

name: simple and practical room
description: Hey people, I am renting out the room of me and my boyfriend. It is right by the U-bahn station Samariterstraße, it is on the 4.th floor in a flaat with a balcony. There are 4 possibly 5 other people living in the apartment in separate rooms. If you are interested in experiencing the nightlife of Berlin, this apartment lies to foot 10 minutes away from Revalerstraße and Warschauerstraße (where you find quite some Berlin clubs). And from the U-bahn station under you can easily go into centrum.

name: Cosy room in nice Neighborhood
description:
The apartement is located in the lovley "Wrangelkiez". You will find plenty of good restaurants, bars and coffee shops around the corner.
You will share the apartement with my nice flatmades, but you will have enough private space in your room.

name: SMARTments - Zuhause auf Zeit im Prenzlauer Berg
description:
You are seeking a home away from home for a few weeks or months?

SMARTments business is a professionally managed serviced apartment house.

Whether you are on a business trip, travelling or just need comfortable accommodation: SMARTments business offers you an upscale and harmonious environment - perfectly suited for longer stays.

name: For women: Room in Rooftop Penthouse
description: A spacious Scandinavian styled gem in the heart of bustling Berlin-Mitte. The highlight of the apartment is its rooftop, humorously called the "heliport," where you can unwind, exercise, or dine. The apartment comprises a bedroom, living room, fully equipped kitchen, and bathroom.

name: Bright aprt in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
(This is where I live and rent out when I am away.)

Situated in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, this 40+ sqm studio is light lit, quite, clean, comfortable.

Fully functional with kitchen, bathtub, washing machine, TV, double sofa bed with comfortable topper, balcony.

No roommates.

Well connected by public transportation to Alexander Platz or Museuminsel

If interested, please write me a few words about number of people staying, purpose of staying, and estimated arrival time.
Thank you.

name: Urige Altbauwohnung mitten in Berlin
description: Cool room including a private bathroom and kitchen close to the city center. (Alexanderplatz is just 10 minutes away.) The apartment is still really calming and quite. The area is super nice with lots of cafés, restaurants, small shops, etc.  Just 5 walking minutes away is a huge park (called Volkspark Friedrichshain). Since we rent the room when we‘re out of city it’s really likely you‘ll have the entire apartment for yourself. We are still always there to help and support you if needed.

name: Sunny 2 room apparment, w/ rooftop balcony
description:
Dear Travelers,

i'm living alone in a super nice and sunny 2 room rooftop apartment with balcony and always like to have guest hanging out. Big sunny living area with balcony, build in kitchen with ceran stove for cooking sessions, spacy bathroom with shower and 2 sinks. 10 Minutes walking to U8 which will bring you to Alexanderplatz or Mitte district in 10-15min.

I sublet a guest room or the whole apparment when i'm not here.

name: Meine Wohnung, mein Kiez - kinderfreundlich!
description:
Hello! We (freshly baked parents) have already been on the road through Airbnb ourselves, but are now renting for the first time. We hope you do not shy away from the risk of the first visit, as we offer you a great old apartment in the middle of beautiful Friedrichshain. Child-friendly, of course.

The apartment includes a large living room in addition to hallway, kitchen and bathroom (incl. Sofa bed) and one spacious bedroom (incl. Double bed and cribs).

name: Simon-Dach Kiez, Fhain
description: Beautiful and quiet 2 room apartment in Simon-Dach Kiez with all amenities. Pubs, restaurants, venues right around the corner and yet in a relaxed location.

name: 2 schöne, große,helle Zimmer
description:
Since we travel a lot, we offer 2 very nice, large guest rooms.
There is everything you need-as complete amenities, and a lot more beautiful:balcony and a great fireplace! Price is per room (2 rooms with two beds).

name: Lovely trendy family apartment
description: This great apartment is located very central in Pankow/Prenzlauer Berg. Perfect for couples or families with children. I am delighted to be an Airbnb host. If you have any questions pls email me and I will happily get back to you as soon as possible.

name: Cosy Room in Neukölln * Weserkiez
description: We are 3 people, living in the famous Weserkiez. Feel welcome and use our stay for a lovely time in Berlin.

name: Designer flat with industrial look, loft character
description: This former workers' flat was designed by the architects "Scarcitekten" as an industrial-style visitor flat. Central, quiet, stylish, cosy - located right next to the Neukölln town hall, 2 minutes from the subway, between Reuter, Schillerkiez and Körnerkiez and directly on the site of the former Kindl brewery in the Rollbergviertel, where the entire area has been being converted for social, creative and ecological uses for several years . An attractive place to work and meet has been created.

name: Renovierte Altbauwohnung am Volkspark Fhain
description:
Modernized, bright 60 sqm old building apartment with:

- Kitchen-living room (table, chairs, dishwasher, microwave, stove, oven, refrigerator, sink, etc.)
- Bathroom (bathtub and washing machine)
- Cool-cut bedroom with large double bed
- Very spacious living room with desk, large leather couch, carpet with seating, pallet bed etc.

Sleeping places are two in the bedroom (double bed) and up to three in the living room (pallet bed, couch, air mattress).

name: Light & cozy living in Neukoelln
description:
The flat is located in NEUKÖLLN, one of the most popular areas in Berlin!
Why? Because it's ideal for so many life styles. For travellers, it's attractive too, because it suits both, the relaxed stay and the wild stay. In the following, I will give you some advice to parks, coffee places, cinemas, clubs and bars, too. But also some hints on where you got your basics from. Whenever you got questions, my lovely flat mates will be staying with you. Or you can just contact me whenever you want to!

name: Zimmer im südlichen Berlin
description:
1 guest room in an apartment on the 1st floor.
Kitchen, bathroom/toilet
room:
1 sofa bed (1.60mx2.00m), armchair, 1 coffee table
Coffee maker, bed linen, hand and bath towels

S2 Marienfelde, U6 Alt-Mariendorf, several bus stops.
Free parking around the house A very quiet place in the hectic urban jungle and just cozy accommodation also for 2 people.

Non smoking, no pets.
license:
First name and Last name: Alice Grimm
Contact address: Beyrodtstr. 44A, 12277, Berlin, Deutschland
Listing address: Beyrodtstr. 44A, 12277, Berlin, Deutschland

name: Bright,warm room directly at Görlitzerpark
description:
My room is located in the Wrangel-kiez, direktly at Görlitzerpark. The room catches alot of light all day long so it has a very warm and welcoming atmosphere and also a very enjoyable view on to the Park. The surrounding area is filled with little Cafes, Bars, Resturants. From here it is also easy to reach many of the Infamous clubs Berlin has to offer.


Trainstation is Schlesisches Tor (U1 + U3)

name: Beautiful and charming Flat with balcony
description:
The tastefully furnished apartment in a Gründerzeit multi-family house is situated in the green and quiet Karlshorst. Tram, S-Bahn station and regional train station are a few minutes' walk away. The apartment is particularly suitable for adventurers and business people who want to experience or work in Berlin.
All shops of daily life are located in nearby Treskowallee.

name: The Heart of Berlin
description:
I am offering an elegant and quiet Room located in Berlins P-berg/f-hain. The apartment features a lovely bathroom, a new and fully equipped kitchen, a very big sunny living room and a balcony.
The apartment is very well served by public transport.

name: 160sqm loft overlooking Berlin
description: Great flat with five rooms, a huge living room, two fully equipped bathrooms and two balconies.

name: Große Altbau-Wohnung im Prenzlauer Berg (140qm²)
description: Our spacious old building apartment in Käthe-Niederkirchnerstraße, in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg, is available to a maximum of 3-4 people and is available to have a minimum stay of 4 days or more. Our apartment is located in the Bötzowkiez, one of the most beautiful districts of Berlin. Babies are desired, parties and smoking are not permitted. If you have any questions about availability, we look forward to a short email from you

name: Beautiful 100m2 Art Nouveau Appartment
description:
While we travel ourselves, we offer the use of the front part (100 m2+) of our spacious, bright and beautiful appartment in a nice and diverse upcoming neighbourhood of Moabit/Tiergarten in Berlin.

The apartment is located near the government district and the Tiergarten, so you can easily go sightseeing by bike.

name: Große Wohnung mit Garten
description: Very nice apartment in city villa with lots of space and garden for rent. The apartment is located in a two-family home and has 2 floors and 5 rooms. On the upper floor, a large kitchen-living room leads to the covered terrace and garden.  On the upper floor there is also a spacious living room, a study and the bathroom. On the lower floor are the bedroom and children's room as well as a separate toilet.

name: Cosy Flat in Neukölln
description: My cosy flat is located in the south of Neukölln, close to S-bahn and U-bahn station. By feet one can reach a lot of nice restaurants and bars in the area, also tempelhofer feld is not far. The area is not yet very touristic, so one can experience nice places nearby where only the locals go to. However, all famous tourist attractions can be reached by train within 20-30 min.

name: Sunny Rooftop Apartment
description:
We are renting out our bright and cozy two-room apartment in beautiful Friedrichshain.
It's a top-floor apartment, there is an elevator and two balconies (south and north).
The kitchen is fully equipped, including a dishwasher, the bathroom has a tub and a washing machine is also available.
The bedroom has a wardrobe, a large double bed, and a workspace.

The building is very well maintained and there is a bicycle parking space in the yard.

name: Room in quiet and clean flat above Tiergarten
description:
1 private bedroom (comfortable thicker matress on the floor of larger size) for one person or a couple who do not mind sharing.
It is also possible to sleep on a fairly comfortable couch in the living room if you are more people.
The room is in a beautiful big flat in Moabit, just above Tiergarten. Clean and as newly renovated. Queer friendly and open minded.
You will share the flat with one person.
Connections are good, close to u-bahn and ringbahn.

name: Kreuzberg At Its Best
description: Experience stylish living in trendy Kreuzberg. Renovated apartment with high ceilings, flooded with light, on the 3rd floor of a pre-war building. Enjoy beautiful wooden floors and chic Bisazza tiles in the bathroom. Perfectly located near cafes, boutiques, and vibrant street art. Fully equipped kitchen, cozy living area, and tranquil bedroom. Easy access to public transportation for exploring Berlin's landmarks. Book now for a memorable stay in vibrant Kreuzberg! Minimum stay 3 months.

name: Schöne Altbauwohnung am Hohenzollernplatz
description:
GUESTS ARE USUALLY ALONE IN THE APARTMENT.
GUESTS ARE USUALLY ALONE IN THE FLAT.

A beautiful old building apartment with 4m high ceilings, large windows and love of detail. Due to the location to the back courtyard very nicely quiet with a friendly neighborhood. The kitchen-living room is fully equipped with a stove, oven, refrigerator, water cooker and toaster. In the bathroom there is a monsoon shower, washing machine, dryer and hair dryer. Towels and soap are also available.

name: Quiet Room in Green Area
description: Enjoy your stylish experience in my centrally located home. My apartment is located between  great parks(Körnerpark and Tempelhofer Feld). In front of the house there is free parking should not be found, then there are still many side roads. The accommodation is super easy to reach, as the U8, U7, S42 is right outside the front door. Perfect for your city trip to Berlin.

name: Sonnige DG-Wohnung mit Terrasse
description: In the old building and yet modern apartment with many advantages. Modern, sunny, quiet and family-friendly DG apartment with 3 rooms and sleeping facilities up to 6 persons. Although the apartment is very centrally located, it is very quiet in the side street. Sunny balcony and an additional roof terrace as well as two bathrooms. This apartment is suited for families, business people and as well as for travelers. It is only available for the short time.

name: Schöne Altbauwohnung in grüner Lage
description:
Our apartment is on the attic of a modernized old building in green and family-friendly Karlshorst. You can get to the big city drive in about 15 minutes by tram or S-Bahn. In the garden, barbecue and fire bowl as well as children's play equipment are available.
The apartment has 3 rooms: one bedroom (160x200 bed), a children's room with bunk bed, a living room with sofa bed and kitchen and bathroom.

Non-use registration number: 11/Z/RA/001840-19

name: Huge Room in Shared Flat: Large Bed, Sofa, Terrace
license:
First name and Last name: Martin Kreienbaum
Contact address: Krausnickstraße 5, 10115, Berlin, Berlin
Listing address: Krausnickstr. 5, 10115, Berlin, Berlin

name: In the Heart of Neukölln, next to Griesmühle
description: Our home is located in Neukölln, 5 minutes walk away from the sbahn station Sonnenallee. The „ring/Ringbahn“ runs onetime around the center of Berlin, so you are good connected. The supermarket on the otherside of the street and Spätis are close bye. The Späti called Ak44 is 24/7 opend the other ones almost. You got nice bars around the corner within walking distance, especially in the Richardkiez. The well known club Griesmühle you can also walk to within 5 min.

name: Komfortables Apartment nahe Tegeler See
description:
Freshly renovated, this beautiful apartment is waiting to comfortably accommodate you. On the second floor of the building, a lot of sun falls into the apartment, as can be seen in the pictures.
The apartment is fully equipped, so you won't lack anything. Lake Tegel is within walking distance and a wonderful place to rest and relax.
This apartment makes you feel right at home and can also start exploring Berlin via public transport.

name: Lovely and spacious guest room in Kreuzberg
description: Welcome to Berlin! I've decided to rent out my lovely, spacious and functional guest room to visitors from all over the world. The room is ideal for you if you're planning to stay anything from 5 days to 3 months and I can help you get set up in Berlin easily. Or I can leave you alone :) The flat is in a very popular area between Görlitzer Park and Landwehrkanal, clean, and will hopefully provide you with the perfect Berlin experience!

name: Cozy Apartment by Maybach Ufer (Kreuzkölln)
description: We welcome you into our cozy homemade with love. It's small but equipped with everything you need for your Berlin adventure. The apartment has a separate living room, kitchen, bathroom, and bedroom. With the windows facing the very green inner courtyard you'll be able to relax while still being right in the hustle and bustle of the best neighborhood of Berlin.

name: private room, cosy & super central
description:
This is a single room (22m²) in cute nice apartment (65m²) in the hearth of Berlin.
It is part of the charming Charlottenburg area of Berlin, with lots of places for entertainment, culture and night life & relaxing.

name: Zimmer in Familienhaus mit Garten und Kater
description:
small cozy house with plank floor and garden, a cat and two children (8 and 13 years old).

The location is extremely quiet, but with the public transport you are still super connected and get quickly to the center or where you want to go.

Just around the corner, the Plänterwald starts, if you like jogging or need a little rest after all the city impressions, you will enjoy it there.

The nearest shopping area is 2 minutes away.

name: Bright flat in great location, with CATS!
description:
My flat is in a great location in Berlin Kreuzberg, close to many bars and restaurants and 3 subway stations to get around the city.

DISCLAIMER: this is a listing for a LONG TERM STAY. If you like to stay shorter, please contact me here! This is a listig for CAT LOVERS. I have to travel for work quite often and I’m looking for travelers who’ll enjoy living with my cats.

The flat is very comfy and bright.
Perfect for couples or a single person.

name: Schöne Familienwohnung im Prenzlauer Berg
description:
We offer you our beautiful approx. 130 sqm apartment here. It is located directly on the historic Mauerweg in the family-friendly trendy district of Prenzlauer Berg.
The apartment can accommodate a family with up to 6 sleeping options (3 double beds).
There are 2 bathrooms, washing machine, dishwasher, 3 balconies, dryer.
There are numerous shopping opportunities (REWE, LIDL, Veganz, Spätis)
Nightlife options are also in the immediate vicinity.
Please note: no party apartment, rest from 10 pm!

name: Big room in middle of beautiful Tempelhof
description:
Hello dear travelers!

In our wonderful shared apartment, a room is occasionally available.
In the room is a double bed and a fold-out sofa. The apartment is located directly on the U6 and not far from the Ringbahn. There are countless shopping opportunities. I am also on site with tips and can also come and pick you up (with the public transport). You can use all rooms, the kitchen invites you warmly! My room is very lovingly designed. Just ask if the room is available:)

name: Modern, fully equipped flat with great balcony
description: Modern, fully equipped flat in the heart of Friedrichshain. 3 minutes walking to Boxhagener Platz. Great east-facing balcony to view stunning sunsets.

name: Zimmer mit schönem Sonnenuntergang in Berlin.
description: Hi, beautiful room with fantastic sunset in Prenzlauer Berg, restaurants,cafes, combining shopping with a leisurely walk through the neighborhood or by S-Bahn and tram right nearby to keep the city under control day and night.

name: gemütliches Zimmer mit Balkon
description: Bright room in a shared apartment with a balcony, 5 minutes away are two beautiful parks,as well as shopping facilities are within walking  distance.

name: Berlin Central/Mitte, 110 m², hell, grün
description:
My apartment is very green with a sunny balcony in Mitte, close to the wall memorial, Rosenthaler Platz, Kastanienallee, lively Torstraße, the historic barn district. Tram, S-Bahn and U-Bahn are close. Central Station by tram only 10 minutes away. It is good for couples, families (with kids) and quiet groups.

Registration number
01/Z/RA/017071-24

name: Spacious and bright 3-room flat in Friedrichshain
description:
Our lovely 100 sqm apartment is in a quiet street in Friedrichshain, close to the Berghain, U-Bahn (subway) Warschauerstraße, and Boxhagenerplatz. There are plenty of coffee shops, restaurants and bars in the area and Mitte is only a few U-Bahn stations away.
Our apartment has a lot of "Altbau" charme, with high ceilings and view to a park. It is facing south so there is sun almost all day long.
It is perfect for friends, couples and families.
The house has an elevator.

name: Top Location - Center of Berlin - Central Station
description:
# very modern new Studio for 2
# next to Berlin Central Station
# Center of Berlin
# high speed WiFi
# fitness studio
# professional bedding and towels included
# fully equipped kitchen
# top location

name: small cute apartment with 2 balconies in Mitte
description: The small, lovely and sunny Apartment is perfectly located between Mitte and Xberg. Coolest way for  exploring and enjoying the city. It`s quiet, subway stations (U2 / U8) are in walking distance and you can also reach some attractions (Gendarmenmarkt, Nikolaiviertel, Checkpoint Charlie, Friedrichstraße and Berliner Dom ...). Around the corner you can find a bakery, supermarkets, cafes and restaurants..
license:
First name and Last name: Leonie Bergami
Contact address: Neue Grünstraße 9, 10179, Berlin, Germany
Listing address: Neue Grünstraße 9, 10179, Berlin, Germany

name: Big cosy room in Neukölln, Berlin
description: The room is perfect for two persons. Located in a nice and lively neighborhood. Close to loads of restaurants, bars, supermarkets and 3 supernice students to live with. The bus is just in front of the building and 300 m. to U-Bahn Rathaus Neukölln.

name: Great old house right in the heart of Neukölln
description:
Our spacious beautiful 3.5 room appartment is on a quiet historical street in the middle of Neukölln.
The flat is fully equipped, in the kitchen you'll find everything to cook your own meals and prepare good coffee.

The appartment is above a great bar where you can enjoy fine german beer and other nice drinks (even in the reach of your babyphone!). Sometimes you hear some sound from the bar at night.

The next tube (U7) is 5min, the next train (S-Bahn) 10min by foot.

name: Your stylish home in Neukölln
description:
Experience Berlin's vibrant heart in a charming home, nestled in one of the city's most colourful neighbourhoods. My flat offers a cosy atmosphere inviting you to unwind. The kitchen is a delight, complete with all amenities.The small balcony is a perfect spot for your morning coffee, soaking in the lively atmosphere. Located just a few min walk from the subway, (coffee) bars and restaurants.

It's the perfect location to explore the city, work from home, or simply soak up the local atmosphere.

name: Charming Apartment in Friedrichshain (2-4 Persons)
description: We rent our apartment for a few days. It consists of a bedroom (2 Persons), a living room  (sofa bed for 2 Persons) , bathroom and kitchen. The apartment is equipped with everything you need. There is also a small south-facing balcony. It is a private apartment, thatswhy some private items will be located in the apartment.

name: Shared flat in central Berlin / student apartment
description:
The flat is right next to main train circle in Berlin, Neukölln, Kreuzberg, central Berlin, the coolest place in the world ;). The next sipermarkets are 30 secs away & you can use my bike to go to treptower park in less than 10 min.
My (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) are 2 girls & they don't want to live with a guy (sorry guys...) so if you're female feel free to write me. :) I will be gone for 3 weeks with only a backpack so I have a wardrobe full of clothes that you can wear if you like.

name: Friendly room + own balcony in shared flat
description:
Friendly room with own balcony in the heart of one of the most up and coming parts of Neukölln. Bars, restaurants and supermarkets are right around the corner. Public transportation (S-Bahn, U-Bahn, Bus) within 5-10 minutes walking distance.

Other vibrant city districts such as Kreuzberg or Friedrichshain are just a 10 minute S- or U-Bahn ride from here.

You will share this apartment with my wonderful flatmate Hanna (who is usually out and about, studying or working) while I'm out of town.

name: Schöne zentrale Altbauwohnung in West-Berlin
description: Centrally located, bright, spacious 2-room old building apartment in Berlin, with a charming neighborhood atmosphere. Charlottenburg is known for its quiet and green location. The property is located on Lake Lietzensee with many shopping and restaurant options, close to the fair, the ZOB bus station and Kurfürstendam. Nearby are numerous S-Bahn and U-Bahn stations to the main train station, Alexanderplatz, etc.

name: Zentral gelegene grüne Oase für Haustierfreunde
description: Welcome to my Berlin old building apartment. With me you will find beautiful old-building flair and a small green garden oasis in one. Located close to the center in the district of Weißensee, you can wonderfully explore my beautiful city from here. My apartment is located on the ground floor and is wonderfully cool in summer and cozy in winter. My cat Maude and my bitches of Abby and Nelly live with me. I look forward to supporting you in your wanderings through Berlin.

name: Weigandufer, Neukölln, Treptow
description: 25qm room available from 01.02.2024 till 29.02.2024. So you got the chance to stay in our lovely barrio. Maybe also possible to stay one or two weeks longer, but not sure yet. Located in Berlin/Neukölln/Weigandufer, directly on the waterside.  68qm flat, fully furniture. Balcony also possible to use. Internet and flatphone are also included. Metro, bus and so on close by 5min walking. Families with dogs or kids welcome :)

name: Spacious room in the north of Friedrichshain
description:
Beautiful and very confortable room for Berlin lovers or visitors!
I'm renting from time to time my very spacious (25square meters) in a quiet flatshare next to Lansberger Allee. You will find every thing you need to relaxe after a big day in the city and you will be well connected to go out and enjoy Berlin at night. Very well deserved with Ring Bahn at a 6min walk (S-Landsberger Alle) and Tram and the door (M8). You are in 25 min at Hauptbahnof and in 15 min in Mitte (Rosenthaler Platz).

name: Green Homeoffice with terrace near Alexanderplatz
description:
This room is part of a WG, it could be possible that you share the apartment with my roommates.

Retreat to the quiet and calming side of Berlin and enjoy your morning coffee on terrace right at your room doorstep. This room is located in the heart of Berlin, minutes away from amazing sights like TV Tower and Museum Island and legendary nightlife area Friedrichshain and Neuköln.

name: With Kids & Friends in private Family Home
description:
Cozy private terraced house (150sqm in ground floor, 1st floor and extended DG) with ample space for family and friends. With us, you live in our fully equipped private house, instead of in a sterile apartment.

Cosy private House (150sqm in Ground Floor, 1st & 2nd Floor) with plenty of space for families and friends. Here you live in our fully equipped private home instead of a soulless holiday home.

name: Cosy apartment next to Maybachufer canal
description:
Cosy apartment of 60 sq-meters, perfect for a couple. Location is ideal: 5 minutes walking from Maybachufer canal and Turkish market, and 2 minutes walking from Ubahn Schonleinstrasse.
The apartment has an open kitchen and living-room, a bathroom with bathtub, a double-bed room and a small balcony.

House with 2 cats so not suitable for allergic persons. Cats will not be there at the rental time.

name: Artist room in the heart of Berlin Mitte
description: A central, bright and breezy residence fit for an artist. The space is inviting, relaxed, and has a great vantage point of the city of Berlin.

name: Altbauwohnung in Berlin Tempelhof-Schöneberg
description: Tempelhof is a very nice and safe neighbourhood. Bergmannkiez is about 15 min away by car.

name: Cozy Maisonette apartment with huge garden
description:
Our five room Maisonette apartment is located in a very nice and calm location. We have a spacios kitchen and sharing a huge garden with our two house neighbours.
The next Tram station M5 is 3 minutes away. It wil take you to the center of Berlin (Alexanderplatz) in about 20 minutes.
In close proximity are parks with little lakes, a little beach resort, the Mies van der Rohe house and the Gedenkstätte Höhenschönhausen, a former Stasi prison which is now an very impressive museum.

name: Stylish and spacious apartment in central Berlin
description: NEW stylish and spacious 110 square metre apartment in the heart of the trendy Friedrichshain district in Berlin. 2 bedrooms and a large open-plan living area with parquet flooring, fully equipped kitchen and balcony. The apartment is equipped with a Flat-Screen TV, record player, piano, high-quality Bluetooth speaker, and ultra-fast fiber optic WiFi. It's only 7 minutes on foot to Ostkreuz train station, with a direct connection to BER airport and the main Berlin train station in 15 minutes.

name: LiKe Apartments - Zentral in Berlin
description:
Registriernr.: 07/Z/RA/018380-24
This stylish 2-room apartment offers you a little oasis in urban life. Prime location: Centrally located in the west of Berlin. Optimal transport connection: Perfectly connected by S-Bahn, U-Bahn and bus; few steps from the S-Bahn station Friedenau. Private parking: Your personal parking space is right behind the house. Food: Berlin-Friedenau offers small, first-class restaurant, cozy cafes and great bars – all right on your doorstep.

name: Dachgeschoß Maisonette Südbalkon - nur monatlich
description: Quiet, bright and in a central location.  Monthly rental only. This attractive, furnished and well-maintained apartment is located on the fifth floor in the attic. The three beautiful rooms also include a bath and a separate guest toilet. Accessible access to the property is also possible. The apartment also includes two south balconies, where you can relax wonderfully. There is also a communal laundry room in the house. Available on request with underground parking space.

name: Cozy room in the Centre of Berlin
description: Enjoy the simple life in this quiet and centrally located accommodation.

name: Compact & efficient, with free WiFi
description: This room offers you a comfortable living in a modern design. It's equipped with two single beds (2x0.90m x 2.00m, which can be pushed together to make a KING bed) and bath/shower/WC, working desk, flat screen TV, telephone, free Wi-Fi, free laptop-compatible safe, sound proof windows, heated towel rail and hairdryer. name: Neubauwohnung in Berlin Mitte
description:
This beautiful apartment offers a quiet retreat right in the best part of Berlin Mitte!
Due to the immediate proximity to the subway, tram and S-Bahn, you can quickly get anywhere in the city. If you stay in the apartment, you have it quiet due to the orientation to the courtyard.
Rich cafes, restaurants, a supermarket and a drugstore are right around the corner.

name: 3/ X Loft Art Design 3 BR Factory Kreuzberg bright
description: In a quiet backyard between the hip Kreuzberg and Mitte, you will find relaxation in our stylish loft. Enjoy the central location and explore Berlin's food & lifestyle scene easily on foot. Furnished with high quality vintage design classics and comfortable amenities (Bruno Ray ,De Sede, Lehni, Zieta, B&B Italia, Moroso, Tapioviaara, Artemide and contemporary art by renowned German artists, your stay becomes a unique experience.

name: Eastside -  Spacious room in the heart of Berlin
description:
Welcome to our beautiful apartment in Karl-Marx-Allee, in the heart of Berlin.

The apartment is located on the sunny side of the Allee and offers more than just space to sleep.

By foot you can quickly reach Alexanderplatz, a subway station is right in front of the entrance and the street itself is an important traffic axis for Berlin. You just can't get more mobility!

name: Charming Room in Spacious Home
description:
Charming Antique-Furnished Room w/ Shared Bath Near S-Bahn Storkower Str.

The house is an 8-minute walk from Storkower Str. S-Bahn and 15 minutes from Frankfurter Tor. Guests have access to the kitchen, balcony, and three toilets. You'll share the bathroom with my friendly roommate; other guests use a separate bath. The house feels very spacious and quiet. Free parking.

Important Info:
My roommate and other guests also live here. I give piano lessons in the living room on some afternoons.

name: New Mitte 1-B Furnished Studio/Kitchen/Lift
description:
A brand new north-west facing 1-bedroom studio located in the heart of Mitte & Kreuzberg Berlin,
surrounded by art galleries, cafes, restaurants, and speak-easy bars.

name: Authentic Berlin Loft
description:
Relax in this special and quiet space.

1 double bed, 1 single bed

Live here with quiet and nice roommates in the unique loft in Berlin.

We are conscious and communicative people, on 250 square meters there is enough space to get out of the way.

If required, a massage can be booked here and a full bathroom.

A super sweet and quiet dog lives here 🐶

However, this can also be in a private room for the time of the stay.

Room has 27 sqm.

name: 115 sqm Artist apt in Neukolln
description: Located in the creative district of Berlin Neukolln, this Artist apartment of 115 sqm offers you all you need. Spacious, light and fully equipped. Beautiful peacefull street. Artisan cafes, bakers, bars and restaurants are around the corner. Enjoy this urban lifestyle in Neukolln!

name: Privatzimmer in Friedrichshain
description:
In the fabled Rigaer Straße, you are right in the heart of the Friedrichshainer Nordkiez. Parks, great cafes, and little shops right outside.

Since the apartment is on the 3rd floor in the back house, it is very quiet. The apartment is spacious and always sunny bright.

Public transport in the immediate vicinity: 5 minutes to the Frankfurter Tor subway, 5 minutes to Tram Bersarinplatz and 10 minutes to the S-Bahn (Ringbahn) Frankfurter Allee.

There is also a parking space in the yard.

name: Room in Center of Berlin (Mitte)
description:
Stay in the heart of Berlin, just a 5-minute walk from Alexanderplatz! My peaceful apartment is steps from the TV Tower, Volksbühne, and the iconic Babylon Cinema. You’ll have a private bedroom and bathroom, while we share the fully equipped kitchen. Despite the central location, it’s quiet and perfect for relaxing after exploring the city. I’m here to help with tips or let you enjoy your stay independently. Your cozy Berlin base awaits!

Apartment Registration number: 01/Z/AZ/017824-24

Enjoy a morning coffee, on our southeast balcony, cooks in our modern kitchen and forges plans for the next day in the spacious living room.

Public transport (U5 Metro, M10 Tram, S-Bahn) is within 5-10 minutes’ walk, & a 240 bus stop nearby.

description:
We rent our beautiful, large, bright Berlin old building apartment: suitable for families with children but also for those who like to have space. The apartment has 8 rooms, including three children's rooms and a games room. There's also two bathrooms, and a well-equipped kitchen.
The apartment is a 5-minute walk from the Gesundbrunnen S-Bahn and U-Bahn station in a nice, quiet neighborhood. A playground is located directly opposite the apartment, and there are also nice cafes!

Super central location; walking distance to the castle park, pedestrian zone, opera, cafes and restaurants. Richard-Wagner-Platz Underground.
Feel at home and enjoy Berlin!

We have one bedroom to rent out with a big bright living room and a balcony with sun. You can watch movies on our projector.Everything you need is there. Optionally you can rent another room for sleeping or working. JustAsk

Perfect for both relaxation and productivity, this is your gateway to one of Berlin's most spirited neighborhoods.

Including organic breakfast (cereals, oat-/soy-milk, coffee, tea) and other kitchen supplies that can be used.

The beautiful park of Volkspark Friedrichshain is only 5 minutes walking distance
The apartment is part of an Altbau (old building) completely and recently refurbished with the most high standard comfort.

Underfloor heating,bedroom double bed 190cm wide,room with sofa bed, baby cot if needed, two air mattress, high chair

It is a spacious (20 sqM), bright private room with a wooden floor and balcony (oblique view on the river Spree and Eastside Gallery) in a clean, uncluttered altbau apartment, in wonderful Wrangekiez with its many cafés, bars and eateries. 1-2 min. to U1. Use my bicycle for free!

To limit turnover, I prefer 3-4 week stays, but 15+ stays fine if they include the begining (asap) or end (April 22) of my availability.
Message me if you've questions. :-)

The apartment is in Moabit, a growing and popular area not far from the main station (10 mins) and within walking distance to several popular restaurants, shops, and parks. An ideal base to explore Berlin.

Enjoy your stay in this quiet and centrally located home. The perfect starting point to discover all of Berlin from all of Berlin. Two parks can be reached within walking distance. After adventurous days, the hammock or a small sitting area on the balcony invites you to relax.

Enjoy your stay in this quiet, centrally located flat. The perfect starting point to discover Berlin. Two parks within walking distance. After an eventful day, you can relax on a calm balcony.

The area is really calm and we have a relaxing lake right next to the house but the city center is easily accessible with U7 which is just at the end of the street (Blaschkoallee).

The house is surrounded by nice bars + cafés, plus the Kanal is around the corner.

Room can be rented by FLINTA* only. 800/month.

Frieda

We share a beautiful private park with our immediate neighbours and Viktoria Park is 10 metres away. Includes cleaning twice a month.

It's located in Alt-Treptow so it's a quiet neighbourhood but a short walk to Neukölln (2min) and Kreuzberg (5-10min). The apartment has nice floors/high ceilings, I have lots of plants and it is very homey (I did a few things since these pics were taking).

The room, which we usually use as a living room, is ideal for couples, but also for business travelers (cozy workspace at the stylish real wood table.

It is a bright, cosy and stylish single-room apartment located in Central West Berlin.

From here you can reach all nice places in Berlin. For Touristic vacations it is a perfect starting point.

By feet you easily reach the Tiergarten, the Ku'damm, the Savinyplatz with its many nice cafes and bars, the Siegessäule and even the Brandenburger Tor, which is only 20 min working away. If you like to go to the East you only need to take the U2 or the S-Bahn from Zoologischer Garten.

The KaDeWe is in 10 minutes walking distance.
The apartment is in the back of the building, but still bright and offers a lot of peace from the hustle and bustle of the city.

Sunny room in front of a small park in the heart of Charlottenburg. Near City center and good connection to buses and trains. The castle 'Schloss Charlottenburg ' with a beautiful park and lake is just around the corner. Only partially suited for home office.

name: Urban-Oasis: Zentral, Ruhig, Neu!
description:
Welcome to our charming apartment! Ideal for travelers looking for a central location with easy access and tranquility at the same time. Steps away from Rüdesheimer Platz, various shopping facilities and restaurants.

The quiet location makes it possible to recharge after eventful days. Relax in the cozy living room or in the idyllic garden – a green paradise in the middle of the city. Here you can enjoy tranquility and privacy with a glass of wine.

name: Cozy Apartment with Garden
description:
A bright and cozy apartment featuring a lovely garden perfect for relaxation. The interior is minimalist and welcoming, with parquet flooring throughout and a modern kitchen equipped with all essentials. The bedroom with a comfortable bed.

Outside, two friendly outdoor cats, Manfred and Hildegard, call the garden home and would be happy to be fed by guests. Please note, due to the presence of the cats, the apartment is not suitable for people with allergies.

description:
The apartment is quietly located within the inner ring of the building complex with a view of the lovingly maintained backyard garden.

At the same time, there is a great transport connection by public transport: U6, U9 and tram traffic take you to almost all districts of Berlin in no time.

Also within walking distance are supermarkets, drugstores, pharmacies and many cute cafes and spätis.

name: Best of Berlin: See und KadeWe
description:
The best sides of Berlin combined! Directly on the Grunewald and a 10-minute walk to the most beautiful swimming lake in Berlin, the Krummen Lanke.
On the other hand, in 5 minutes on the subway and with it in just 20 minutes at KadeWe! So every day you have a choice between city and nature! A wonderfully quiet, newly renovated apartment is waiting for you. Fully equipped with built-in water filter and Arke Sprudler. Spend an unforgettable time in this oasis of Berlin.

name: Berlin-City for family & friends
description:
Two guest rooms in a friendly family apartment near Winterfeldtplatz: a spacious guest room with double bed and dining table and a further guest room right next to it.

Ideal for a city trip to Berlin for parents with one child or a group of friends of three.

name: Helle Wohnung mit großen Terrasse
description: The apartment is very spacious. The south terasse is huge, very calm and green. It is our favorite part of the apartment. You may even be lucky enough to meet the squirrels who often come on the balcony to get some nuts ;)

name: Liebevolle Wohnung zum wohlfühlen
description: The apartment is close to the subway and Ringbahn in less than 10 minutes you are in the middle of Berlin. Many cafes and pubs are located here. The room is lovingly furnished - about 23 square meters there is a nice 2 bed room. When you look out the window, you'll see trees and hear birds singing. Shared spaces are kitchen, bathroom. In addition, we have our own garden where you can sit comfortably and enjoy the sun, eat outside, or spend nice evenings.

name: Studio mit Balkon in Mitte
description:
Enjoy the simple life in this quiet and centrally located Unte-Highworthy parquet floor with underfloor heating. The open plan living/dining room has a nice kitchen equipped with everything you need for cooking.

In the living room there is a cozy sofa bed that can be transformed into a bed of 130 cm lying area in no time.

Wardrobe, small desk, and a balcony complete this studio

A laundry room is located in the house
rkunft.

name: Coole Wohnung in Mitte mit Kamin und Dachterrasse
description: Spacious, modernly furnished duplex apartment in the trendy district Mitte  on the border with Kreuzberg. The apartment has a large roof terrace with views over Berlin. The bedroom is located on the upper floor and is very quiet like the entire apartment. The open living space in the lower floor is equipped with a fireplace. Due to the central location of the apartment, all the tourist, gastronomic and cultural highlights of Berlin are easily accessible.  Easily accessible by subway.

name: Rooftop Loft in Kreuzberg with Riverview
Großzügige Wohnung im Herzen Charlottenburgs
description:
The open-plan, spacious attic apartment on an old building with a large balcony is located in the middle of one of the most beautiful residential streets in the middle of Charlottenburg - numerous coffees, restaurants and the Ku'damm in 2-3 minutes walking distance. Perfectly oriented to the south, the apartment is lit by the sun all day and the sunset can be admired from the large balcony.

Smoking is allowed on the balcony, not the apartment. Parties are not allowed.

name: Large bright appartment in the hart of Berlin
description: This bright, family friendly flat is situated in a quiet neighbourhood of Berlin Alt-Treptow, next to canals and Spree river. The area boarders two parks with playgrounds and boat hire places. While the area itself is quiet, in 5 minutes walk you reach vibrant neighbourhoods Kreuzberg and Neukölln. There are plenty of restaurants and supermarkets. The flat has a large living and dining room with a big balcony, 3 bedrooms with a child's bed, a fully equiped kitchen, bath tab and a separate WC.

name: Room in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
Sometimes I rent my massage room (23 m2) in my Oasis in the City/ Apartment to mindful and friendly people.

The Apartment ist on the ground floor in the 2nd quiet courtyard. You have direct entrance to the terrace. You are located in the "Szene-Kiez" Prenzlauer Berg.

name: Nice Room in spacious F'hain apt  1 - 2 sleeps
description:
Room, approx. 14 sqm, south side. Separate hallway, Entrance to the tea kitchen, shower bath (possibly sharing) and another room ( rented ). New building since November 2018. Work/dining table by the window. The bed is 140 cm wide. 2 persons possible, also long term rental.
The party mile" RAW " is within walking distance. Cheap between Ostkreuz and Warschauer Str.
"Urberliner" is happy to give tips , including English.

name: Cosy 1 room appartment, central location in Fhain
description:
Bright 1 room appartment in friederichshain.

It’s a 5min walk from frankfurtertor ubahn ( u5),
there is a tram line M10 just on the corner on the street.
And the s41/s42 stop Landsbergerallee is at a 10minute walk .

The appartment is about 30m square, in a very piece full area.
There is a cute private kitchen with everything you need to cook.

Please note :
No preparties - parties or after parties in this appartment .
Enough places in Berlin to Party .

name: Cosy room in the heart of Kreuzkölln
description:
In the center of Kreuzberg: very popular area in Berlin; just a stone's throw away from comfy cafés & bars and just some stations away from locations like Monarch, Möbel Olfe, SO 36, Privatclub, Lido, Festsaal Kreuzberg and so on.
Nevertheless it is a calm & nice area - little streets, the canal, a large park and the former airport field where you can take walks and relax.
On top you can find a lot of nice restaurants in our area - lovely done meals from all over the world.

name: Bright & cozy apartment / Helle Altbauwohnung
description:
The apartment has​ 52 qm and is located in beautiful Schöneberg not far from Potsdamerstrasse.

The area has some great coffee shops and is located very near the U-bahn. It is also within walking distance to all the great museums. A charming and safe neighborhood.

name: Your room in a modern stylish apartment in Berlin!
description: Fancy to stay in the city center of Berlin? You want to stay in a quiet, but very central location within a short walking distance to many hotspots of Berlin? You like to stay in a brand-new modern apartment? Then our apartment is the right place for you!

name: Sonnenloft: Hell, groß und ruhig
description:
Our apartment is located in the attic of a Neuköllner old building and is wonderfully quiet and bright.

In addition to the large kitchen-living room with dining area, fireplace, sofas and armchairs, there is a southwest-facing large balcony, 2 bedrooms and a guest room with 2 beds each.

You have room here for a large meal of 10 people.

The fireplace makes it cozy in the evening and in the sunshine nothing goes over a splash on the sun terrace, or yoga in the morning.

name: Beautiful Schillerkiez home near Tempelhofer Feld
description:
Our cozy and kids-friendly home is located in the heart of Neukölln in the Schillerkiez.

Surrounded by many playgrounds around the Schillerpromenade, cafes, bars, bakeries and the Tempelhofer Feld, it is the perfect area to get active or relax, even if you are in the middle of a bustling neighborhood.

Subway line U8 (Leinestraße) is a two minutes walk from the apartment. There is a direct connection to the airport from the nearby Hermannstraße S-Bahn station.

name: Park View Apartment in Kreuzberg
description:
Beautiful, big and sunny park view apartment in Kreuzberg

2 min walking to Hermannplatz underground station

Flexible check-in and check-out

description:
2 room apartment with 68 square meters in the African district of Wedding, typical Berlin old building. Especially suitable for families with small children. Baby cot, baby chair, changing area, toys are provided. The family bed measures 240x200cm and can accommodate 2 adults and two children.
Direct parking, at the Volkspark Rehberge. In 5 minutes you are in Schillerpark with playgrounds. The U-Bahn line U6 Rehberge takes you to Friedrichstraße in 15mn.

name: 2-room apartment in Rixdorf, Neukölln
description:
New apartment ideally for a couple. Situated in Rixdorf, which has a village character, some good restaurants and nice bars on walking distance. Train station with several Bus, U-Bahn & S-Bahn lines at 500m.
Fully equipped kitchen and balcony as well.

description:
Cozy apartment in Friedrichshain for rent to animal-loving person.
The apartment is raised ground floor with access to the garden.
Many pubs, restaurants and nightlife are around the corner. Good subway connection, in 3 min walking distance.
We have a hangover, which would have to be fed once a day and would also enjoy petting.

description: Perfectly designed appartment under the roof - lots of cafés and restaurants nearby. Big bed in my living room, means you,ll have your own room. You can lock the door, if you need your privacy. You can use my balcony of my personal room if you want to. Marble bathroom... gentle owner... feel free to ask!! Finally it’s all about chemistry - some information about you to prove if it fits is appreciated...

name: Modern 1 Bedroom Apartment in Neukölln
description:
The apartment is located in a quiet and friendly neighborhood in North Neukölln, on the former border of West/East Berlin.
It is modernized and offers you everything you need:
A bright kitchen, with washer/dryer, dishwasher, a renovated bathroom, a cozy bedroom/living room with a large sofa bed, and a communal roof terrace.

If you have any questions, I'm happy to give more Information!

name: 6 Rooms Apartments Berlin B01
description:
We ask for quiet and centrally located accommodation in Berlin. Our complex consists of 6 apartments, each with a double bed, private bathroom and small kitchenette. Apartments can be reserved separately.

Around the apartments you will find a variety of supermarkets, bakeries, cafes for breakfast and restaurants for lunch or dinner. In just 50 meters you can reach the banks of the Spree - ideal for jogging, walking or just enjoying the day comfortably on the shore.

description: Big room with a double bed, internet and very close of parks such as Hasenheide and Tempelhof. 4 minutes walking to Boddinstr. U bahn station. Near of the center and incredible bars and art galleries.

name: Große Altbauwohnung im Kollwitzkiez
description:
We rent our spacious old building apartment in the heart of the Prenzlauer mountain, in the middle of the "Kollwitzkiez" for the period of our parental leave trip.
The apartment has three rooms - bedrooms with a double and current cot, living room with sofa bed (fold-out mattress, already found by some guests for very comfortable😉) and a children's room where our changing area and a sofa are located, as well as a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom.
The balcony directly onto the water tower.

The kitchen can also be used for cold food. Apartment is in a quieter side street, but super connected. Around the corner: small and large shops, best restaurants, wine shops, cafes, late sales & bars ++ U-Bahn line 7 & bus lines are just a few minutes walk.
