description: A beautiful apartment surrounded by great nature in a  historic clinker house, from which the center is quickly accessible and at the same time there are many hiking trails and the Mauerradweg in front of the door. Relax with the whole family after an exciting day in Berlin at this idyllic home. The apartment is designed for a maximum of 2 adults and 2 children.

name: Zu Gast am Landwehrkanal
description:
Welcome to your quiet oasis in the middle of Berlin-Kreuzberg!
Your vacation home is a modern, light-flooded apartment on the 5th floor of an apartment building. From the spacious southeast balcony, you have a fantastic view of the Landwehr Canal and the countryside, while the neighborhood presents you the lively life of the city from one of its most beautiful and inspiring sides.

name: Room in gorgeous loft
description: Your room is on the 4th floor of an old factory  in Alt Treptow. You can use the kitchen and the main area of the apartment, as well as the sunny balcony. It is very quiet, away from the street.  You are walking distance from the nightlife of Neukölln or Kreuzberg. Around the corner is the huge Treptower Park which is perfect for a run along the river Spree. Large organic supermarket one block away. Restaurants and cafes in the neighborhood.

name: Stilvolles & gemütliches Zimmer, Girls only
description:
Enjoy a nice stay in this stylishly furnished room in our girls shared apartment in Berlin, Pankow.

There are three of us living here and we offer you the room that is currently available. Two of the rooms have a bunk bed (double bed).

The shared apartment is well connected to public transport, but also a quiet afternoon, two parks are within walking distance. A supermarket is only 90 m away and a fully equipped kitchen can be used.

name: 3-Zimmer-Altbau in Prenzlauer Berg
description: Overnight with a view of the TV tower in a typical old Berlin apartment in a quiet neighborhood in Prenzlauer Berg. You're still in the middle of your life. We are happy to give you tips for a great visit away from the tourist routes.

name: Charming 3-Room Maisonette
description: Feel at home in this lovely Maisonette. It is located in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, next to the wonderful Helmholtzplatz. Lots of beautiful cafes and restaurants are nearby. It's the perfect spot to have a relaxing holiday in the centre of Berlin.

name: Ruhige Wohnung im Herzen Berlins
description: Enjoy our apartment in the best city location while we flew out. The 89 m² apartment is quietly framed by two large backyards at the Spittelmarkt. TV tower or Brandenburg Gate? – all just a stone's throw away.

name: Berlin furnished comfy apartment
description:
The apartment is located in Wedding, Berlin. Very central, 2 mins by foot to the metro station U8, which takes you to pretty much anywhere in Berlin, such as Alexanderplatz and Rosenthaler Platz.

The apartment will be cleaned prior to your arrival. It's fully equipped in the kitchen, fresh bed sheets and towels prepared, as well as a TV and wifi connection.

name: Beautiful and calm 50qm apartment in Prenzel' Berg
description: 50qm apartment in a nice and calm neighbourhood right next to the hot spot Mauerpark (especially a Sunday Must-Go). The well furnished apartment has all you need, one bed room, a spacious living room, a kitchen where all is set to cook or have a coffee and a nice bathroom with a bathtub. Not to forget the balcony where you can drink tea in the morning sun. As the apartment is located on the 2nd floor in the building in the back it is super calm to sleep.

name: Sunny room in the centre of Friedrichshain
description:
Come stay in our lovely flat in the centre of Friedrichshain! Very bright and calm place, with access to the city centre in 15 minutes. Lots to do in the "Kiez" (neighbourhood): restaurants, cafes, art centres, and some notable attractions. The building is under historical protection, too, so you get a piece of Berliner history included with the flat!
It's oriented full south, very sunny and calm. Cosy atmosphere.

name: Bright and spacious room in Fhain - with balcony
description: Bright and spacious room in Altbaum in Friedrichshain. Located in front of a park, easy access to the Ubahn and Sbahn. If you feel like partying 15 minutes walk to Warschauer str, RAW or 20 min on foot to Berghain. If you feel like to relax and enjoy the city your in the great place to start.

name: Cosy, green home in Neukölln
description: Our home is located in a lively area with a lot of cafés, bars and restaurants around the corner.

name: Lux Apartment
description: Modern Lux Apartment near the Spree River in Berlin,  Minimal rental for 3months (94days) for non tourism stay ,business expat ,investor , other business trip welcome . All Furnished with New furniture, Wardrobe is not available, the rest storages without locks are available. I am waiting for the VISA to go to Berlin for Long stay .

name: Loft in factory building
description: Cozy, bright loft in a quiet rear building with a unique layout combining bedroom and kitchenette. Enjoy a large bathroom with rain shower and original features like brick walls and vaulted ceilings. Located in a former factory with rich industrial heritage, it’s peaceful yet central. Just 150m from the U6 subway, you’re minutes from key spots. Explore nearby hidden gems: great coffee, music, and dining just steps away.

name: Rooftop-dream/canal view
description:
[Improved 2023: additional 3rd bedroom, not reflected in comments]
Spacious two story apartment on the top two floors of a classic Berlin Altbau full of character with direct view of the canal across the street. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a huge dining & living area as well as a rooftop terrace and a study room. Elevator available through side entrance (one set of stairs has to be climbed). Ideal for families or groups of friends. Lots of baby/toddler equipment available.

name: Designed 1st class apartment in the best location
description: Our apartment in located in House Cumberland which is an iconic building in Berlin.  Our apartment's interior is of the highest level, with top quality Bulthaup  kitchen including high end  appliances (Miele, Gaggenau) , 2 spacious bed rooms with double beds, one with ensuite bathroom and another fully equipped bathroom as well as a pantry.  the apartment is fully furnished, including kitchen utensils, towels , sheets, cleaning supplies, washing machine , dryer etc.

name: Cosy apartment with piano and balcony
description:
My place is nearby Weserstraße, Klunkerkranich, Neukölln Arcaden, public transport, shopping possibilties and the inspiring day and night life of Kreuzberg / Neukölln - Xkölln....
Cosy place for couples, adult + child or single persons!
My cat lives with us, so not for for persons suffering from an allergy!

name: Blueground | Mitte, nr Hauptbahnhof
description: Discover the best of Berlin, with this studio apartment in Mitte. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this airy Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, stylish living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #BER213)

name: Cosy, sunny 2-person studio apartment w/ balcony
description:
Expect a sunny old building apartment with balcony where you can enjoy your morning cafe. In the living room and bedroom is a 2m x 1.40 m bed, a desk overlooking the countryside, a cozy armchair and enough storage space for your belongings.

Cosy and sunny 2-person studio apartment.

name: Gemütlich und zentral 27m² in WG
description:
I offer a large room in a shared apartment of 2. This features a 1.60 x 2.00 m bed, a welcoming couch to relax in and a bright workspace.
The apartment is a 5-minute walk from Leopoldplatz, from where you can quickly reach Friedrichstraße with the U6 or the zoo garden with the U9. In addition, the Ringbahn S41/S42 can also be reached in 5 minutes.
On Müllerstraße, you have plenty of shopping opportunities. In the nearby neighborhood there are bars, restaurants, parks...

name: Big Apartment in the middle of Berlin!
description: Hey guys! I have a big, bright room in our renovated apartment in the middle of berlin/ Wedding. the underground station is just 5 minutes walk apart and in the near are many buses and shopping possibilities. I am sure you'll like it! :)

name: Schönes Zimmer in ruhigem Altbau am Ostkreuz
description: Rent out my room in a 2 person apartment at the Nöldnerplatz station, a 10-minute walk from the Ostkreuz. In 300 meters you are at the station Nöldnerplatz, from where the S-Bahn runs directly to the center every 3-4 minutes (Alexanderplatz, Friedrichstraße, etc.). In just 5 minutes by train you are on Warschauer Straße in the heart of Friedrichshain with several bars and shops. Nearby are some techno clubs (including Kosmonaut, Void (10 min), Sisyphos, Wilde Renate, Magdalena (20 min)).

name: Cozy private room - WG (flat share)
description:
Facts:
Room: 15 sqm
apartment: 5 rooms, total living space approx. 120 sqm
4-person shared apartment (2 girls, 1 boy)
Large living room
apartment building in Schöneberg, quiet, safe neighborhood
2 min to Ringbahn: Innsbrucker Platz
2 min to U4

name: 70m² plus 32m² Balkon exklusiv für Dich
description: Fully furnished apartment, 70m² plus 32m² balcony, bathroom with shower and tub, complete kitchen, parking spaces on the premises. In the same house, subject to availability, two more 2-person rooms can be rented with en-suite bathroom. The bus stops in 40m from the house, 5 minutes to Mahlsdorf S-Bahn station, from where the regional train is at Alex in 20 minutes. The A10 is 5km away.

name: New family-friendly flat,with terrace in B.-Mitte
description: Very close to the central station, tram stations, very central but quite, in a new area. A huge park in walking distance, as well as good burger restaurant and Billard-bar around the corner. Gallery Hamburger Bahnhof, Naturkundemuseum, Restaurants in walking distance. Good position to discover berlin by bike, 12 min to Brandenburger Tor, Tiergarten, Reichstag, 20 min to Prenzlauer Berg, Alexanderplatz. Great view!! Very child friendly, we have all the stuff for 2-5 year old kids.

name: Charming typical Berliner flat
description: Flat on 3th floor with view on a calm and green courtyard. The flat is decorated with a mix of German and mediterraneen flair as we are a mixed couple - French and German. The flat is big and spacious (65m2 and 3m high ceiling) and very luminous.

name: Bright room in central  modern Flat
description: The bright room is part of a spacious and renovated old building from the early 20th-Century located in the heart of Friedrichshain nearby Warschauer Straße and Alexanderplatz. A modern and clean style combined with typical Berlin charme will complete your stay.

name: Big private room in Neukölln with balcony
description:
Stunning 20m² private room in a renovated 2-bedroom apartment in Neukölln. An original 'Berliner Altbau' with high ceilings and stucco elements for an authentic Berlin experience in one of the coolest neighborhoods in the city!

You will share the flat with my roommate Konrad. We have been friends for a long time so you can trust him all along. He is very navigated in the city and can give you all the tips you need. Also check out my guidebook for suggestions!

name: Schöne Wohnung in zentraler, ruhiger Lage
description:
Dear guests,


our cozy old building apartment is perfectly located: it is 10 minutes by bike or bus to the trendy district "Friedrichshain" with weekly and flea market, cafes, restaurants, bars, cinema, theater, etc. At Alexanderplatz/in "Mitte" you can take the S-Bahn in 20 minutes.

Despite its central location, the apartment in the back house is wonderfully quiet and surrounded by trees and birdsong. It is a 15-minute walk to the Spree. Parks are close by.

You are very welcome!

name: Rummelsburg Penthouse
description:
Large, modern attic apartment with terrace near the Rummelsburger Bay and the S-Bahn ring.

The S-Bahn station Rummelsburg S-Bahn station is a 5-minute walk away and you can very quickly get to the city center (4 minutes to Warschauer Straße, 11 minutes to Alexanderplatz. A supermarket is nearby, a very large selection of bars and cafes can be found in neighboring Friedrichshain, an S-Bahn (suburban train) station or 15-minute walk away.

name: Pair-suited room in shared aptmt
description: I'll be gone visiting my girlfriend and will rent my gorgieous moabit-room to Berlin-Fans and -travellers. The room has enough space for at least two people and lies quietly to the back. Feel free to use kitchen and bathroom as well.

name: Central, modern, fully equipped 2-room apartment
description: This beautiful 80 square meter apartment in central Berlin-Wilmersdorf is now available for rent for a lucky tenant or pair of tenants looking to experience Berlin for a longer period. The apartment is based in a new building (2015) on the 2nd floor. It comes fully equipped with furniture and all the necessary appliances to make your stay as comfortable as possible. The location is in a nice city-west area within a 10-minute walk to Kurfuerstendamm, one of the main shopping areas of Berlin.

name: Tolle Wohnung mit Balkon
description:
Our apartment has everything you could want: a kitchen with everything your heart desires, two large bedrooms, a bathroom with bathtub and even a balcony. It's very manageable, but it's great for 1-2 glasses of wine and nice conversations.
The bedrooms both have a 1.40 x 2.00 m bed, plus a pull-out sofa bed.

name: Cozy room in a nice flat
description: The room is furnished with the essentials and many green plants. The flat is located in one of Berlin's most lively districts with metro connection right in front of the door.

name: Spacious room + big living room in Wedding
description:
A cozy + spacious accommodation in the center for single travelers, couples + friends from all over the world.
In your room is a bed for 2 people. In special cases, 2 more people could sleep on the very comfy couch in the living-room.
Due to work, I spend many days of the week out of Berlin, so you would have the apartment by yourself. Key can be picked up at our neighbor's.
The apartment lies central, close to subway, restaurants, bars, supermarkets, parks...Central station is 12 min by bus.

name: City oasis in Kreuzberg 36
description:
Welcome to our peaceful and beautiful flat just two minutes from the canal seperating Kreuzberg from Neukölln and Treptow!
We would like to sublet our flat to people who are staying for at least two weeks.

name: schöne helle Wohung in ruhiger Lage
description: small pretty 2-room apartment for max 3 people in a central and quiet location

name: Cozy apartment in Neukölln
description: Bright apartment with balcony and bathtub. It’s located on the 3rd floor in the backyard,  so it’s really quiet, but still very close to the subway station U Karl-Marx-Straße and the railway station S Neukölln (Ringbahn) and next to a lot of shops, bars and restaurants.
license:
First name and Last name: Johann Roder
Contact address: Karl-Marx-Straße 123, 12043, Berlin , Deutschland
Listing address: Karl-Marx-Platz 15, 12043, Berlin, Deutschland

name: Gemütliche 1ZKB + Balkon in Berlin Schöneweide
description:
The apartment is about 45 square meters. Small kitchen, small bathroom and living room/bedroom (approx. 22 sqm) + balcony to the quiet, green courtyard.
Kitchen with fridge, washing machine and dishwasher, microwave, blender, espresso maker and small table.
Bathroom with bathtub.
TV with Netflix is available, but no cable connection. System with Bluetooth can also be used.

name: Miniloft Kreuzberg: Vielfach studio
description:
Our exquisite Vielfach Minilofts have many highlights: a woodstove, two balconies, panorama windows with views of Berlin‘s skyline at 180 degrees.
Ideal for up to 4 people, their 53 sqm feature a large bedroom with a king sized bed (180 x 200 cm) and an east facing balcony, a living room with two sofas that convert into single beds, and an open kitchen with a large table for working or dining. The ensuite bathroom with shower has two doors, connecting to the living room and bedroom.

name: Large room, king size bed in a peaceful apartment
Rising Berlin
description: The newly renovated, modern apartment is located on the 4th floor of a multi-family building without an elevator, right in the heart of the vibrant and central Neukölln district. With space for up to 6 people, it is ideal for families or groups. The apartment is fully equipped, offering everything needed for a comfortable self-catering stay. Free Wi-Fi is also included.

name: Lovely double bedroom for 1 (Mitte/We)
description:
Welcome to Berlin!! :)
This is a 2-br apt in the heart of Berlin. A 4 min-walk to the subway station Osloer Str. 3 stops away from all the cafes and restaurants in Mitte (district).
Tram right outside the apt. Third floor up, no elevator. 3 Stops to Bornholmer Str where the Berlin wall first fell in 1989 ! History at its best!
Photos are slightly outdated, usually guests like the apartment more than the pictures.

name: Zen Garden 2 Room Peaceful Space
description:
Located in the central Neukolln, very international and multicultural hip area, only a few minutes from many stations and many shops and cafes. 国際的でヒップなベルリンの人気エリアで、駅からすぐの便利なロケーションにあります。

Peaceful and spacious rooms with a private garden

Great for both relaxation and remote work (each room is equipped with a working table and high speed wifi. )

name: Big room with sunny balcony in Kreuzberg
description: The room is the largest (20m²) of a quiet 3-bed flat. It is very bright due to a large window wall that connects to a balcony (incl. table for two). Of course, it is also available for use. This is my private room while I am not in Berlin. However, the room is minimally furnished with private things and has enough storage space as well as a comfortable double bed for guests.

name: Nice room in the heart cultural life in Berlin.
description:
Hi everyone,
The room, the location and the apartment are really nice, but really the most important is you feel at home while you are here.
Perfect for 1 or 2 people!
Here racism, fascism, sexism, homophobia will not be tolerate, other than that (very principal and fundamental bases for a loving and care society living) everyone is welcome!

Through the window you can see the canal, maybachufer, which is very nice for a morning walk, before work, or after party, whichever one you choose =)

name: Sunny room close to Gleisdreieck Park
description:
The flat was renovated 4 years ago, not very big but clean and well located.
Actually we are living in this apartment with three people but two are not here at the moment.

Due to Corona we would like you to confirm that you do not go to parties and keep the Corona rules in mind, please.

We live very central and Innbetween all amazing quarters of Berlin.

Don’t hesitate to ask if you need anything.

name: Beautiful space in Friedrichshain near centre
description: This apartment is right in the centre of Friedrichshain, close to restaurants, bars, and a perfect place for everyone who wants to explore Berlin.

name: Cozy WG-Zimmer in Berlin Neukölln
description:
The room for rent is my shared room. Accordingly, you also have a few wonderful roommates with whom you share the kitchen and bathroom and who can give you information and tips at any time:)
There is a possibility to use my bike.

name: Stylish & Clean 2 Rooms Apartment
description: This stylish and very spacious apartment is situated in Kollwitzkitz - the heart of Prenzlauer Berg and at the border to Berlin Mitte. I recently moved into this place and immediately fell in love with it. The apartment is very quiet. It is situated in the garden house of a beautiful old building.

name: Family flat in Neukölln (direct from SXF Airport)
description:
We are German/British couple who would like to welcome you to our home in Berlin's popular Neukölln district.

Our flat is spacious with big windows letting in lots of light especially during summer. It is also very well insulated and stays nice and warm in winter. We completely renovated it in 2017 so everything is new and in great condition. It's a child-friendly home, perfect for families with smaller children as we have lots of toys. Our son's room can also double as an extra guest room.

name: Gemütliches Zimmer für Queers in Kreuzkölln
description: We mainly offer LGBTIQ* people a room in Kreukölln (Nordneukölln), a stone's throw from the green canal. The canal likes to play table tennis, enjoyed the sunset or grilled with a drink. At the same time, the apartment is quiet but centrally located in the trendy Weserkiez - bars, restaurants, shops, Spätis and Neuköllnflair at your doorstep.

name: Familienfreundliche Wohnung im Herzen F‘hains
description:
Since our family travels from time to time, we would like to provide you with our apartment for your family.

It is a family friendly apartment in the heart of Friedrichshain with lots of parks, playgrounds and restaurants in the neighborhood.

name: 1460 sqft near Castle Charlottenburg
description:
Experience the charm of the old west Berlin. Enjoy your stay in the historic Mansion Colony of Neu-Westend. You will be staying in a wilhelminian style house built in the early 1900's.

You can reach castle Charlottenburg within 9 minutes by bus. The bus stop is next to the house. The S-Bahn Station Westend is 5 minutes by bus and you can reach all of berlin with the Ringbahn from there. The U-Bahn station Neu-Westend is only a 10 minutes walk away

name: Gemütliche Wohnung mit großem Balkon
description:
Relax with the whole family or friends in this peaceful accommodation. With the Wuhlheide and the zoo in the immediate vicinity, our apartment is ideal for nature trips. And with the direct connection to the city by U-Bahn and S-Bahn, you are also quickly in the middle of Berlin for the wide range of culture, sights and international cuisine.

Discount for stays of 2 weeks or more

If you have any further questions, please feel free to write to us Looking forward to you soon!

Liza&Marcel

name: Cozy Room for Two next to Lake
description: Private room in cozy apartment in an old traditional brick house with a big inner courtyard in the beautiful district of Weissensee in Berlin. The apartment is close to a tram station that gets you in 15 minutes to Alexanderplatz and has also direct connections to the vivid districts of Mitte, Prenzlauer Berg, Friedrichschain, Wedding etc. It is also located 5 minutes away walking from the Weissensee lake which is one of the most beautiful lakes in Berlin.

name: Cozy 2-room apartment in Neukölln
description: Welcome to our charming 62 sqm flat nestled in the heart of Berlin's trendiest neighborhood, Neukölln! Whether you're a seasoned traveler or a first-time visitor to the city, this stylish and modern apartment offers the perfect base to explore all that Berlin has to offer.

name: Sunny Top Floor Room with balcony in Neukölln
description: Very sunny 16m2 room with balcony in Neukölln/Kreuzkölln (the overlap of Kreuzberg and Neukölln), one block from the canal, in a quiet and residential area but very close to restaurants and bars.

name: Privates Bad & helles, schönes Zimmer in top Lage!
description:
We, Marc and Elena, live in a beautiful bright old building and look forward to welcoming you here.
The apartment has just been newly renovated. The room is equipped with a 140x200 cm bed, a small desk, a sofa and a closet. The small but nice bathroom included. Shower, also made new, you have to yourself. The kitchen, which you are very welcome to use, is fully equipped, because I like to cook myself.

name: Cat and baby friendly flat in the heart of Berlin!
description:
We offer our cozy appartment in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. You will find everything you need closeby.

The appartment offers everything you need for babies: A Baby bed, a baby chair, lots of toys and books, a baby fence, a baby swing chair.

Also, if you want to bring your cat you are more than welcome. There is a scratch tree, a cat toilet, a litter bin, lots of cat cups.

You will find a TV with Prime and Netflix connected.

And in case you are missing anything, just contact me :)

name: Willkommen (family)
description: A really big and spacious flat, with all comfort. All original stucco and wooden floor for a "berliner spirit" impression, we rent the main part of our flat which is ca. 90sm for you (our office room will be closed). We are happy to have you as a guest!

name: Big 3-room apartment in Friedrichshain
description:
We are renting out our amazing 3-room apartment in Friedrichshain - just across the Friedrichshain Volkspark. The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 kids room, a big living room and 2 bathrooms. There is also a small balcony where you can enjoy the sun. The building has an elevator.

The apartment has the best location in Berlin - 10 min with metro to Alexanderplatz and 10 min to Friedrichshain and Prenzlauer Berg where you will find a lot of nice cafes.

No parties or smoking allowed!

name: Central/beautiful neighbourhood/near to Ku‘Damm
description:
Very central and 1 minute walk to the beautiful Windscheid-Kiez = plenty of cozy Cafés, Restaurants, Ice Café, Burgers, Book stores ..

2 Balconies to chill, relax and enjoy a good glass of vine in the evening

Dishwasher and Nespresso coffee machine

Little walk to Ku‘Damm
Near to Lietzensee an Schloss Charlottenburg - great for walks or jogging

Access to public WiFi (ca. 8€/week)

name: Bright, airy apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
description: I'm renting out my apartment as I'll be away on holiday. The apartment is large and airy, with lots of natural light coming in during the day. There are supermarkets, restaurants, cafes, bars, and kiosks in the neighbourhood. You'd be walking distance away from everything Prenzlauer Berg has to offer plus just less than 10 mins away from the centre of Berlin, Alexander Platz. The M4 and M10 tram lines are just at your doorstep and the Greifswalder Str S-bahn station is 8 min on foot away.

name: Bright, spacious and with balcony in Berlin
description: I rent my beautiful room in Berlin. It is bright and spacious (generous desk and two sofas). The apartment is cozy and well equipped and my roomie is lovely. It is in the Friedrichshain district (Samariterkiez), very well connected. Surrounded by supermarkets, drugstores, cafes, restaurants, etc. Walking distance to Boxhagener platz, with its Saturdays' food market and the legendary Sundays flea market. No parties in the apartment are allowed, Berlin offers many party options, just go out ;)

name: Dachtraum  - Stopover in the Attic
description:
The room is under rooftop with two large skylights to the quiet courtyard. It is equipped with the essentials. There is a bed on euro pallets (Berlin style), an open wardrobe as well as a desk.

There are four other students living in the big apartment. The large kitchen is equipped with everything necessary. Here you can cook and interact with the residents. In the large bathroom there is a washing machine, which you are also welcome to use.

name: Neues und zentrales, komplett eingerichtetes Apt.
description:
New and completely renovated apartment in the middle of Berlin.
Perfect apartment suitable.

name: Bright apartment in beautiful Friedrichshain
description:
This bright apartment is located in the beautiful area Friedrichshain, close to Kreuzberg - so a perfect location, especially for visitors coming for parties and exploring east and the centre of Berlin :-)
You will have your own big bedroom with a high ceiling. The double bed and the single bed allows 3 people.
Many restaurants, bars etc. are in the area - a big Späti (24/7 shop) is even right next to the apartment.
license:

Contact address: Ebelingstr. 9, 10249, Berlin, Germany
Listing address: Ebelingstr. 9, 10249, Berlin, Germany

name: 4-Zimmer-Altbauwohnung am Park
description:
Large old building apartment with balcony, ideal for families and remote work. Fully equipped, with children's room, workspace and kitchen. Green yet central. Opposite Treptower Park, the Spree Spree and the Plänterwald with playgrounds and beer gardens in a quiet old building district. Not far from the Zzenekieze in Treptow, Neukölln, Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain. 4 supermarkets in less than 10min walk. Bus in 5 minutes, S-Bahn (including Ringbahn) is a 15-minute walk away.
Registration number: 09/Z/RA/004035-23

name: Beautiful Flat at Südstern in Berlin Kreuzberg
description: My cozy apartment is located in the beautiful neighborhood at the subway station Südstern in Berlin Kreuzberg. From here it is only 15 minutes on foot to the Kottbusser Tor, the heart of Kreuzberg, anyway to the Hermannplatz in Neukölln. The apartment is equipped with everything you need to feel comfortable. It is located in a quiet residential complex and has a small balcony where you can enjoy the afternoon sun.

name: Cozy and central apartment
description:
Practical one-room apartment in a nice area in Schöneberg, inside the Ring of Berlin.

The apartment is located in the courtyard of the building, so it’s very calm. Bright since located on the 2nd floor, facing the wide court. It has a separate bad and kitchen. It’s fully equipped with a double bed, sofa, table, chairs, microwave, oven, kettle.

You can park your bike in the courtyard. You can ride to places like Tempelhofer Feld or Xberg and feel like a real Berliner.

name: Bright & Cozy 25m² Room in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
Hello everyone,
I am traveling to Mallorca for a Beachvolleyball-Camp for a couple of weeks and would like to offer my room while I'm gone. It's a nice & clean 25m² private room with a king-size bed (200x180) & a lot of space.
I'm living in a 135m² Shared Flat (4th floor) with Kristina, Joanna & Philipp (26-30), who are very fun to live with. They speak German, English and Russian. The tram station is only 1min away and it takes roughly 15-20min by train to go to the Center e.g. Alexanderplatz.

name: Cozy PBerg "Altbau" appartment
description: Welcome to our 85m2 Airbnb in hip Prenzlauer Berg, Germany. Housed in an Altbau building, it features unique ceiling stucco and cozy wooden elements, including doors. The bedroom overlooks a quiet courtyard, offering a peaceful retreat. Centrally located, explore the vibrant neighborhood's cafes and boutiques. Experience the perfect blend of historic charm and modern convenience in our one-of-a-kind space.

name: Berlin: Sonniges 200 QM Penthouse für 5 mit Kamin
description:
Our sunny 200 square meters attic apartment has been renovated and newly furnished.

The 5-bedroom apartment, with its 4 bedrooms and study rooms of different sizes and amenities and a very large open living area of just under 70 square meters, delighted with its brightness and the high ceilings open to under the roof beams.

On the roof terrace you can enjoy wonderful Berlin sunsets.

name: Sunny & Spacious Kreuzberg Home
description: Beautiful apartment, tastefully decorated and well situated. Spacious bedroom with a double bed ideal for a couple, overlooking a peaceful square and views of Berlin's iconic landmark, the TV tower.

name: Modern flat with balcony on hip Boxhagener Street
description: Nicely decorated and new apartment, well equipped and centrally located in calm building. Well connected to public transport and surrounded by hip restaurants and night life.

name: Gemütliche 2-ZiWo. Comeniuskiez
description: The apartment is perfect for 2 people, but there is still a double bed mattress in case of an emergency. It is right in the heart of Friedrichshain and yet absolutely beautiful and quiet (back house), far away from the rolling suit tours. On foot it is 4 minutes to Aldi, 10 minutes to Warschauer Brücke, 14 minutes to Boxhagener Platz with countless great restaurants and bars. The house community is friendly, quiet, and helpful. Our kitchen is super equipped, the TV huge and the sofas cozy.

name: Space Age Oase zwischen Humboldhain und Mauerpark
description:
A large room (30sqm) in a very central location .
A bedroom with pull-out couch (140 cm) and a cozy lounge seating area is rented. On request, a mattress can be added. TV and WLAN are also provided. The kitchen is fully equipped with many kitchen appliances and a dishwasher. The bathroom houses a bathtub and rain shower. You will usually be alone in the apartment as we will be abroad during this time.

name: Spacieux duplex à Kreuzberg
description: Welcome to our apartment in the heart of Bergmannkiez, one of the most exciting but also the quietest neighborhoods in central Berlin.  The apartment is a spacious "maisonette" duplex located in the backyard of the building. On the ground floor is the living room with a large open plan kitchen. On the first floor, the apartment includes a large bedroom with balcony and an office space, as well as a small but fully furnished bathroom.

name: Helle Wohnung im Herzen Berlins
description: Enjoy easy access to everything from this perfectly located place: shopping, pubs, restaurants ...

name: Lovely Apartment Mitte
description: Lovely Apartments is located in Gesundbrunnen/Mitte close to Alexanderplatz (10 min by subway). A former cafe was transformated into a wonderful and warm location - ideal for families and friends - with a Berlin vibe!

description: Beautiful apartment in the Ludwigkirch neighborhood, quiet neighborhood, yet very central, right around the corner of the Kudamms

name: Stylish 3-Room, 2 Balconies, the Heart of Neukölln
description: Quiet, stylish apartment with two balconies.

name: Vibrant pad in the heart of BLN
description:
Neukölln is not the middle of Berlin but it is the beating heart. Come stay in our playful plant-filled apartment in the most exciting neighbourhood. Close to good public transport and all the cultural options you could ever want.

We have a large outdoor area those warm summer nights before you head out the door to explore Späti culture or dance until daybreak.

The building is in a very vibrant and culturally diverse neigbourhood, but our apartment is off the street so it's quiet

name: Bright & Calm Studio in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
Charming studio in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg

- Bright and quiet studio in the back house

- Fully equipped kitchen, bathroom

- Central location right by the popular Helmholtzkiez

- Excellent public transport connections (bus, S-Bahn, tram)

- Versatile shopping

- Top cafes, bars and restaurants in the immediate vicinity

- Park right outside the front door

name: Lichtdurchflutetes Dachgeschoss, beste Anbindung
description: Stylish attic apartment for the whole family in a prime location. Large living room, nice kitchen with good coffee maker, two terraces, children's room and all this in a very nice neighborhood.  Weekly market, nice restaurants and grocery stores right outside the door. Very good transport connection by S-Bahn (suburban train), U-Bahn (subway), bus. The apartment is located on 4th floor without elevator.

name: Lovely Apartment in Kreuzberg/Mitte
description:
Welcome to my home✨
A save space where you can also feel like home or even better. Everything is decorated and created thoughtfully and with love💛

You will have a bathtube to bath and a shower with a filterhead to ensure the best water quality for your skin.

I also have a cute balcony to relax and get some sun✨

Aaaand my location is super central and everything is easy to reach with public transportation🫶🏻

name: Shipotel Western Wohnung mit Ensuite und Balkon
description:
Sleep on the waves of the Berlin Spree in a house boat apartment.
A large open apartment with kitchen area, sleeping area, living room, toilet and shower, and balcony.

name: Wunderbares Loft im Prenzl Berg
description: Spacious loft in the middle of Berlin. Quiet location with large garden. Shopping, restaurants, cafes right outside the front door. A large park is also a 10-minute walk away. Public transportation is 5 minutes away.

name: Modern & bright oasis in the heart of Bergmannkiez
description:
An airy yet cozy, apartment in the heart of Bergmann Kiez.
Spacious bedroom and a cozy living room come plus a beautiful, fully-equipped kitchen featuring all Miele appliances. A gorgeous balcony is sunlit from noon to early evening! The bathroom has a bathtub and brand new washer and dryer.
The house is full of old Berlin charm and hosts a top-notch coffee shop on the ground floor. Across the street is an indoor deli & farmers market. Tons of cafes, bars, shops & restaurants just steps away.

name: Schöne Altbauwohnung in Neukölln mit Balkon
description:
Our apartment is a spacious, classic old Berlin apartment. You have a dining and study room with balcony, a nice living room, a cozy bedroom, a kitchen and a bathroom at your disposal. The apartment is fully equipped with washing machine, dishwasher, bathtub, wifi etc.
The apartment is located right in the heart of Neukölln. Shops, bars and cafes are all within walking distance.

name: Oldschool cozy flat in Kreuzberg
description:
Creative beautiful apartment in the best part of Kreuzberg, located between the Görlitzer Park and Maybachufer (canal).
Altbau (old construction), high ceilings and plenty of room.

name: Spacious, modern apartment in Mitte-Kreuzberg
description: The apartment is very spacious and bright. The neighbourhood is quite and nice. You don't have to worry about your sleep after eventful days in Berlin. You will have everything you need close to the apartment.

name: Fischerhaus Berlin - Schmöckwitz am See
description:
The fisherman's house from 1860 is located in Berlin's south on the river Dahme, or Zeuthener See. Surrounded by nature with easy access to public transport, the prefect place for rest and city holidays.
The house has been completely renovated in the last years. The fully equipped attic apartment with the parking space and front yard is available to you.
In addition to the comfortable living room, the spacious bedroom, each with smart TV and surround system, we offer bathroom with shower/ bathtub as well as a top kitchen.

name: Bedroom in nice penthouse.
description:
The flat is right beside Wedding. It's between Osloer strasse and Franz-Neumanplatz stops on the U-8. The U-9 also begins at Osoler strasse, and it's a 3 minute walk to the M-13 and M-50 trams.

The flat is quiet, and very bright.

You'll be staying with the lovely Iwona. There was once a cat in the flat, but there is no longer.

name: Sunny spacious apartment
description:
Charming personal apartment full of light and vintage furniture, recently renovated. Spacious living and dining area, cosy bathroom with big tub and a shower. Comfortable bed in large master bedroom, plus convertible sofa sleeping two in second bedroom.
Altogether 136 squaremeters.
Central Berlin neighborhood with lots of restaurants, cafes, market, all kind of shops. Apartment in a quiet sidestreet. 4 minutes walk to underground station and buses.

name: 74 m2, beautiful, sunny flat in Kreuzkölln
description: My 74 m2 apartment is located in the middle of the beautiful Weserkiez near the town hall Neukölln U7, Hermannplatz U8, Fuldastraße M41. I live here with my two small daughters. The apartment is bright and friendly. The kitchen is very well-equipped and has a balcony. It is important to me that quiet hours are observed and that no further visit is brought with me without consultation. My favorite are couples or young families who treat my apartment like their own.

name: Bright apt well-located in central Neukölln
description:
The flat has two bedrooms and an open plan living room/kitchen. Only one of the rooms is available for guests, but there is also a double fold out bed in the living room.

2mins from Rathaus Neukölln Ubahn station and 5 minutes from Boddinstraße Ubahn.

Neighbourhood
Busy and lively neighbourhood, with lots of great bars and restaurants. Halfway between Schillerkiez and Weserstraße. This isn't really a place for people looking for a quite stay!

name: Huge Room in the Heart of Berlin Mitte (Jan 2024)
description: The free room is fully furnished and perfect for 1 person or a couple. The spacious apartment is in a lively location in Berlin Mitte, very central.

name: Huge modern apartment, comfortable, well-connected
description: Located on the 2nd floor of a 3-level newly built complex, this apartment has the size and feel of a house. Surrounded by nature our living room has floor-to-ceiling windows that show off an open yard filled with trees and greenery that make you feel like you are deep in the wilderness. The large trees provide shade and privacy, you wouldn't believe you're only a short walk from one of Berlin's busiest and most popular areas.

name: Überlasse Hotelzimmer2-3 Nächte
description:
Hi,
i leave my hotel room in central The Circus Living Berlin, only 2 - 3 nights on weekends. Fresh bed linen and towels are provided.
Located on the 8th floor with a view of the beautiful Spree.
No receipt possible!
70€ per night



Kind regards,
Alexandra V.

First name and Last name: Vulcu Ioana Alexandra
Contact address: Am Isarkanal 24, 81379, München , Bayern
Listing address: Krautstraße 30, 10243, Berlin , Berlin

name: Cosy & spacious room in the heart of Neukölln
description:
Located in a side street with a view into the green, the quiet flat is only a 5-minute walk from Tempelhofer Feld and the vibrant Schillerkiez.

All your heart desires is close: Great bars, a great variety of restaurants, connections to public transport at the Ringbahn with also a direct connection to BER airport.

My lovely housemates can help you with everything you need! Feel home!

name: Nice room in a cool apartment - close to Alex
description: My place is close to Alexander Platz. You’ll love my place because of its quiet and still city centre. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

name: Playful, Loft-ish Family Apartment!
description:
All you need for a lovely stay in Berlin!

Just 5 minutes away from the hotspots of Neukölln!

Comes with a full-feature kitchen, a bathroom with bathtub and a washer-dryer, and a bright, spacious living room with hifi and a swing!

:)

name: private room in shared flat
description: approx. 23 sqm large room with large bed and couch (here a 3rd person could sleep for 10€/night extra); 7min to the public train station S-Gesundbrunnen; Kaufland can also be reached in 5 minutes on foot

name: Little doll's house apartment
description:
My apartment is in Berlin-Wedding, a nice area nearby the canal and close to the Ring-Bahn. There are plenty of bars and restaurants to discover. You can take the bus 142 and have a tiny sightseeing tour and pass the central station, Berlin-Mitte and in the end take photographs from the East Side Gallery!
Sidenotes: I just moved in the flat, so there are still many moving boxes in the living room but they are stacked. You will also hear the church from time to time. Smoking only on the balcony.

name: Willkommen im Schillerkiez
description:
The apartment is in a quiet old building, you will find all kinds of beautiful coffees, restaurant and 2 m away on foot is Tempelhofer Feld, which is a very special place!
The apartment has plenty of storage space and offers space and tranquility, perfect for a couple visiting Berlin.
Of course, linens and towels are included in the price.
We live in the building ourselves, very much appreciate our neighbors, so no parties are allowed. Unfortunately, we cannot allow pets. This is a non-smoking apartment.

name: Tolle Wohnung in Pankow mit Kater
description: You want to get to know Berlin with your partner and feel at home? This is your chance! We are on vacation for a few days and rent out our apartment so our beloved hangover can stay in his familiar surroundings. It is a 3-room apartment in the center of Pankow. You are excellently connected to public transportation and have all the necessities of daily use in front of the door. Does that sound interesting? Then let me know :)

name: Bright, cosy room in Friedrichshain
description:
My place is close to the Berghain, Boxhagener Platz and Ostbahnhof.

The apartment itself is very lighted, modernly renovated and well appointed. We have a super equipped cuisine. 5 minutes walk from Karl Marx Allee and the Berghain, an S-Bahn station to Warschauer Straße and the Boxikiez with tons of great restaurants and bars

name: Appartement au style industriel dans le Ring
description: Ideally located near the green Richardplatz, this industrial-style apartment mixes vintage decor and modern amenities. With a king-size bed, and a desk, it accommodates up to 4 people. Enjoy a video projector with Netflix and YouTube for memorable movie nights. Only 5 min from the S-Bahn and 10 min from the metro, it is ideal for tourists and professionals. Coffee beans and bottle of wine offered upon arrival for a memorable stay.

name: Gemütliche Wohnung in Kreuzberg
description:
A great old apartment in Kreuzberg!
With almost 4 meter high ceilings, beautiful stucco and a fully equipped kitchen (dishwasher, washing machine, coffee maker), cozy living room with projector & Apple TV as well as large bathtub and balcony.
The Schönleinstraße subway station is a 1-minute walk away.
The surrounding Gräfekiez is one of the most lively and popular districts in Berlin, with numerous cafes, bars, restaurants, boutiques and supermarkets.

name: Cosy appartement (near Kreuzberg)
description: We sublet our comfortable apartment.  It's a cosy and quiet flat, fully furnished, with two separated rooms with great connection to public transport, shopping and nightlife.

Exclusive loft 52 m2. (long term rent only - residential purpose)
Modern furnished.

single room apartment with double bed (180x200), wardrobe, Plasma TV, Dolby surround system Wi-Fi & high-speed internet included . Living-dining area with large leather sofa bed, dining table, open kitchen. Bathroom with bathtub.

description:
Hello dear people.
I am renting my room for a short period of time. It is a big room in a great apartment with a lot of space. You will share the flat with another person. For cooking, you can use the kitchen. The flat is situated in a lively area of Berlin Mitte with a lot of bars, cafes and shopping possibilities. You are also well connected to the U8, which brings you to Kreuzberg, Neukölln or Wedding.
If you have any further questions, just ask me.

Our charming Marlin is a 1920s replica and a special experience for your holiday on the water.

Furnishings

• 2 outdoor areas; sun and rain protection roof available
• Cozy salon inside
• Small fine kitchen, equipped including coffee machine, gas cooker, oven, microwave
• 3 bedrooms for 6 persons
• Dishes and glasses
• Heating, electricity

The MARLIN can only be driven with trained staff.

name: beautiful and quiet Altbau apartment!
description:
Beautiful and quiet Altbau apartment, tucked away in a peaceful back house while still being within easy reach of the vibrant energy of Neukölln and the surrounding neighbourhoods.
Inside the apartment, you'll find everything you need for a pleasant stay, including a fully-equipped kitchen, cozy bedding, and a comfortable living area. It's a great base from which to explore the city and make the most of your time in Berlin.
There is free parking on some of the streets surrounding the apartment!

name: PrenzlauerBerg Family Design Apt
description:
Have fun with the whole family at this beautiful design-oriented but child-friendly apartment!

This 70 sq. meter apartment is our home (mom, dad & son). The master bedroom is spacious with access to our balcony and a workstation. The second bedroom is versatile, and can accommodate an older child (double bed) or baby (pack-n-play). Just advise, and we will set-up accordingly.

You will love the location, across from the best park in Berlin and access to several transportation lines.

name: Bright an modern maisonette in Neukölln
description:
We are offering our newly built maisonette apartment in vibrant center of Neukölln. Our place is centrally located, yet fairly quite and perfct for couples or families with kids.
Everything you my need is within short walking distance: food shopping, restaurants, bars, cinema, galeries, ...
The apartment is our normal primary residence, with two children who leave their mark.

name: Gorki Penthouse 2
description:
At Gorki, you're not just a guest - you're part of the neighborhood, living the authentic Berliner lifestyle. Equipped with your own doorbell and personal mailbox, your stay will feel like you're a long-time local. The apartments are spacious and furnished with careful attention to detail, exuding an artistic flair and timeless elegance. It's not just a place to stay; it's your own slice of life in the heart of Berlin.

An additional 5% city tax tax is charged on site.

Our beautiful ground floor apartment is located directly at Treptower Park and is perfect for couples, families or as a home office space.

The nearest S-Bahn station can be reached in less than ten minutes and is on the S9 line, which takes you directly to the main train station, the airport and the city center (Friedrichstraße, Alexanderplatz).

It is a short walk from Hermannstraße S/U-Bahn station, which is connected to the U8 and the Ringbahn, so you can get anywhere comfortably. A bus stop and a supermarket are right outside the door. If you travel by car, there are many free parking options in the surrounding streets.

description: Enjoy a modern living experience in our 1-room apartment, centrally located on Innsbrucker Platz in Berlin. The area offers a variety of charming cafes, restaurants and shopping opportunities. The nearby Volkspark Wilmersdorf invites you to take relaxing walks or sporting activities. Thanks to the excellent public transport connection, you can reach Alexanderplatz and Berlin city center in a short time. Perfect, stylish and central living.

Whether you're on a city break or a longer business trip, you'll find everything you need here.

The bathroom is small but nice and equipped with bathtub (shower curtain) , toilet and sink.

name: Gemütliche Maisonette-Wohnung
description: Bright and cozy furnished duplex apartment (65 sqm, old building) with roof balcony. Only two minutes to the underground (Seestraße). Open construction on two floors, therefore suitable for 1-4 people who are familiar with each other.

name: Cozy room in Miete Berlin
description:
Conveniently located in Mitte, our modern apartment suits guests who need fast access to all Berlin has to offer, as well as a quiet, comfortable place to rest their feet at night. 3 minute walk from transport hubs, restaurants and bike rentals.

We

name: Cosy & Artistic Berlin Apartment
description:
Enjoy staying in my lovely apartment in Neuköllns best area Neukölln Hermannplatz.

Around my apartment you'll find the cutest restaurants and Bars.
It is really the perfect location if you want to explore Kreuzberg/Neukölln.

Since I am a designer and care a lot about interior, my apartment is nicely furnished and will provide everything you need for spending a great and comfortable time in Neukölln.

name: großes Zimmer direkt am Park / big room at park
description:
The old apartment is 5 minutes from the S-Bahn and a 10-minute walk from Kreuzberg, Neukölln and Friedrichshain with many bars, shops and cafes. The room is large with views of beautiful Treptower Park near the Spree.

The typical Berlin flat is located only 5 min from the metro station and 10 min walking distance to the neighborhoods Kreuzberg, Neukölln and Friedrichshain with lots of bars, cafés and shops. The room is very big, with view to a nice park, close to the river Spree.

name: Blueground | Kreuzberg, Totally Furnished
description: Discover the best of Berlin, with this one bedroom apartment in Kreuzberg. . It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this airy Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, sophisticated living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (ID #BER286)

name: Beautiful room in spacious and central appartment
description:
The room is located in a beautiful and spacious appartment. It has a double mattress for up to two people.
The appartment is in a very central location, between the districts of Schöneberg, Kreuzberg and Mitte, only a two minutes walk from the metro station.

name: Single  room in Tempelhof
description:
Hey guys !!
Who need a room from 18th - 28th juli in center of Tempelhof ? I will be not in Berlin in this time , thats way I rent fully furnitured room . Its 1min from U-bahn , 3min from S-bahn Tempelhof. Please write me PM if you are interested .

name: Private room in exclusive apartment
description: 180sqm Altbau, 6.5 rooms, 2 balconies and a wintergarten, hardwood floors, meditation/yoga room and office. There is a 3,5m wide movie screen with 3D projector in the living room, and a big kitchen.

name: Big room between Kreuzberg-Neukölln-Friedrichshain
description:
A large room with a comfy single bed, working desk and space to relax in a beautiful flat located in Alt-Treptow, a quiet and green area at the heart of the Kreuzberg, Neukölln and Friedrichshain neighborhood triangle.

Hi! I'm Néstor (37 years old) and I rent a room in my place to travelers. It's a private, 3 x 6 m room and you would also have access to the kitchen, living room and bathroom. Let me know if you have any question :)

name: 2 Zimmer Wohnung in Neukölln
description: Two rooms, a large living room with a balcony facing the street, one smaller bedroom facing the backyard. We live here as a couple. Bathroom and kitchen are small but okay, location is great, Spätis, shopping, subway, S-Bahn everything outside the door.

name: Bright, cozy Room with Balcony in Neukoelln
description:
Cozy, bright Room with beautiful balcony in the heart of Neukoelln - One of Berlins multicultural Trend-Spots. Everything you'll need in walking distance.
Best turkish, italian and vietnamese food in the City ;)
Be aware: its a fourth floor Apartment with no lift.

name: 10 min to Alexanderplatz, 5 min to Simon-Dach-Kiez
description: My place is close to the subway, supermarket, späti. You'll love my place because of the light. My place is nice for couples and solo adventurers.

name: Zimmer in Traumwohnung
description: The room has a mattress (without bed frame) shelf, desk and closet, has wonderful stucco on the wall and is quiet (towards the courtyard). The apartment has a total of 240 sqm, of which are 2 large common areas, dining room and living room.

name: Sunny room in spacious flat #3
description:
I'm renting my 18 m² room in a flat share with a big kitchen, while I'm in holidays.

It's located in Neukölln next to the beautiful Richardplatz.

name: large room in Mitte, *central

beautiful room with a big couch in three room apartment in Wedding
* 5 minutes walk to U Amrumerstr.
*7 minutes walk to S/U Wedding

name: Huge bright old Berlin apartment with balcony
description: A huge beautiful old Berlin apartment with floor boards, large windows, a small balcony, vintage couch and great location.  The space is perfect for artists, musicians and yogis needing a large room.

name: Gemütliches Zimmer nahe der Spree
description: Beutiful room next to the Spree river

name: Wunderschöne Wohnung lässt keine Wünsche offen!
description: Arrive and feel comfortable. Whether alone or two of you. A charming new apartment in the attic. Perfect for relaxing. The apartment leaves nothing to be desired! From the 33 sqm roof terrace, the fully equipped kitchen-living room to the bathroom with washing machine. Everything you need. Quiet and green located at the science center Adlershof. The tram is 5 minutes away and also takes you to the S train station Adlershof in 5 minutes, from there you can discover Berlin.

name: Ruhige naturgelegene Zimmer in EFH, 20 min Zentrum
description:
This large room is situated on a single-family house in the basement. The room is equipped with three single beds and an extra bed, leather couch and armchairs, a table with chairs, clothes closet, shelf and fridge. Bathroom is located right next door, equipped with a large shower and toilet.
Small kitchen allows preparation of simple meals.

name: Carinas cozy flat in central Berlin
description:
Our flat is located in Berlin center just 5 minutes away from both metro (U9) and train (Circle Line), which will bring you in just 10 minutes to famous Ku'Damm or Zoo. The flat is in a backyard of a calm street, so you'll find some rest of the exciting city life outside. The flat is light and cozy with a comfy, big couch and large bookshelfs.
Everything else you need for a carefree holiday is there: a comfortable bed, washing machine, dryer, fully equipped kitchen and a computer for guests.

name: Cozy Room in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
Cozy room in my apartment located in Prenzlauer Berg.

The apartment has a full equipped kitchen, washing machine and even a piano and Mario Kart to offer.

It's a 3 minute walk to the closest tram, and less than 10 minutes to the S-Bahn (Ringbahn). Supermarkets, bakeries, restaurants and cafés are near-by.

It takes about 15 minutes to Alexanderplatz and about half an hour to Potsdamer Platz.

name: 25 qm Zimmer zentral mit Dachterrasse & Wohnzimmer
description: 25 square meter room (private room) in 3-room apartment (2 person apartment) with roof terrace & living room | centrally located in Berlin Mitte / Moabit | Tierhaushalt (rabbits)

name: Home Sweet Home Berlin, Bedroom in Berlin Flat
description: Our apartment is located on the 4th Floor and is an old German-Type apartment with high ceilings. We have a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with towels and soap etc. if needed! Smoking is allowed in the kitchen, as long as you open the window after to let some fresh air in! We hope you can make yourself comfortable in our home!

name: Altbau Traum in optimaler Lage
description:
From this centrally located home, you'll be in all the important places in no time.
Fast at the main train station, right at the nightlife mile Torstraße, in minutes in the gallery district with great cafes and shopping opportunities.
Ideal for the touri program, Berlin flair, the business trip.

The apartment is equipped with everything.

description:
Join an exclusive community of international entrepreneurs and live in one of our design apartments in the heart of Berlin.

The apartments are on the top two floors of the Silicon Allee startup campus, some with west-facing balconies so you will be treated to peace and quiet and beautiful sunsets over the Mitte rooftops. With an organic supermarket (Bio Company) in the building you almost never have to leave!

name: Lovely spacious place in Berlin Mitte
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located modern place. In the beautiful Berlin Mitte, boutique, bars and restaurants in the neighborhood. Central and well connected and very quite at the same time. Fully equipped kitchen, Wi-Fi, Tv and Netflix.

name: Charming & Spacious Neukölln Home
description: This is our first time airbnbing this space, but we promise it's great! The apt has one lofted bedroom, a bath, kitchen and living room. We also have a great air-mattress if needed. The neighborhood has some of the best coffee I've ever tasted within walking distance, restaurants and a great movie theater. Groceries are just around the corner and feel free to help yourselves to anything on the bar cart :) The canal is just down the street. And don't forget to take advantage of the big bathtub!

name: Zimmer mit eigenem Bad - Nähe Brandenburger Tor
description:
Legal offer with registration number: 01/AZ/012928-21

Beautiful private room in a large loft-like apartment in Berlin Mitte, right by the Reichstag, Brandenburg Gate and Central Station. The room has its own bathroom, which is exclusively for you. The room is located directly at the entrance to the apartment, the living and dining room, the kitchen and in nice weather we share the large roof terrace.

name: Large apartment in the center of Berlin
description: Spacious apartment in a central location, suitable for families, with plenty of space to spend time together.  Located in a quiet and pleasant area, close to Mauerpark. Special price for a week.

name: Sun-drenched townhouse with indoor fireplace
description:
A lovely maisonette-style townhouse, sun-drenched and bright in a green, family friendly, super quiet and almost-no-traffic-traffic area.
Enjoy your morning coffee in the sun on the wooden terrace in our small garden before taking a walk along the river.
Rent a boat, do some climbing, have wonderful food at the marina, play some pingpong or go to a children's playground with a wonderful view over the Rummelsburg bay as the sun sets – all within 5-10 minutes walk!

name: sehr grosse bunte Wohnung: hell, ruhig, zentral
description:
We offer our beautiful large old building apartment completely when we are on trips. Located in the quiet Friedenauer Kiez, you can walk to shopping, parks and restaurants.
The connection by public transport is also excellent. Bike paths and bike shops are also very close by.
Minimum rental period 14 days.

name: Great Place in Berlin Wedding available for a week
cute and cozy home surrounded by trees ♡
description:
Nice room in relaxed apartment with a super comfortable bed and view of the courtyard.

Very cozy room in calm flat with super comfy bed and view down to the inner yard.

name: Dein Zuhause in Stadtlage
description: No short-term, daily rental. * *Only* long stays.

name: Sun-drenched central penthouse
description:
Enjoy a stylish stay at this centrally-located sun-drenched, fully equipped penthouse in Schöneberg. Steps away from Akazienstrasse, this 2-bedroom loft has an open kitchen, living space, separate workspace, and stunning terrace.
- Great public transport connection (U7, S1 and buses)
- 2 bedrooms: 1 double bed & sleeping couch and a child's crib
- Kids friendly: The child room has a changing table and baby crib
- 5th floor (without elevator)
- Wifi and washing machine

name: Beautiful waterside bedroom in amazing flat
description:
Enjoy an unforgettable stay in my lovely apartment close to a charming canal in one of Berlins most vibrant neighbourhoods.
The apartment offers you a cosy base and a feeling of home during your visit to Berlin.
It is located in a lively area in the heart of Kreuzberg where you can get a glimpse of the Berlin vibe. A huge selection of restaurants, bars, vintage clothing stores, cafes, bakeries, and much more is on your doorstep.

name: Popular Schillerkiez in Neukölln
description:
My sweet little home!
Enjoy this peaceful place with its own little garden. The apartment is located in a really popular neighborhood of Neukölln.

name: BIG room in WG Neukölln
description: I'm renting out my room in my shared apartment in Neukölln. I live with 3 super nice and easy going girls. Home Environment: Artist Collective, cooking and socializing atmosphere, we speak german, Portuguese, spanish, english, but if you want your own space and do your own thing it's totally fine with us. Super close to Tempelhof!!!

name: Cozy Room
description:
Dear guests,
my beautiful and cozy room in the heart of the Greafe neighborhood is waiting for you.
You will find many nice small cafes , shops and bars around the neighborhood.
The subway is also not far away, U8 Schönleinstraße and U7 Südstern are nearby and thus you are very well connected.
You share the kitchen with my lovely roommates. However, a separate entrance is at your disposal.

name: Sunny Room in Berlin Flat
description: Welcome to the home of Luca and me (Markus). We usually share this pretty Altbau flat but when one ore both of us are not in Berlin we welcome you to our place. The flat is situated 3 min from U Bahn Pankstraße and 3 min from the litte river Panke and a park. The best thing about the flat is the spacious balcony where you will have sun the whole day. If you are a DJ or know how to, you are welcome to use my Vinyl Players and CDJs :)

name: Altbau - with a new design in Kurfurstendamm
description:
TL ₺ discount

a nice cool flat in a old style palace like building in the middle of the town.
The red carpets welcome you to the building and the ornaments on the wall gives you a historical feeling…

name: Sweet apartment - just the right spot of Berlin
description: My cosy 4-room apartment (90m2) is perfect for your trip to Berlin. It is nicely located. From here you can discover all the exciting Clubs, Bars and Restaurants that are nearby. Living here is perfect for exploring the City! I love my apartment and so will you :)

name: Centrally located with a balcony at Ostbahnhof
description: In the heart of berlin, this room is conveniently located in Friedrichshain (1 minute walk from Ostbahnhof station). The room newly renovated with a lovely balcony, is extremely spacious and quite bright all day long! Its perfect for singles!. The house has all the required amenities, including a washing machine, dishwasher, fridge, iron, etc. There are 2 rooms in the apartment totally and one of the rooms is occupied by a lovely greek couple who will be your flatmates.

name: Zimmer Top Lage, Checkpoint Charlie + Bergmannkiez
description: Very important, weekends is not a check-in. Even if available on the calendar, then only check in between Monday and Thursday. This only applies to the period between 9/11-9/23. Check-out is not affected. Please notice, there is no Check- in on weekends. Although available, still schedule your Check-in on the days between monday-thursday. Only concerns the period of 11.9-23.9. Doesn‘t concern the Check-out.

name: Oase zum Durchatmen: Familienwohnung mit Garten
description:
In the middle of the Stralau peninsula, regularly chosen as one of the best residential areas in Berlin, is our large, sunny apartment. Here it is quiet and green, the water is not far, and yet it is only a few minutes walk to the Ringbahn. It takes a few minutes by bus or bike to be in the middle of the trendy neighborhood.

We are looking for nice people, like with children who feel comfortable in our apartment. Parties not allowed, you can stay outside normally in the evening, please party elsewhere.

name: apartment im Kaskelkiez
description:
The apartment is a 3-room apartment. It has a large, bright living room, a large bathroom & kitchen, a bedroom and a small room, which is used as a children's room.

The apartment is a 3-room apartment. They have a large, bright living room, a large bathroom, a bedroom and a small room, which is used as a nursery.

name: Beautiful apartment Mitte
description: apartment right in the center of Mitte, all restaurants are around the corner, next to U Bahn and trams. Apartment has everything- hair drier, washing machine, everything you need. Also possible to use couch as extra sleeping place.

name: Cozy flat in Neukölln - ideal for singles/couples
description:
The apartment is about 60 sqm and well laid out and offers everything you need to feel comfortable all around: a large kitchen, with couch, a large living room - with dining table, bathroom with bathtub, a hallway with enough space and a balcony.

The bedroom is located to the courtyard and is therefore very quiet.

The apartment is completely available to you. In the kitchen you will find everything you'll need.

Rauchenuchen only on balcony.

name: Central apartment with view on Berlin tv tower
description:
Hey guys,

we are a couple and quite often on the way. That‘s why we want to share our beautiful flat from time to time. It has one balkony and a terrace with a lot of space to enjoy. The view on the Berlin Fernsehturm is incredible.
Besides that you are in the absolut middle of Berlin - in Kreuzberg. Every interesting city district is reachable by approx 20min. We never had such an incredible space which is centralized like this.

Hope you enjoy :-)

name: Cozy flat Schöneberg (Nollendorfplatz)
description: Charming 70 sqm flat in the heart of Schöneberg, near Nollendorfplatz. Located in a beautiful building from the early 1900s, this historic gem offers the perfect blend of old-world charm and modern comfort. Despite its central location, the flat is wonderfully quiet, thanks to the building's excellent construction. Enjoy the vibrancy of Berlin by day and unwind in peaceful surroundings at night.

name: Berlins grüne Seite. Wohlfühlen und Entspannen.
description: Cozy two bedroom apartment. Centrally located. Very good access to public transportation. Underground parking available. Located directly at the Tierpark Berlin, which is definitely worth a visit.

name: Stylish Berlin loft in Kreuzberg
description:
Our 150 sq m place is a typical Berlin style loft in an old factory quietly situated in a backyard.

It's situated in bustling Kreuzberg. It gives you a feeling of freedom, not only because of the liberal area but also because of the spaciousness of the apartment.
It’s a modern loft in an old factory building in the backyard.

The apartment has a huge living room with an eating area, a library and with our beloved kitchen. We have two bedrooms, two bathrooms, one office and a huge balcony.

name: Live bright&cosy in hip district
description:
💛Cosy centrally-located rooftop home, right in THE hip & lively part of Berlin-Mitte with top restaurants/bars, boutiques, art galleries, activities...

🤝 I rent out during my holidays/absence. You get the uniqueness of a real home and I ask you to treat my apartment nice and careful 😊

🛏Sleeping: there is a 140x200cm mattress for two people + option for third person to sleep on the comfy couch (or additional short mattress).

🎹Feel free to play my e-piano!

/Note: 5th floor, no elevator

name: spacious room in an old building
description:
It is my private room. I let it for those days because I'm traveling and don't have money for the train ticket ;) I hope that you can feel at home there, too. Most of my stuff will be accommodated in the rooms of M. and F. so that you can spread your belongings as you please. Reinickendorf is not directly in the center of Berlin, but you can reach the main station in 28 min ;)
There are 3 supermarkets round the corner and a lake (20 min walk).
Wir sprechen auch deutsch.

cozy attic apartment 100 sqm

I let my small apartment during my travels and if I would find some nice gusts who would feel comfortable and home as I do I will be very happy :)
The wooden floorboards and warm colours create a comfortable atmosphere and the street I live in is fairly calm but you can reach the vivid area of Kreuzkölln in 5 - 10 Minutes with the public transportation.

description: The room is a approx. 20 sqm., has a double bed, a single mattress, shelves for your clothes, a big table, a sofa and a window with a view on trees and a soccer field. The bathroom is clean and well equipped. The same goes for the kitchen, which is a cosy place to cook and relax during meals. The flat is located in pre-gentrified Wedding, less than 1 min walking distance from the subway stop, 12 min to Friedrichstrasse.

name: relaxing sunny room in amazing Neukolln
description: beautiful room, great location- between stations Sonnenallee/Hermanplatz; Rathaus Neukolln+ Karl marx str. are about 7 min walk. Plenty of bars, cafes and shops all around :) the apartment is fully renovated, the kitchen is completely new +dishwasher ;)

description:
Cozy little oasis in the beautiful Rixdorf - right next to Richardplatz. Historic complex with village charm, right in the middle of lively Neukölln. Numerous restaurants, bars, club around the corner
I have just moved in, so not everything has been coordinated with each other in detail, but that should not detract from the comfort: fully equipped, open kitchen, a very comfortable, large (180x200cm) mattress, bathtub, Wi-Fi, etc.

name: Gemütliches Zimmer/ cosy room in Friedrichshain
description:
Well connected, quiet apartment (S-Bahn and tram), room with small balcony. Only 20 minutes to Kreuzberg, to Alex..
Apartment is central but quiet, nice room with a small balcony. You reach Kreuzberg or Alexanderplatz in 20min...

name: Lovely room in Berlin-neukölln
description:
Perfect stay if you want to enjoy the vibrant district of Neukölln. The district offers lots of pubs, (vegetarian) restaurants, rooftop bars, and lovely boutiques in the street next to ours (weserstrasse).

Your room is quiet and has a comfortable double bed.

Many public transport in only 5 minutes walking distance (U7, U8, M41, S42).

I am from Berlin and therefore I'll gladly give some information about the city and surrounding.

Looking forward to hosting you!

Best,

name: Sunny Altbau-Flat in Baumschulenweg
description: Modern apartment in a quiet area close to Treptower Park and its famous abandoned theme park Spreepark. Good transport connectivity (S-Bahn, buses). Well-equipped to make your stay enjoyable. Perfect for couples or even 3 people. Herzlich willkommen!

name: Wonderful altbau room
description: Our spare room is located between Mitte and the hip Wedding district. It is right in the middle of Gesundbrunnen, which means the moment you leave the appartment you are in the hustle and bustle of one of most mutlicultural places on Earth.

description:
Lovely little apartment in Berlin Schöneberg (Friedenau) not far from Schlossstraße. All shopping facilities, as well as subway and S-Bahn are nearby. Perfect for singles or a couple.
Enchanting balcony with great view. Freshly renovated bathroom with bathtub. From the kitchen to the washing machine and Wi-Fi, everything you need. The apartment has a bedroom and a sofa bed in the living room.

I rent my apartment when I am away for a longer period of time for work reasons.

name: Cozy Jungle room 🌴close to main train station❤️
description: Welcome to Berlin and to your cozy room in a shared flat, with double bed, balcony and many plants. It is just 5 min by bus from central station or 15 min by walking. It is not touristic, but here the real Berlin is happening in a coming and trending area, that develops quickly. Have the authentic experience of living together with locals, who can give you tips and advice. And many touristic parts of the city are not far.

name: Verzaubertes Zimmer in Baumschulenweg

I offer my beautiful and cozy room. You have a cozy bed and enchanted chill corner. The whole house is adorned with souvenirs of my travels and if you are lucky, my Afghan roommate will delight you with treats :)
The room is for a single person only

The room is quite nice and cozy, you will live in a shared apartment with 3 other girls. You have your own room with a balcony but you will share the kitchen & bathroom.

Supermarkets and also the U-bahn is really close, it's 7mins by walking. For example Alexanderplatz is only 8mins with Ubahn, so we are really close to the centre.

If there are any questions, feel free to contact me anytime!

name: Berlin Metropolitan Apartment
description: Manhatten style with high-end materials and furniture.  Central Mitte location but still quiet.  Sunny with balcony.  Plenty of shopping and restaurants in walking distance.  U Bahn 300 meters.

charming spacious West Berlin home

name: Cute room at Kottbusser Tor
description: Renting out my cute 15 square meter room in  a two room flat located on a side street two minutes by feet from Kottbusser Tor ubhan station and two minutes away from the canal! Easy one of the best location you can get in Berlin!

name: Tidy room in a nice location
description:
Tidy room in a quiet apartment in Neukölln. The bed is 160*200. You will be sharing with me (Joe) but I am not around a lot. It's a nice neighourhood (lots of great parks, bars and restaurants). easy to get everywhere in the city, and 25 mins on the train to the airport.

I'll be happy to advise on things to do :)

Rose

description: For those seeking a quiet place to sleep in the lively metropolis. Directly 2 minutes walk to the Ku'damm. Great transport links (U-Bahn, S-Bahn and buses) and places of shopping.
