U-Bhf Konstanzer Straße and Adenauer Platz, S-Bhf Hohenzollerndamm and bus stops are about 5 minutes from the apartment

name: Urlaub in Schöneberg/ Tiergarten
description:
You will live in a nice shared apartment with very open people.
Our shared apartment is only 10 minutes from the Brandenburg Gate and and also the Gleisdreieckspark is only 5 minutes from here, where there are various connections to go everywhere. During the day we all travel a lot, but in the evening we occasionally find ourselves together to have dinner together.

name: Room in spacious apartment in Friedenau
Amazing Apartment Centrally Located In Berlin
description:
Amazing ground floor studio apartment in the centre of Berlin (Mitte), Located right next to S-Bahn station and Tram stop Oranienburger Straße.

5-10mins walk to Friedrichstraße station

Apartment has 2 beds (1 double and 1 single) however the sofa is a sofa bed which can be opened to make another double bed.

name: Sehr schöne Ein-Zimmer-Wohnung in Berlin-Marzahn.  Komplett möbliert, sehr ruhige Lage. Die Wohnung ist sonnig, ausgestattet mit Doppelbett, Wannenbad, Waschmaschine, Radio, Mikrowelle, Kabel TV, Geschirr, Besteck, Handtücher und Fön.
description: furnished, new building, 12 floor with elevator, beautiful views, beautiful green bottle, playgrounds, bright, sunny.

name: Apartment in der Nähe KaDeWe
description: A beautiful apartment in the rent of Berlin West. The apartment is located in a luxury house ( new building) and is 400 meters away from the KaDeWe and Kudamm.

name: Nature in Berlin
description:
This lovely little apartment is cosy and has a very big garden in which you can rest after a day of busy city. It is our home and we hope that it feels like home to you as well.

The apartment is not shared, except that our roommates use our washing machine. But if you close the door of the room, you wont be disturbed.

name: Penthouse Wohnung an der Spree
description: This beautiful penthouse apartment is located right between Mitte and Kreuzberg on the Spree. With a glass balcony all around the apartment and the 50 sqm roof terrace with a heatable hot tub, you have the perfect view over Berlin.

name: Charmante 1-Zi. Wohnung im Wedding
description:
My small cozy 1-room apartment with balcony in the heart of the Wedding district is great as a place to stay for two people. The apartment is well connected; with the U6 you drive 10 minutes to Friedrichstraße. In the neighbor, numerous shopping possibilities are within walking distance.
Its location in the back house, the apartment offers a quiet retreat. If necessary, up to a maximum of 4 persons can be accommodated thanks to a guest double bed.

name: Lebendiger Kiez und Ruhe zu gleich
description:
The apartment is located on the 4th floor of an Art Nouveau house and was extensively renovated 2 years ago. It is sunny, very quiet and 5 minutes away from Lietzensee.
Many cafes, bars and restaurants are also very close by on the popular square of Stuttgart. Public transport is within walking distance and Tegel Airport can be reached in 10 minutes by taxi.

name: Mini-Apartment am Lietzensee
description:
Mini apartment with private balcony
Perfect for fair guests

name: nice room in cozy flat
description: small room (14m2) in nice and cozy flat; the bed is for two people (1,40cmx2,00)

name: Spacious room in modern Berlin apartment (DE/EN)
description: Our lovely flat provides everything you need for a wonderful weekend in Berlin. The kitchen as well as the bathroom are very modern and well-equipped with all necessary tools.

name: Bright, cosy, large room in Prenzlauer Berg
description: Beautiful room in Prenzlauer Berg Altbau in a shared apartment with another girl.

name: Studio im Fhain
description:
I have a studio in the beautiful Friedrichshain, which I would like to rent out temporarily. It is located in the backyard, ground floor, in a small side street that departs from Petersburger Straße.
TV, WiFi, washing machine and dryer is available. 2 minutes from the next M10 tram stop (Straßmannstraße)!

name: Lightful, flat in Neukölln 75 qm with balcony
description:
Due to a holiday trip, we rent our beautiful flat in the heart of Neukölln. One of the most popular and colorful districts in Berlin. In the very neighborhood you find a lot of nice restauants, bars, cafés... The "Körner park" ist just 3 minutes walk away.
Because of the perfect public transport connection you can easily explore Berlin.
- Train station (Hermannstr.) is just 7 minutes walk away
- Train station (Leinestr.) only 2 minutes
However, it's still very quiet.

name: Möblierte Neubau WHG - 3 Monate
description: Furnished, modernly furnished 3-room new apartment for rent from now for up to 3 months, extension may be possible. Very quiet location in Berlin/Lankwitz, great S-Bahn connection and bus stop on the doorstep. Park for walking right next to. Best amenities, new furniture, great balcony, new kitchen with dishwasher and oven. Wi-Fi/high speed internet, TV with sound system, new bathroom with rainwater shower and glass wall, private washing machine. Elevator available, underground parking optional.

name: Cosy flat in central location
description:
Cosy 1 room apartment in a quiet area near Treptower Park & Spree, close to buzzing Friedrichshain, Kreuzberg and Neukölln. The flat has a fitted kitchen with all that you need, a spacious bedroom with double bed facing a quiet courtyard and a bathroom. The apartment is on the ground floor with 3 supermarkets and bus connections around the corner and 5-10 min walk from Ostkreuz train station.

Walking distance to East Side Gallery and great restaurant, bars and clubs.

name: Cozy and quite private room in Kreuzberg
description:
This cozy room is bright and quiet. You will not hear the noise from the streets. You can enjoy your relax time and read on the cozy couch inside the room. The apartment is at Kreuzberg where is many bars and restaurants. You can enjoy the beautiful and fun city!

Görlitzer park is 5min by walk, the canal is only 9min by walk! why don't you grab a beer and enjoy the late summer in Berlin!

description: The apartment is in the beautiful multicultural wedding. The subway station Osloer str. can be reached in 10 minutes, from there you can be at Alexanderplatz in about 25 minutes. Unfortunately, rental is only possible for women.

name: Cozy room in Kreuzkölln
description: Kreuzkölln, also known as Reuterkiez, is the northern part of the Neukölln neighborhood, on the border with Kreuzberg. In the past few years, the area has welcomed a wave of international creative types leading to its reputation as the hippest district in Berlin.

name: Grosszügige Altbauwohnung - 150 qm - Toplage !
description:
5 - Room apartment in Berlin - Schöneberg, 1st floor - Bel Floor. 1 balcony.
Quiet residential area, good shopping, restaurants & cafes.
Very good access to public transport. S-Bahn and bus.

name: 2-bedrooms in 120m2 Stylish rooftop apartment
description: Situated in the trendy part of Neukolln, central Berlin, this is a stylish and bright roof-top apartment with a large south facing balcony, 2 bedrooms with queen-size beds, a study with a sofa bed, 1 bathroom, kitchen and large living and dining room. Only 1 bedroom and the study room is offered for rent, the other one will be occupied by myself.

name: Vibrant yet quiet Neukölln, near parks and water
description: Hi! We are a couple who love to travel. We sincerely welcome you to our apartment! Neukölln is a lively, creative, and multinational neighborhood. Located amidst charming cafes, parks, the Spree channel and open air restaurants, our apartment is spacious, cozy, and quiet. It's perfect for singles, couples and short- or long term stays.

name: Cozy maisonette apartment
description:
This newly refurbished two-floor flat in Neukölln, near Maybachufer, is remarkably quiet yet closed to various restaurants, bars and markets.

The apartment spans 70m2 and features a kitchen, a bathroom, and a combined living and sleeping room on the first level (4th floor). The attic level (5th floor) has an open working space, a bathroom with a bathtub, and a bedroom.
It is filled with natural light, and well-suited for shared living arrangements. There is no lift.

name: Lovely, Spacious Kreuzberg Flat
description: Get comfortable and enjoy plenty of extra room at this spacious place.

name: gemütliches Zimmer mit Charme
description:
From this charming place, you can easily move in all directions of Berlin. It is a bit more familiar in the area but you are not far from the nightlife in 5 minutes.
Shopping and restaurants are nearby.

name: Beautiful room in Prenzlauerberg
description: Beautiful and spacious room in amazing location! The apartment is located in the very popular and hip district Prenzlauer Berg. Many cafés, Metro, Sky train (Eberswalder Straße) and tram stations are in the immediate vicinity. The room is quiet and comfortable. The kitchen is fully equipped. You will share the apartment with me (Marco) an Italian sound artist!

name: BOHO CITY FLAT Charlottenburg
description: This is a typical Berlin 2 bedroom flat in an old building. It’s in the backyard 2nd house on the 4th floor. It’s very quiet, full of light and has a balcony.

name: Cosy Flat with fireplace, balcony & open kitchen
description: My accommodation is near Lake Tegel. You will love my accommodation because of the view, the surroundings and the location. My accommodation is good for singles and couples.

name: Cozy apartment in Schöneberg
description: Cozy apartment in Schöneberg.

name: Room next to Berghain with mirror installation!
description: Beautiful room with mirror installation next to Berghain and Ostbanhof! Stay with amazing people near Berlin's famous nightlife!

name: Light filled room in Berlin
description: Bright room, close to public transport, in the heart of Berlin.

name: Large private room located in heart of the city
description: Bright spacious room in the heart of the city, public transport options within 5 minutes away.

name: Charming Altbau Apartment in West Berlin
description: The perfect location allows you to get to the center of West Berlin (Kurfürstendamm) in 5 min, and to Mitte in 20 min. 50 m away you have the access to the main U Bahn and S-Bahn. The area is a real Berliner Kiez with plenty of cafes and Restaraunts

name: Großes Zimmer mit WG-Charme
description: I offer a nice room in a shared flat of 3 in the wedding! Due to its location directly on S-Wollankstr, you are in no time in Mitte and can conquer Berlin. Living room and kitchen ok for use. Jana will always help you with any questions you may have! :)

name: Bright and Central 2 Room Apartment
description:
- Bright and Central 2 Room Apartment in Berlin Mitte
- Busses and Trams right outside the door, Metro in walking distance
- Central location
- Park nearby
- Bars, Restaurants & Cafés in the area

name: 65 sqm. appt. Prenzlauer Berg
description: A 65 sqm. apartment in Prenzlauer berg. There is a separate entrance, kitchen, bathroom, living room and bedroom. Closest supermarket at 200m distance. You are free to use all kitchen essentials. The apartment is very well isolated so its easy to keep it warm and cosy in winter. Bed is a very comfy boxspring bed. Extra blankets (2 large separates available). Bathroom has a bad and shower.

name: Berlin: High ceilings one room apartment
description:
35m2 one room apartment in Prenzlauer Berg.

Enjoy your stay in this quiet cosy place.
You’ll have all necessities right at the corner and the U2 is near by to bring you into the center of Berlin.

Send me a message if you need more information :)

Hello,
you are welcome to sleep in my wonderful room in Neukölln close to the Tempelhofer Feld. Feel free to use the kitchen, the bathroom and the space you have generously. There is a TV, a Hi-Fi and a console you can play on.
It is a cozy place for you in the perfect area to explore Berlin.

The spacious 73m2 apartment with balcony, is located in a beautiful location and offers you a perfect mix of comfort and modern design. A comfortable bed with high-quality mattress ensures a restful night's sleep. They have excellent access to public transport and the other districts.

description:
Large room in a cosy and young flat
In this room you will find a double bed
We are young french students, who are living in Berlin since more than 5 years
You will have your own bathroom for the entire time.

name: Beautiful old-style room in the heart of Kreuzberg
description: This is a room in a lovely old-style classic Berlin flat with wooden floors and high ceilings. The room is large and has all the furniture in the photos. The neighborhood is very beautiful with the canal and the Gorlitzer park. It also has a wide range of bars restaurants and cafes.

name: The green heart of Kreuzberg
description: Cosy and bright house in the green heart of Kreuzberg. Multicultural neighborhood, quiet, safe location, delicious restaurants and cafes round the corner, crafts shops nearby, a stone throw away from the night life epicentre. Can you ask for more? :)

name: Bright and quiet home in Weißensee/Prenzlauer Berg
description: Very quiet and cosy home with a wonderful view over the neighbourhood and Berlin.

name: WG mit 2 weiteren lieben Bewohnern!

large room in neukölln! (23 square meters)
ubahn hermannplatz and schönleinstrsraße , görli, hasenheide around the corner!

fully furnished!
for 1-2 people!

description: A spacious, sunny room on the 4th flour of a tenement, with two beds, a desk and a table. The flat has been recently renovated in high standard, with a fully equipped separate kitchen (cooker, oven, microwave) and a bathroom with a shower.

name: Lovely guestroom in the north of Prenzlauer Berg
description:
Small but nice guestroom for a journey in Berlin. The flat is located in the north of Prenzlauer Berg and is well connected to public transport (in front of the builing you will find 3 different trams M2, M13 and 12, also the station Prenzlauer Allee is 10min by foot).
You are welcome to use all common rooms: living room, balcony, bathroom & kitchen (with dishwasher, washing machine, coffee machine).
Possibility to accommodate up to 4 people (sofa bed in living room or bedroom when we are away).

name: Großzügiges Balkonzimmer am Leopoldplatz
description:
A spacious old building room with balcony facing the sun. In the apartment there is a large, recently renovated bathroom and a kitchen where everything can be used.

100 meters from Leopoldplatz/connection to U6/9, S-Bahn Wedding 10 min walk.

name: Central room-EastSideGallery +overlooking TV tower
description: A room in the heart of Berlin Friedrichshain. 2 min.s walking to the station “Ostbahnhof” and 5 min.s walking to the “East Side Galerie”. Very close to Berghain, one of the most famous clubs in the world. Through the bedroom’s window you clearly see the TV tower. Friedrichshain is famous for bars, club, restaurants, bistros and cafes. Please note that there is NO kitchen included.

name: Sublease in cozy 100m2 shared apartment
description:
Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.

I am subletting my beautiful room for about 1 month. The exact period is flexible. Shorter is also possible.
I am out traveling for the time. Of course, all the furniture stays in the room, so there is basically nothing you need to bring :)

Located in the city’s heart, this tranquil retreat offers immediate access to the central station and Mitte’s cultural hotspots. Perfect for those who love to explore by day and relax by night.

name: Bright & cozy - longterm!
description:
This flat in Prenzlauer Berg is a real gem! Quiet and light, with a view directly onto the green fields of the beautiful Arnimplatz - with a nice balcony to relax in the sun. Perfect for single or couples.
All need amenities in 2-3mins walk - with a beautiful farmers market right across the street each Saturday.
This doesn't feel like the typical rental flat - it feels like home in Berlin right away!
Special price for longterm rentals.
Feel free to get in touch upfront anytime!

name: Apartamento en Berlín. Neukölln
description: In the Neukölln district. Very close to the Hermannstraß metro line 8. Supermarkets nearby, multicultural neighborhood. Ideal for two people. Apartment with two rooms, one room is adjacent to the other, so the second room does not have a separate entrance. The main room has a king-size bed. The second room is designed as a home office, however it has a sofa bed for a third guest if necessary. The free parking area outside the ring is very close to the house just a few streets down.

name: Lovely 27qm room with balcony in Friedrichshain
description:
This lovely and spacious room is located in a beautiful area close to the vibrant heart of Friedrichshain.

Supermarkets, restaurants, shops and great connections with the public transport are super near: metro, tram & S-Bahn.
- 10 minutes from Alexanderplatz with the metro.
- 5 minutes from Boxhagener Platz (with many bars, cafes, clubs and more!) with the tram.

The room is bright, clean and cozy with everything you need, including a private balcony.

description:
Our Apartment has big windows, is clean and good for everyone who wants to spend a comfortable time in Berlin. The connection to the rest of the city is really good and the neighborhood is authentic, with a lot of good restaurants.
My flatmate Marie lives in the other room and is always open for questions and for drinking coffee.

Cafes, bars, parks, restaurants and supermarkets can be found in direct walking distance surroundings. As well as tram and S-Bahn (suburban train) stations. The apartment is perfect for families as well as young people.

name: gemütliches WG Zimmer in Berlin-Friedrichshain
description: The apartment has two rooms, a cozy kitchen and a bathroom. Since my roommate is on vacation longer, I rent out his room while he's away.

name: Moderne 1-Zimmerwohnung in Berlin Wilmersdorf
description: It's a modern furnished 1-room apartment near (5min) Bundesplatz (Ringbahn + U9). By train, you can reach the Kudamm or similar in about 10 minutes. There is also an Edeka, Aldi and bakery. A nice park is also right around the corner and a few nice restaurants and bars/pubs.

name: Big,Cozy and quiet Room in Central Berlin.
description:
The apartment is located in Wedding (part of Mitte, the central district of the city), between U-Leopoldplatz and U-Seestr. and very close to public transportation.

It's a quite large (~20qm) room with a view into the backyard, therefore rather quiet and perfect for resting.

It offers a Queen's Size bed, so ideal for 2, a TV with Netflix and enough space for your stuff. Besides that, the apartment features a fully equipped kitchen.

I will provide you with any info needed upon arrival.

name: Kreuzkölln Berlın
description: Very central  subway and bus only 50 meters away.

The highlight of our apartment is the large kitchen-living room . In addition, there is a renovated bathroom with both bathtub and shower. The flat is centrally located and surrounded by parks.

My place is close to KREUZBERG, Görlitzer Bahnhof.
Room: 30qm super sunny big Room,
For one month your Home in the heart of xberg.

One Girl from Mauritius and one German Skater Boy.
Big Kitchen, with couches and place to chill .

The Room is perfect for couples and singles.

name: Haus am See mit privatem Steg
description:
Welcome to smoke catch either the southernmost point of Berlin and a peninsula that is 90% overgrown with forest, so there is a great and quiet atmosphere.

The house has a private dock and large garden. A fire bowl for cozy evenings is available on the shore.

The house has two bedrooms, an office, two bathrooms and an open kitchen with island.

The house is fantastically located and invites you to (focused) work and relax.

Your live-like-a-local Airbnb experience in picture-perfect Prenzlauer Berg and walking distance from the city center.

Warm welcome to my cosy newly renovated apartment on a quiet street in the heart of Berlin, close to Alexander Platz, Hackesher Markt, Rosenthaler Platz and Berliner Dom.
Spacious bright apartment on the 1st floor (there’s elevator) with 1 bedroom + 1 living room connected with open kitchen, big bathroom with bathtub, large panoramic windows and a balcony facing a quiet courtyard.
Perfect for a couple, or a single person looking for a quiet place for relaxation or work. Stable high-speed Wifi.

The famous TV Tower, with its panoramic views of the city, is also within walking distance.  For cultural enthusiasts, Museum Island, housing world-class museums like Pergamon and Bode, is nearby. Discover the historic Berlin Cathedral, remnants of the Berlin Wall, and the vibrant Hackescher Markt—all close to our location.

name: Room with three flatmates
description: The apartment is in the heart of Neukölln. There are turkish supermarkets, a lot of different bars, all kinds of streetfood, a wednesday/saturday-market, parks like Lessinghöhe and Körnerpark just a few foodsteps away and the metrostation to get you to any place you want is in front of the building. We are four people living in this apartment, so you can get a good insight in Berlin, if you want. but also can just stay on your own and use the kitchen and the bathroom.

name: Zentrale, helle Wohnung in Berlin Zoo naehe KaDeWe
description: Central apartment in Berlin, 5 min walk from KaDeWe and 5 min from the zoo, 38 sqm, bright rooms, a double bed and a sofa that can be converted into a single bed, bathroom and kitchen, fully equipped, toaster, microwave and coffee machine NESPRESSO

name: Modern, fully furnished 2-room with balcony flat
description:
Located in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, the flat is close to several grocery stores (bio ones included), as well as fresh local markets on the weekends.

The 80sqm flat consists of a kitchen (separate room) fully equiped with a gas stove and washing machine for clothes. The bedroom is also equipped with a wardrobe and double bed.

In the living room, there is a dining table suited for 2, and smart TV.

The flat is situated in a peaceful and quiet neighborhood that is centrally located.

name: 134m² Three-Bedroom Apartment w/ Balcony in Mitte
description:
Luxurious Apartments in Berlin Mitte

The Circus Apartments are spacious, cosy and well located in Berlin city centre, a few steps from Rosenthalerplatz. Located in the central spot of Berlin-Mitte surrounded by stylish and trendy restaurants, bars and shops. You will stay in a 185 m2 luxurious and designed 3-bedroom Apartment, fully renovated and equipped: with a modern kitchen, a spacious living room, three comfortable bedrooms and a lovely balcony of around 26m2!

name: Stilvolles Apartment mit Terrasse / 108m2
description:
This light-flooded apartment is not only modern and lovingly furnished, but has its own balcony in each room, as well as a terrace starting from the living room.
The open fully equipped kitchen invites you to cook with a view of the living room.
Within walking distance you can reach all supermarkets, restaurants and transport connections. Alexanderplatz is only 20 minutes away by public transportation.

name: Lovely 1-Bedroom Apartment Near Berlin Ostkruez
description:
Our home is well situated, 9 mins walk to a Metro Station (Betriebsbhanof Rummelsburg) 2 stops from Berlin Ostkruez. There are different shops (Rewe for groceries, Pharmacy, a Burger shop, Italian Restaurant, and more) in the same block downstairs.

You will find the area very peaceful and relaxing, it is quite green, calm but centralized and assessable.

description:
The apartment is located 5 minutes to the S-Bahn Adlershof. From here it is about 15 minutes to the airport and 25 to downtown.
The bright apartment has three large rooms, with bath and modern kitchen Highlight is the bright living room with its high ceilings and loving furnishings. A hinged door can be used to enlarge the room to the dining room. You have access to the balcony from here.
Wi-Fi and a large 50 "TV with Netflix and Prime are at your disposal.

name: Zehlendorfer Wohnung am Park
description: This spacious apartment with a parents bedroom, children's bedroom and separate living room offers the ideal setting to get to Berlin well. It is completely newly renovated and furnished. It is fully furnished with high speed WiFi, TV and fully equipped kitchen. The apartment is the ideal starting point to live temporarily in Berlin or to arrive new in the city.

description: The KPM Hotel & Residences combines the highest level of comfort and coziness with a clear, unique design handwriting. The approximately 30-square-meter DELUXE LOUNGE ROOM convinces with modern styling and an original lounge as an additional option for retreat and relaxation. An extra special kind is the fully equipped pantry kitchen to make simple snacks or dishes. Integrated in a custom-designed wall module.

My place is close to Spreegold GmbH, Alt Wien, Gasthaus, and Hufelandstraße, places you enjoy coffee or dinner. You’ll love my place not only because of the location, the ambiance and the neighborhood, but also the people, and the outdoors space. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

kitchen / living room is open plan...very sociable.
in v desirable area

name: Stay in berlin like a local :)
description: The apartment is located in Berlins coolest district Neukölln. The area is full with bars little cafes and restaurants. You can find good food for little money on Sonnenalle it self or in the little streets near by. The Weserstrasse is a very cool insider Tip for people who want to have a drink and meet new people in a cool atmosphere. If you want to relax –Weigandufer- is not even 5 minutes by feet and a good spot to hang out and have a beer.

name: Cozy room in the heart of Wedding
description: Welcome to my flat in the heart of Wedding. Wedding is a wonderful Kiez in the North West of Berlin with an intercultural community. You will stay I my room, while I am traveling for 2 weeks.

name: Bright modern apartment for long term stay
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

I am offering my lovely apartment which will be free for 6 months starting December, the apartment is in a brand new building and has a wonderful view.

The apartment has a bedroom, a living room, open kitchen, under-floor heating, balcony looking over the Velodrom and a bathroom.

The kitchen is fully equipped (Siemens stove, oven and fridge) dishwasher, kettle, utensils & washing machine.

name: Stunning 120m² Penthouse with Terrace
description:
Escape to this serene 120m² rooftop apartment in the heart of Berlin!

Located on the 6th floor of a quiet side wing (with elevator), this tranquil retreat is my personal home, available only while I'm on holiday.

Just 10 minutes by tram from Berlin’s Central Station, a short walk to Hackescher Markt, Rosenthaler Platz, and some of the city’s best restaurants - perfect for exploring Berlin.

Relax on the private 20m² rooftop terrace, ideal for unwinding after a day of sightseeing.

name: Central flat in Friedrichshain
description: Suggestive flat in the hearth of Berlin! Beautifully furnished, comfortable and well connected: U-Bahn 5 (Weberwiese, frankfurter Tor); Tram M10/M5/M6/M8 and S-Bahn (Landsberger Allee) really close. In a cool and central area, but still very quiet.

name: Sunny Top Floor Apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
Sunny and spacious top floor apartment with with a great view and 5m high ceilings. The balcony is south facing so there will be lots of sunlight throughout the day and is the perfect place to watch the sunset.

There is a King sized bed in Bedroom 1, sofa bed in the living room, and a sofa bed in Bedroom 2.

Major attractions in the city are all less than 15 minutes away.

name: Amazing location in Treptower Park
description:
Apartment has a beautiful location inside the Treptower Park, very close to Karpfenteich.

Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, smoothie maker, washing machine.
Bathroom has a bathtub and separate shower.
One bedroom- sleeping sofa 1,40m with extra mattress

Parking space provided for free.
Garden

name: Großes und schönes Altbauzimmer in WG!
description:
We provide in a three-room apartment a 22m2 room with two pull-out sofa beds. The room has access to a small balcony, which can also be used and where smoking may also be allowed.
Due to the good connection to the U7 and U9 subway lines, Kreuzberg or Kurfuerstendamm can be reached in a few minutes.
Shopping facilities such as a LIDL or an Edeka are almost right at your doorstep.

name: 160m² 4 Bedroom Apartment Mitte w/Balcony in Mitte
description:
Come together at the 4 Bedroom Apartment, with space for all the family or groups of friends. Gather around the dining table for a special meal or on the balcony, and find the space when you need it in one of the four comfortable bedrooms.

The apartment is suitable for max. 8 adults. Children/babies beds on request.

description:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The location of the flat is perfect to explore Berlin. Lots of restaurants, bars and clubs are around the corner. Public transportation is very close.

name: Schönes Zimmer in stylischer Wohnung in Mitte
description: We are a German-French couple, both 32 and offer a cozy, bright room in our typical Berlin alpine apartment between Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. The bed can be used as a single (90x200 cm) or double bed (max 180x200 cm). Our street is very quietly located, not far from the beautiful Zion Church and many bars, restaurants, cafes and small boutiques. The center of Berlin can be wonderfully explored by foot or by bike.

name: Spacious room with park view and huge balcony!
description:
We are renting out a light, spacious, and freshly renovated room with wooden floors, big windows, a huge balcony, and a nice loft bed. The room is in a shared flat with two other rooms. There is bathroom with a big bathtub and a much appreciated, cozy but modern kitchen.

The apartment is located directly at Schillerpark! A huge park, perfect for running, having picnics or BBQs...
There is a bus (Glasgowerstrasse) and u-bahn station (Seestrasse/ Rehberge) close by.

name: Creative Couple’s Urban Nest
description:
The hustle and bustle of the big city is hardly palpable at the duplex apartment in the quiet backyard, which is located in the middle of Bergmannstraße in Kreuzberg. Surrounded by a variety of cafes, restaurants and bars, the centrally located, light-flooded accommodation is easily accessible from several public connections (U7 /U6).

We, Natalia and Jules, love living and working here as photographers and designers and warmly invite you to our stylishly furnished apartment.

name: Berlin Kreuzberg mit Spreeblick
description:
In the middle of Kreuzberg and still really quiet.
In an old building apartment with a view of the garden and large kitchen. A very cozy room with a big bed. I look forward to your visit.

name: Gemütliche Wohnung direkt am Tempelhofer Hafen
description:
The apartment is located in the immediate vicinity of Tempelhofer Port, Tempelhofer Feld, a small shopping center and the U6 with which you can be quite quickly in different places.
Since the apartment is located in the backyard, it is guaranteed for a deep sleep, on the 2 comfortable mattresses.

The apartment perfectly suited for couples, individuals or good friends.

beautiful old building apartment with Berlin charm in the heart of the city. The Szenekieze around Friedrichshain are within walking distance. Close are cafes, restaurants, art, culture. The city center can be reached in no time by direct connection to the main S-Bahn trains in Berlin (Ostkreuz 4 minutes on foot)without effort and in the shortest possible time. The apartment has everything your heart desires.
Beautiful Altbau Flat in the heart of Berlin Friedrichshain,4 min walk to Ostkreuz with all the berlin important S Bahn

description:
A newly built 2 bedroom apartment right in between Berlin Mitte and Kreuzberg . The apartment is bright with big windows and is styled with inspiration from nordic minimalism and filled with plants, to create a calm, relaxing environment.

The apartment consists of 2 bedrooms - a master-bedroom and a second guest room which that has a foldable bed. A big open living-kitchen space with a huge balcony overlooking the Berlin TV tower and the city skyline and a spacious bathroom with bathtub.

description: Top location in the most beautiful neighborhood in Berlin. Surrounded by trendy cafes, restaurants, boutiques, galleries, pop-up stores and more. And with a bright room to the backyard plus exclusive use of bathroom and kitchen, you are in the middle of it but still have your peace and quiet. Another extra: In addition to a double bed, a separate loft bed for children is available until about 8 years.

description:

description:

Since it's a flatshare apartment and the available room depends on who is away, there are two accommodation options. Both provide a comfortable stay and a dedicated workspace. The kitchen is fully equipped with all the essentials for your convenience.

Relax on the rooftop with city views or explore nearby hip places within walking distance.

name: Classy and Quiet Apartment in Prenzlauerberg
description: Have your own classy and quiet apartment in Berlin's nicest, multi-faceted district Prenzlberg with perfect public-transport connection to all areas of the city, plenty of original small stores and bars, cozy cafés, the famous Mauerpark and the best hand-made ice-cream in Berlin - all in walking distance; the apartement comes with features such as 2 bikes, a dishwasher, a crazy induction-milk frother, your own clothes rail, a working desk, a guitar, a chandelier and much more!

description: Our beautiful room overlooking the water is located on an old big ship (Güterschleppkahn) which we have been renovating for 3 years. There are also a few construction sites on the ship, not everything is ready yet. You share shower, toilet and kitchen with about 5 other parties among which are also partially real Berliners. By bus 165 you will be in 10 minutes in Kreuzberg and in 20 minutes in Berlin Mitte. The Treptower Park S-Bahn train station is a 20-minute walk away.

Shopping (East Side Mall), U-Bahn, S-Bahn, Tram, Spree, East Side Gallery, bars, restaurants and of course the Berghain is all within 5 minutes walking distance. Room has just under 25 square meters with 180x200cm bed. Fully equipped kitchen can be shared for cooking. Bathroom is located inside with a bathtub. A washing machine is also provided.

name: Neukölln
description: The apartment has four rooms, of which there are three bright bedrooms and one of a living room. The rentable room is about 22 square meters and has a small balcony. Hans (24) and Merlin (26) live in the other two rooms. Both travel a lot and therefore rarely at home.

name: Denkmalgeschütztes Ambiente der 20er Jahre
description: Surprisingly quiet living in the Prenzlauer Berg near Humannplatz in the listed ensemble of 1929, very close to outings, restaurants and shops. The bright apartment with two balconies is located on the 4th floor, is 100 square meters and has a large living area with open kitchen, a bedroom and a children's room.

name: Central stylish 2 bedroom flat with terrace
description: A fully renovated flat in the heart of Berlin. Located quite centrally and comfortable to cruise the city with public transportation. Shopping, siteseeing, colinary delights and night life are within walking distance. Including groceries.

name: Bright and beautiful old Apartment in Scandi style
description: This bright and cosy flat is situated right at the heart of Friedichshain/Boxhagenerplatz. You have a bunch of cosy cafes, bars and restaurants in the area. 80sqm, perfect for a couple, small family or group of friends. For a long weekend or for someone looking to stay a bit longer. The apartment has 1 big bedroom connected with beautiful double doors to the living room, which has a small balcony.

name: Cozy Apartment In One Of Berlins Finest Districs
description: Our cozy typical Berlin apartment is fully furnished and set up with love!  Outside your window you will find some green trees and since it's a dead end street it's quite calm. You will actually be woken up by the birds singing in front of your window. Hence located just close by Mauerpark (1min walking) , Berlin life is just in front of your door. Tram, Underground or S-Bahn are just a a couple of min walking distance away. If you like good cheap food, you are deffo right in this Neighborhood.

name: Bright apartment in Neukolln.
description: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place.

name: Urlaub in Wannsee
description:
We rent out our house during our vacation. If you feel like Berlin in the summer, are looking for a little more space with your kids, like to barbecue in the garden, have breakfast on a sun terrace and turn on the fire bowl in the evening - our home is the right place for you!

On 150 sqm living space you will find a light-flooded living room with dining area and eat-in kitchen. Rooms: 2 bathrooms, 1 bedroom with double bed, 1 room with french bed, 1 children's room with 2 beds and an office.

name: Modern Apartment next to Mauerpark(10min to Mitte)
description:
Welcome to our modern, freshly renovated Airbnb just a few steps away from Mauerpark, with superb access to public transport (and the airport).

Bedroom has a King-Size Double Bed. Optionally, two additional sleeping mattresses can be added on the floor to sleep up to 4 people.

The flat also features a new kitchen, spacious bathroom, and elevator access.
Ideal for couples on week-long trips, and just 10 mins from Berlin centre "Mitte". There is large convenient supermarket only 2 mins away.

name: Big Sauna Apartment Berlin City
description: Welcome to our unique old building apartment, only 5 min from Ku'damm. Two units offer a total of 9 sleeping places, 2 bathrooms (floor-to-ceiling showers & freestanding tub) as well as 2 kitchens. The first unit has an elevated gallery. The hallway leads to the sauna unit. The living room & sauna bathroom invite you to relax. In the back bedroom there is also a large TV & sports wall. All areas are private, only the hallway is shared with the landlords.

name: Große Dachgeschoßwohnung mit Kamin in Berlin
description:
My place is close to the subway and lots of greenery, but no parking . You'll love my place because of the peace in the middle of Berlin. My place is nice for couples, solo traveling city adventurers, business travelers, and families with children.

An area of about 130m² is available to the guests alone. The rented part consists of dining kitchen, living room, bedroom, children's room, bathroom and additional toilet.

name: Book-Filled, Leafy Apartment in Mitte
description: We've actually been hosting for years and we're Superhosts until our account sadly got hacked this year. So this marks our return to hosting! Very central, peaceful, stylish, filled with art books, our lovely home is literally a stone's throw from the Berlin Wall museum, and you can see the TV tower from the street. Surrounded by lovely cafes, restaurants, and trees, and full of lots of little nooks in which to read or rest, everyone who has stayed here has reported a very positive experience!

name: Central 2-room apartment next to the Soho House
description: This beautiful 2-room apartment is located in the immediate neighbourhood of the Soho House. In the immediate vicinity of the property you will find supermarkets, restaurants, from second-hand shops to flagship stores of top brands,  pubs to trendy bars or trendy nightclubs. Berlin's cultural centre and relaxation parks are only a few minutes' walk away.

name: Cozy room in stylish apartment in Kreuzberg
description:
I invite you to find a place of peace in the middle of Kreuzberg between Tempelhofer Feld and Hasenheide. In no time you are in the hustle and bustle, at the main attractions and simply in the best neighborhood in the city.
---
I invite you to find a place of peace in the middle of Kreuzberg, between Tempelhofer Feld and Hasenheide. In no time you are in the hustle and bustle, at the most important sights and simply in the best neighborhood of the city.

name: Spacious & lofty 90 sq m apartment
description:
Amazing apartment in the heart of Berlin on a quiet side street. Two minutes walk to Mauerpark and ten minutes walk into the centre. Lot's of restaurants and coffee shops within walking distance.

Large open plan kitchen / dining area. Bedroom with king size bed, 1.8x2m. Separate living room that can also be used as a bedroom, we have two single beds that can be left in the room if required.

We speak English, German and Spanish so feel free to write in these languages !

Itxaso & Seamus

It is modern and newly furnished and includes everything that is necessary for your move to Berlin: WiFi, a fully equipped kitchenette with hotplates, stove, refrigerator, Nespresso machine, dishes and kitchen utensils, a living room with sofabed and TV, a bedroom with cosy bed, a bathroom with shower.
The apartment is on the ground floor, facing the backyard garden.

description:
Hallo,
explore Berlin for a few days or do a work-away in the capital? Be my guest! The apartment can accommodate up to 4 people and is fully equipped. The walking airport lake offers cooling in summer & space for walks in winter away from the hustle and bustle of the big city. With the U6 you are in 15 minutes on Friedrichstraße or by car quickly on the city highway. Welcome!

description: Join us in a spacious and perfectly located rooftop penthouse overlooking Neukölln in walking distance to beautiful Landwehrkanal and buzzing Weserstraße, one of Berlin's favorite hangouts. You are living in a 200 square meter Loft with a 80 square meter living room. Your private room is very stylish, we got 2 bathrooms, 2 balconies with lots of sun, and 2 great flat mates - all you need :)

name: Sehr schöne Maisonette Wohnung in Berlin Mitte
description:
This stylish duplex apartment is a perfect fit for families. The apartment is 155sqm and consists of a ground floor and 1st floor.
On the ground floor is the living/dining area with kitchen, a bathroom with shower and toilet as well as a bedroom. Also, apartment has a very nice terrace with attached small garden. On the 1st floor there is the living room as well as a study with balcony, three bedrooms currently used as a children's room and a bathroom with shower and toilet.

name: Bijou Apartment
description: Enjoy exploring Berlin from a base in a quiet neighbourhood with groceries, restaurants, cafes as well as the lovely Lietzensee lake and park  in walking distance,  stops for public transport (metro, underground and bus)  just round the corner, connecting to all parts of Berlin.

The Circus Hotel offers you uniqueness, design, and intimacy in the heart of Berlin Mitte. The professional designer team of The Circus Hotel is committed to surprising you right from the moment you get into the hotel. Personalization is part of The Circus Berlin Hotel’s DNA. The Circus Hotel Berlin Mitte is the best place to feel at home away from home.
Stay with us and discover the "Lost my Voice" cocktail bar, the cosy lounge, the peaceful courtyard and the amazing rooftop!

In My Workshop & Studio I have prepared a small bedchamber for you and have made part of it so comfortable that you have a great place to retreat to after exciting Berlin adventures and discoveries while I am away.
Marvel at what you can make from wool, wooden boxes, flotsam, oysters, corks...

description:
In the heart of Berlin between Rosenthaler Platz and Rosa-Luxemburg-Platz, within an area of trendy nightlife with a vivid food scene: that is where you find my appartment.
It looks better than on the pictures, has more amenities than listed, and is habitated by my flatmate (25years old, male, pianist) and me. I travel sometimes for shorter or longer periods and will make my room available for you. Brompton bicycle included: it would save you 15 Euros daily rental fee.

Bright, newly renovated apartment with balcony in Berlin-Steglitz - for EXCLUSIVE USE!! Bathroom, kitchen, and the living room with east-facing balcony can be used. The apartment is equipped with high-speed Wi-Fi and is therefore also ideal for working. On the pull-out coach with a size of 1.40x2m, it sleeps amazingly well. A washing machine is also available.

The apartment is a 5-minute walk from the Feuerbachstraße S-Bahn (suburban train) station, with easy access to the city center.

name: Best area, spacious & bright flat with two cats
description: Welcome to my typical Berlin apartment in the heart of Berlin. It has two large and bright rooms, a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with bathtub. A TV with Netflix and Amazon (you will hopefully not use it as you are busy exploring this fantastic city). It will be accompanied by two fluffy cats. They love cuddling and are happy about new people who need food twice a day.

description:
Sunny, central and spacious 67 sqm flat in Karl-Marx-Allee (Friedrichshain). 5th floor, elevator, high ceilings, all rooms south facing with nice views. Balcony. Fully equipped. Newly renovated.
This flat is available for a fixed term of 3-12 months.
Perfect public transport connection. Underground directly in front of the house (13 min to main station, 5 min to Alexanderplatz).
Water, heating, high speed internet etc. included.

This luxurious villa in the sought-after City West district of Berlin embodies timeless elegance and the most modern living comfort.
The location in the heart of City West offers the perfect balance between tranquillity and privacy in a green setting and proximity to the vibrant Kurfürstendamm – with its first-class boutiques, restaurants and cultural highlights. A refuge for sophisticated living at the highest level.

name: Cozy room in historical building near Mauerpark
description: Welcome to my cozy room in one of Berlin's prime locations, the charming former GDR neighborhood of Prenzlauer Berg. The historic Mauerpark, a favorite spot especially on Sundays, is just 200 meters away. The flat itself offers a peaceful retreat, yet it's only a one-minute walk to the vibrant Oderberger Straße, brimming with trendy cafés, restaurants, second-hand shops, and everything else you could wish for.

name: 120qm Sanierter Altbau
description: Just over a year ago, our old building property apartment was renovated. We have furnished every room. There is a large dining room with a high ficus tree. The room is through a double wing door with a large living room (including Balcony). In addition to the modern kitchen and the chic bathroom (shower and separate bathtub), there is also a guest toilet. The bedroom opens out to the quiet backyard. The whole apartment has real wood parquet and original old Berlin doors.

name: Beautiful 2-room Central apartment Berlin
description:
The flat is 88 SQM with a balcony facing the sunset. Two bedrooms, an open kitchen, a clean kitchen, a large living room and two working spaces.

The balcony is absolutely perfect to enjoy a nice cold beer while watching the sun go down or a coffee.

The apartment is located in one of the city centers - 5-min walk from Warschauer Str with S-Bahn, U-Bahn and trams. Also 5-min walk from cultural hub RAW.

The neighborhood is safe and features lots of hip restaurants.

name: Big, bright Friedrichshain apartment
description: Large, bright, cozy apartment. Centrally located, both S- and U-Bahn are 2 minutes away. Loads of local shops and gastronomy, all from local breweries to big mall-style.

The neighborhood is very nice and offers many opportunities for relaxation ( Spree and parks in 5 minutes walking)

Fully equipped with kitchen, bathroom with shower tray and washing machine, TV, work corner and balcony!

We are renting out our modern and spacious 3-bedroom apartment in a central but quiet location.

The Volkspark Friedrichshain as well as the center of Friedrichshain with many restaurants, cafes and shopping opportunities are in walking distance.

The apartment has two large balconies, fully equipped kitchen, bathroom with a washing machine and a big comfy living room with dining area.

For guests with kids - a big children's playground is just across the street.

Spread over two floors, it features two bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen, two bathrooms, and a fireplace, with separate entrances on each floor. Filled with art and vintage furniture, it offers a unique experience. Enjoy the quiet while being close to a variety of the best restaurants, bars, shops, and a farmers market twice a week. Parks and green spaces abound.

description:
Find your home in a big, cosy room in Wedding.

All you need by foot: organic food, cafes (e.g. La Maison), restaurants and all kinds of beautiful shops in a very green and relaxed part of Kreuzberg between Landwehrkanal and Görlitzer Park.

name: Spacious room in green area of Berlin

The apartment is located in the south west of Berlin. Close to many parks and great nature escapes like Grunewald and Wannsee. There are several supermarkets in walking distance. Public transportation is close which brings you with the bus or S-Bahn to anywhere in Berlin.

For the ones who are reaching out to the FU University it might be interesting to know that it is reachable in walking distance (10-15 min).

You will sleep in a quiet 20mq room, equipped with bed (140 x 200cm), sofa, TV and a desk. WiFi is of course included.

Equipped with your own doorbell and personal mailbox, your stay will feel like you're a long-time local. The apartments are spacious and furnished with careful attention to detail, exuding an artistic flair and timeless elegance. It's not just a place to stay; it's your own slice of life in the heart of Berlin.

This appartment is newly renovated and already furnished with all essentials yet not in its final form with all the planed interior. Water access in kitchen corner as of now is limited but bathroom sink can be used for all needs.

As I will be on vacation for this summer I decided to already offer my appartment for a discount.

name: quiet and central apt in NK by canal
description:
Neukölln is an artsy, young and multicultural area with loads of bars and food.
In our apartment, enjoy a comfy sofa in a our living room, take a book from the shelf, listen to your favourite playlist...
or simply have a nap in either the cosy bedroom featuring a solid 160cm wide bed.
Whether you are travelling as a couple or a family:
you are going to enjoy your stay with us in our peaceful apartment right in the middle of where the city is pulsing.

name: Nice room in Berlin Wedding, new apartment
description:
Hey there,

Im renting my room during the time I am away. This is a shared apartment. You'd stay with girls only (f, 21 & 20, both students) who are very laid back. Smoking is allowed only on the kitchen. The entire place is well equiped, spacious and modern. WiFi is available, as well as a kitchen, washing machine and a modern bathroom

name: Top location - Sweet Kreuzberg 61
description: Explore from here one of the most exicting european capitals..bars & restaurants as well as public transports all really close available. Find out why Kreuzberg is one of the most loved hotspots of berlin and get to know the famous Bergmannkiez

name: Beautiful Apartment near Mauerpark
description: Best location in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg, directly behind the famous Mauerpark. Lots of cafes and bars in the area. Double bed, elegant kitchen, living room with TV, cozy sofa and balcony make your stay in Berlin perfect!

name: 2-room apartm. on peninsu Stralau
description: Bright 2-room flat, fully furnished (including TV, dishwasher, washing machine); spacious bedroom with double bed; Living room with glass front and a large balcony; Bath and guest toilet; fully equipped kitchen with window; Good transport connection

name: Über den Dächern von Kreuzberg. Privatzimmer
description: Hello everyone, it is a 4 room apartment in the middle of Kreuzberg. I live in apartment with my girlfriend, too. We are also happy to give you tips to check out Berlin. 5 minutes walk to Görlitzer Bahnhof or Kottbuser Tor (metro). Görlitzer Park can be reached in 4 minutes. Many bars and restaurants nearby. Optimal location to check out Berlin. Very good connection to the neighboring district of Friedrichshain.  The Spree can also be reached in 15-20 min. on foot.

name: Minimalistic + well-connected flat
description: Welcome to Berlin! My flat is very bright, minimalistic, and has everything you might need for a short stay. It is incredibly well-connected to the rest city and both airports thanks to the train stations around (U1, U2, U3, U7, S1, S2). There are a lot of nice restaurants and bars around, and two big parks. The shopping area, and all the main sightseeing points can be reached within 15-20 min by train or around 30min walking.

name: gemütliche Maisonettewohnung mit großem Balkon
description:
The flat is very cosy and is only a 5-minute walk from the Westend S-Bahn station.
There is a balcony room with kitchen and under the roof is the bedroom with a double bed (1.60 m).
The flat has a large balcony and a great view.
In summer you can lie in the hammock or barbecue and chill.

name: Nähe See und Kudamm, hell, mit Balkon, 4 Zimmer
description: The building of our apartment is from 1913 and still has original details such as stucco, wing doors or old door handles. We love modern art and design. So you will find an interesting mixture of old and new. As an architect, my husband likes to play with light and was very creative in the furnishing of our apartment with many indirect light sources. As you will see, we have furnished our apartment with a lot of love. It has 4 rooms, 1 balcony and is on the 4th floor with elevator.

name: Cosy, clean, scandi flat in buzzing neighbourhood
description: Located in the trendy hipster neighbourhood Neukölln, connected directly to the U8 (underground train) and Sbahn (overground train) getting around the city is super easy. Surrounded by many cafes, bars and a short stroll away to iconic parks (Tempelhofer Feld and Körner Park).

name: Maisonette Wohnung am Traveplatz
description:
Hello!
We rent out our 2 two-room apartment at Traveplatz in Friedrichshain.
The apartment is on the 3rd and 4th floor of the back house and is very quiet.

name: Lovely studio apartment with loft bed
description: The apartment is located in the heart of Friedrichshain. Friedrichshain is home to many of the trendiest bars and restaurants in Berlin. In the apartment's immediate neighbourhood is Boxhagener Platz with its farmers market happening every weekend.

name: Cosy room at Bergmannkiez
description: Kreuzberger Bergmannstraße is the main artery of the neighborhood between Mehringdamm and Südstern. With its colorful mix of shops, junk shops, cafes and restaurants, it's one of Berlin's cold streets. Here you will experience Berlin diversity in a relaxed neighborhood atmosphere.

name: Superior Zimmer (45 sqm)
description: The location of Louisa´s Place, directly on Kurfürstendamm, makes it an ideal point for accessing Berlin’s City West district. With perfect public transport connections, destinations in the Eastern centre of the city are also within easy reach. The typical architectural style from the turn of the century gives this suite its own distinctive character.

name: Above the rooftops of Kreuzberg
description:
The bright attic apartment is located in the middle of Berlin and offers all the advantages of big city life. At the same time it is a quiet place of relaxation over the rooftops of Kreuzberg and Mittes.
The bright attic apartment is located in the centre of Berlin and offers all the advantages of a big city life. At the same time it is a quiet place to relax above the roofs of Kreuzberg and Mitte.

name: Spacious and bright room in hip area Fhain
description:
Spacious and bright 34sm room in shared flat in top area in Friedrichshain Boxhagener Kiez with close connections to metro (U5), ringbahn (S41/42/8) and trams.

The room has a double bed & a bed sofa and offers space for up to 2 people. Interior can be used. Since 2 more people are living in this apartment, the bathroom and the kitchen are shared. They are fully equipped with everything, that is needed to have an enjoyable stay.

Next to the kitchen there is also a cozy common chill area.

name: cosy room in Neukölln
description:
itś a lovely 55m flat in neukölln, 2 minutes walking from metro station Hermannstrasse.
a lot of shopping possibility around.
you have your own 20m room, with a big charming mezzanine bed,

name: Big cozy room in Berlin-Moabit
description: We offer a cozy room in Berlin Moabit, near Hauptbahnhof. The accommodation is good for couples, solo travelers, business travelers and groups (up to 4 Pers. / depends on Date. Sometimes 1-2 flat mates are part of the package).

name: Convenient spot for seeing Berlin sights
description: Unveil comfort and style in the Double Room at Select Hotel Berlin, ideally situated just a stone's throw away from the historic landmark of Checkpoint Charlie. Embrace modern amenities and a cozy ambiance, creating the perfect retreat for indulging in the vibrant pulse of Berlin's heart.
license:

Entity address: An der Alster 63, 20099 , Hamburg, Deutschland
Listing address: Zimmerstraße 88, 10117 , Berlin, Deutschland

name: Luxuriöses Apartment
description: Everything is new, fresh and extra hygienically clean. Of course it is also possible to work in the home office as we have high-speed internet. The apartment is located in the backyard of the apartment building. Despite this, you can walk to the energetic Berlin within a few minutes' walk. Shops are within walking distance ( about 4 minutes) for daily use. The Ubhf Anhalter Bahnhof is in the immediate vicinity and there are two bus stops at your doorstep.

name: Berlin-Mitte:beautiful apartment w. sunny balcony
description:
Berlin-Mitte:
we love our brilliantly located, beautiful apartments very much, but like to share them when we are not there. Very central and perfectly equipped apartment, great for all Berlin visitors who also want to enjoy some peace and comfort. Directly on the tram that goes to the main train station, on the U8 subway, and almost everything is within walking distance anyway.
P.S. Rooms have been changed a bit, more up-to-date photos are available on request.

name: Familientraum in Friedrichshain / Prenzlberg
description:
Our beautiful duplex apartment on the border of Prenzlauer Berg to Friedrichshain is waiting for you!

Quiet but still well located. S-Bahn/U-Bahn and tram can be reached quickly (about 8 minutes) on foot. Supermarkets and parks are around the corner of the property either.

2 bedrooms, a children's room and a cozy kitchen-living room with balcony leave nothing to be desired. Ideal for families (lots of toys and a nice yard with sandbox and swing) or small groups who want to discover Berlin.

name: Spacious Apartment in Friedrichshain
description: Hello there! I'm renting my spacious 57 m² apartment, located in a very nice and calm neighbourhood, yet close to a lot of bars, restaurants, and famous Berlin clubs. It is a 1.5 room apartment, with all the necessary furniture and amenities, and is very comfortable for up to three people.

name: formidable ~ Charlottenburg ~ Ku'damm
description:
In the centre of the former west, directly at Ku’damm – between shops, restaurants, bars and clubs you’ll find the Boutique Hotel HENRI Berlin.
In the livingroom, bar, House Kitchen or in one of our cozy rooms everybody will find their favourite spot in the historical building to chill, work or chat. All “Chambre Rooms” are designed differently, equipped with TV, WiFi, bathroom and some belle epoque furniture.
Abendbrot is on us (Mo-Sa 19:00 -21:00) in the House Kitchen.

name: Lovely shared apartment in Charlottenburg
description:
Welcome to my beautiful and cosy apartment in a peaceful and quiet neighborhood. There are different amenities close to the apartment eg supermarkets, cafes and restaurants, train station (U2). The train gives direct access to Zoologischer Garten (Ku’damm), Potsdamer Platz (Mall of Berlin) and Alexanderplatz (Alexa Mall etc).

Making a booking with me to relax after touring our beautiful Berlin.

I’ll be privileged to host you!

Listing address: Ratzeburger Allee 3, 14050, Berlin , Germany

name: Cozy and bright loft style apartment with balcony
description: Bright and open loft style apartment in Wedding. The apartment is super cozy with all the ammenities you will need for a perfect holiday in Berlin. There is a balcony that overlooks Leopoldplatz which has a beautiful church and is great for sunsets. It has many bus lines directly in front of the building and only a 5 minute walk to two different U-bahn lines and a 13 minute walk to the nearest S-ring bahn. With the underground you can get to the center (mitte) in under 15 minutes.

name: Apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located home.

name: Perfect 2-Bedroom LOFT for a Couple or Family
description:
Visiting Berlin for Christmas and New Year's Holidays? Consider our 2-Bedroom LOFT, ideal for a Couple or Family.

Visiting Berlin for Christmas and New Year's Holidays? Consider our 2-Bedroom LOFT, ideal for a Couple or Family.

Great yogi mattress from Caspar. Firm and soft.

Lively, energetic, spacious, modern, light and airy, clean, modern appliances, cozy, lift, safe and secure, great neighbors and community vibe, communal garden.

Good location in Alt-Treptow near Treptower Park.

name: Cozy flat in Sonnenallee (Neukölln/Kreuzberg)
description:
I'm Aurélien and i have sometimes to move out of Berlin, that's why I use to rent it for few days.
I propose 1 room (there is an other room in the flat but it will be closed cause is my office). The flat is in the first floor. The rent area is 40qm. Situated in Neukölln, near to Kreuzberg, on the famous Sonnenallee but the flat is very calm and cosy because the windows overlook the courtyard.
Five minutes walking from station Rathaus Neukölln (U7) and one minute to many bus station.

name: Caroline-Michaelis-Straße
description: Bright spacious new build apartment fully equipped with electric blinds and underfloor heating.  Located on a quite street in the center or Berlin (Mitte) this apartment has everything you need for a stay in Berlin. Excellent access to transport links Sbahn and Tram 3 minutes walk away. An abundance of bars and restaurants and only 15 walk away from museum island. National History Museum only 5 minutes away.

name: Big and bright room in Friedrichshain
description:
We sublet one of the rooms in our big and full of light apartment when most of the family members are away.

It is a place where we live. It is not a hotel, so there are our things and we expect people to understand and respect it.

The room is 29 sqm. Fully furnished. There is a king size bed and we can also add a double mattress on the floor.

name: Room in "Altbau building"
description:
Wonderful bright and cosy room in an "Altbau" building with heigh ceilings. You reach everything in less than 3 minutes walk like restaurants, cafes, bars, supermarkets and the public transportation in the middle of the beautiful district “Schöneberg”. We have a fully equipped kitchen, a lot of space in the flat (90 qm) and even a balcony :).
Per month 630€ with renting contract. To rent from beginning of May for 3-5 months until September.

name: Gemütliche Wohnung in Berlin-Friedrichshain
description: Beautiful apartment with large combined living-dining area and kitchen with large balcony, bedroom with built-in wardrobes, bathroom with large tub and a guest toilet. The apartment is located on the 2nd floor (with elevator) in an old factory building in the backyard between Ostkreuz and Stralauer Allee in the popular Friedrichshain. The Spree and Treptower Park are within walking distance and from the Ostkreuz you have the best connections. 2 supermarkets are directly on site.

name: Cosy room in the middle of Neukölln, Schillerkiez
description:
Feel welcome in my room in the middle of Neukölln, Schillerkiez. Only 3 minutes walk away from the underground U8 station. You'll be living with my lovely flat-mate while I am away.
You can smoke in the kitchen and in my room as well (if you open the window) :)

name: Charming refurbished
description: Beautiful refurbished old style apartment (140sqm) in the heart of Kreuzberg, 5 min walk to famous Bergmannstrasse and 2 min walk to Victoriapark, the rooms are all nicely furnished with Vintage interior and love to detail. One kingsize bed available but there are also two guest matresses for the living room that can be installed if you desire.

name: Bright, cosy flat near Tempelhof
description:
Experience comfort and peace in our flat. You'll be sleeping on a king-size bed. The apartment is away from the street and very peaceful.
There's a newly built, fully-equipped kitchen for you to use.
Large TV for chill evenings on the couch.
High speed WiFi.
The balcony offers a very nice park view (especially pretty during spring & summer) and is perfect for coffee, reading a book or resting.
Working desk available.

Perfect for a couple or a solo traveler.

name: Hübsche Familienwohnung mit großem Balkon
description: Since we will be traveling longer, we would like to sublet our great 3.5 room apartment. Large bedroom, big living room, bathroom, kitchen and great balcony on the third floor with elevator) The location is central yet quiet - great cafes, supermarkets, playgrounds and parks can be found in the immediate vicinity. The children's room is currently used for our private things, but there is a room with a passage connected to the living room where a mattress fits.

name: Bright and cozy apartment by the canal
description:
Minimalistic & cozy apartment by the canal in legendary Berlin Kreuzberg.
This place has everything that makes your stay in Berlin worthwhile: Beautiful design, bedroom, seperate living room, open kitchen and modern bathroom. And all that in an ideal spot right by the canal!

name: Downtown room in the best area
description:
Hello there.
I am offering up my room in our beautiful 2-bedroom-flat in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg near Eberswalder Street Station, just 3 stops from the city centre!
The flat comes complete with every amenity (full kitchen, washer, fridge, freezer, bath, etc.).

name: Sunny, central room in the heart of Wedding
description: Im renting out my room I just moved in, because I’m traveling outside of Berlin. The apartment is a shared flat and located in a side street close to Leopoldplatz, which you can reach by the U9 and the U6. The room is lighted by the sun all day, but provides cool temperatures as it’s a typical Berlin „Altbau“. The walls have just been painted, the bed has never been slept on, and the clothes rail is emptied for you to hang your clothes.

name: Große helle Wohnung am Südstern
description: Sit back and relax in this quiet, stylish space.

name: URBAN cosy flat in X-Berg
description:
Hi there!
My flat is perfectly located between Paul Lincke Ufer & Görlitzer Park with many many options to do & go. Flat has high sealings, balcony & wooden floor, a queensize bed in the bedroom & plenty of space to eat & chill in the living room.
Everything is pritty close here.
Supermarkets, great restaurants & coffee shops.
The bus M29 is just 20 meters arround the corner & takes you to Görlitzer Bahnhof (2 min/ U12) or to Hermannplatz (2 min/ U7).

name: Cozy Forest Room in Shared Flat Close to TXL/fair
description:
Hey Folks,

we share our spacious flat as we keep coming around a lot.
The newly renovated apartment is part of an old German building with bright tall rooms and beautiful ceilings. It is very well connected to everywhere and the train station is close to our house. What you get at our flat is an authentic Berlin student-life experience.

The room is small, but super cozy. You can either sleep up in the loft bed with a little climb or on a mattress on the super soft carpet floor!

See you:)

name: Schöne, helle Altbauwohnung, ruhig gelegen
description: My small, beautiful old building apartment invites you to relax.  Ideal for a stay for two. You are very well connected and quickly in the city center.

name: Lovely private room in best area of Berlin
description:
Beautiful room in best area of Berlin. The room is very bright with high seelings, has a lovely wooden floor and some kind of art at the ceiling (stucco)
The area is called "Bergmankiez" and is one of the most famous Kiez in Berlin, Kreuzberg , many fancy shops, restaurants, bars, second hand shops, "Späti´s", parks .. and a nice street life and so on ..
Public transportation is very close (5min to U7 and U6) and from there y r very close to Mitte, Friedrichshain or NeuKölln

name: Modern & cozy apartment in vibrant Neukölln area
description: Beautiful modern 2 bedroom apartment with big open kitchen and two balconies in great location (vibrant area of Neukölln and right next to two giant parks)

name: Gruenau Hotel Double Room
description: We warmly welcome you to the family-run Grünau Hotel Berlin. Our hotel is located in the wooded and lake-rich south of Berlin, not far from Berlin Schönefeld Airport, or the future airport BER, in the city district of Treptow-Köpenick. Köpenick is the biggest and greenest city district in Berlin.

Entity address: Kablower Weg 87, 12526, Berlin, Berlin
Listing address: Kablower Weg 87, 12526, Berlin, Berlin

name: Central & cosy apartment in Berlin-Friedrichshain
description: When I'm not at home, I'm offering my cosy and clean 70 sqm apartment, centrally located in the heart of Berlin-Friedrichshain, to guests from around the globe! Registration number: 02/Z/RA/008975-18

name: Apartment in Kreuzberg
description:
I‘m renting out my lovely 2 room apartment with kitchen, bathroom on the second floor in the back part of the building. The apartment is bright, cozy and very quiet with views to the courtyard. Centrally located in Kreuzberg, 7 min walk to the U3 train Schlesisches Tor and Görlitzer Bahnhof. 2 min to Markthalle Neun and 15 min to Alexanderplatz by train.
The apartment has been renovated recently with great effort and an eye for detail and modern furniture.

name: Nice and cosy room in Friedrichshain (Ostkreuz)
description:
The room has a comfortable size of 25sq with high ceilings, which are typical for an "Altbau" in Berlin. The flat is located in the first floor, but with windows closed you hear nothing from outside; if they are open it's also not too noisy.

We don't have pets, but if someone wants to bring his/hers, they are welcome.

In the direct surrounding of the flat are parks, the river, a bay, clubs/bars, a supermarket and some smaller shops. Some trendy neighborhoods are easily reached by feet or pt!

name: Sunny & Beautiful in Berlin City Center
description: This is a beautiful Berlin-style apartment (Altbau), with high ceilings and timber piling on the floor. The area „rote Insel“ in Schöneberg has a lot of Cafés, Bars and Parks. You can take the S1 train directly to Potsdamer Platz or Friedrichstraße. Neukölln ist just on the corner with the Bus 104 and you can walk to Akazienstraße(Schöneberg) or Bergmannstraße (Kreuzberg). This is the apt I live in and I want to rent occasionally and not a commercial Airbnb, with a lot of books and coziness.

name: Helle ruhige Wohnung mit Balkon - Tempelhofer Feld
description:
The apartment is located directly at the ring in Neukölln-Tempelhof, below Tempelhofer Feld (about 10 minutes walking distance).
The neighborhood is super quiet and relaxed, it is very green and yet it is only a few minutes walk to Hermmanstrasse, a few stops by U8 to Kreuzberg or e.g. 20 min to S-Ostkreuz.
You can use all rooms and the balcony without restriction and feel at home. The only thing I ask is to water my plants:)

name: Ruhiges Wohnen und Arbeiten in Berlin-Neukölln
description: In my cozy and quiet work/living room + bedroom in the middle of the lively Neukölln district, you will definitely feel comfortable.

name: Lovely, bright apartment with balcony, near lake!
description: Bright apartment across the street from the lake, recently updated with lovely eating places along the water front. Centrally located with good public transport, many buses and overground trains. Great eating places locally, with a supermarket, postoffice and shops within walking distance.

name: Luxuriöse Wohnung in Berlin-Friedrichshain
description: This stylish apartment is in the best location on the Stralau peninsula in Berlin-Friedrichshain, just 50 m away from the Spree. Due to the unique location, the apartment is on the one hand very quiet but only a few minutes away by bus from Berlin's Ostkreuz. From there, you can reach Berlin Brandenburg Airport in less than 20 minutes. Only a few minutes away by bike there are also various parks, supermarkets, bars and restaurants.

name: Charmante Berliner Remise im Loft-Stil
description:
I rent out a typical Berlin retreat in the quiet Lichtenberg backyard with balcony.

The apartment is very conveniently located with good connections (S/U Lichtenberg, M21, direct connection to Alexanderplatz and Hauptbahnhof, 35 minutes to the airport (BER).

The trendy district of Friedrichshain with its many restaurants, bars, clubs and shops is 3 metro stops away. A large park is within walking distance.
Fully equipped kitchen can be used. Smoking in the house is not allowed.

name: Dachwohnung mit weitem Blick
description: This place is all glass, sunlight and wide vistas which are rare in Berlin. You can enjoy the sunset both from the living room area and the roof terrace which also has a side facing East with a sitting area for breakfast. The apartment is both modern and cosy, with wooden heated floors. Due to its high-standard windows you will not hear any noise of the city while you watch trains passing by directly from the kitchen table - kids love it!

name: Well located bright appartment in Berlin Tempelhof
description:
The appartment is around 55sqm, located in Berlin Tempelhof.
The biggest room has a couch where you can also chill out. Every room is really bright and cosy. You have access to the big kitchen and the bathroom, as well as 2 bedrooms.
10 mins walking distance is a train, S-Bahn and U-Bahn stations, there are also 3 bus lines 5 mins walking distance from there.

name: Cosy apartament im Samariterkiez
description:
We offer our nice apartment hoping you feel like at home.

A confortable living/ bedroom, bathroom with bathtub, separately kitchen and a balcony to enjoy (or to smoke if you do).

Supermarkets (BIO-Company, Edeka, LIDL, Rewe...) a lot of restaurants (Korean, Indian, Vietnamese...) and nice parks almost in front of the door. 15 minutes walking to Warschauer Str. and East Side Galery, and only 7 minutes with U-Bahn to Alexanderplatz. S-Bahn station (Ringbahn) is also only 6 minutes away.

name: Family Loft near Potsdamer Platz
description:
10 min walking distance to BERLINALE!!
Our family friendly loft near Potsdamer Platz with a ceiling height of 4 meters is on the ground floor of a new building with access to a big private garden and roof. Just across is the new Park am Gleisdreieck

name: limehome Berlin Luise-Henriette-Str. | Suite (LT)
description: At limehome, we believe that everyone deserves a better place while traveling. A place to look forward to return to. A place designed to stay®. Whether you are looking for a home away from home or a quiet place to work - our apartments feature high-quality fittings including a premium hotel bed for restful nights & suite dreams. Our digital-enabled guest journey without a physical reception and staff on-site makes your stay more convenient.

name: Studio with terrace in Prenzlberg
description: 1room/kitchen + wardrobe/storage room + bathroom.The apartment is very charming and lightly unusual. It is in the backyard with it's own entrance. The place is surrounded by plenty cafés, restaurants and bars.

name: Modernisierte 2 Zimmer Altbauwohnung, Zentrumsnah
description:
A beautiful and newly modernized apartment in the middle of Berlin's old building with a super nice high ceilings.
High-quality furniture and electric utensils, apartment again.
The apartment is located in a very old and dirty building.

name: small cozy room ~ in big shared artist flat
description: We are four artists living together in an open and warm-hearted community in a very beautiful apartment in Berlin. The room we offer is equipped with a large bed, a spacious desk, an open shelf and an armchair. It faces the courtyard / garden and is therefore very quiet.

name: Homaris East Side Hotel - Superior Doppelzimmer
description: In the superior double rooms you will find a cozy queen size bed (140-180 cm), a flat-screen TV, a safe, a minibar, a desk and a Jacobs capsule machine with tea making facilities as well as a lounge chair for additional relaxation. The spacious bathroom is equipped with a rain shower, toilet and high quality toiletries. Either enjoy the view of the quiet backyard or the Eastside Gallery and the picturesque Spree.
