Listing address: Mühlenstr. 6, 10243, Berlin, Deutschland

name: Dachgeschosswohnung mit großer Terrasse in Mitte
description:
Bright attic apartment which has 4 rooms and large living room, finished in 2022. The apartment has a very nice south-west terrace.
Central location -directly between Mauerpark and Arkonaplatz-
The apartment is very quiet.
3 min to the tram

name: Typisch Neukölln - aber ruhig *
description: The rooms are modernly furnished and have separate access to the garden. They are facing the courtyard and therefore very quiet . The apartment is centrally located and in a typical Neuköllner neighborhood . It is very well connected with public transport and there are numerous shopping opportunities within walking distance . You will live with me,my friend Saba and my little dog Gismo.

name: Penthouse w/ Panoramic City View
description: Welcome to your luxurious Neukölln penthouse! This two-story haven offers panoramic city views and a private terrace. Accommodating up to 4 guests, it features a king-size box spring bed with a comfortable topper, a king-size sofa bed, and a modern bathroom. The recently renovated kitchen is fully equipped. Enjoy the multi-room sound system, two large TVs, and a dedicated workspace. Located in a vibrant area, it's close to public transport, grocery stores, bars, and restaurants.

name: private room at Volkspark PBerg
description: We rent part of our quiet apartment near the S-Bahn station. You are also welcome to use the living room and all other rooms, as if it were your own at home.

name: RS Office Apt. Central Berlin
description:
Welcome to the newly furnished vacation home – with space for a maximum of 4 people.
With a fully equipped kitchen, a sofa bed and a double bed, as well as private access and separate bathroom, as well as the washing machine and the smart TV, you have everything your heart has to offer for a good short trip in Berlin. Feel like you turn off in the evening and sit in the cafe across the street. In the middle of Berlin, the possibilities are limitless.

name: Kreuzberg ** Lovely Apartment **
description:
Original Kreuzberg old building apartment (115 sqm) with 3 rooms, kitchen-living room and bath. Fully equipped and ideal for a family with 2-3 children.
**Lovely family apartment in Kreuzberg. Perfect located in one of the most beautiful areas of Berlin**

name: Stylish apartment in x-berg
description: Stylish, bright apartment in best X-Berg location with many restaurants, bars, cafes, parks and the Landwehrkanal just around the corner.

name: Bright/spacious bedroom in trendy F-hain Kiez!
description:
The apartment is located in trendy Friedrichshain, close to Frankfurter Tor and Simon-Dach-Kiez. As I am traveling quite often, you are welcome to stay in my 19m^2 room with balcony access.

My roommates are going to either leave you alone or chit-chat, depending on your preference, both very nice though! The room is isolated enough, big and bright! Not a lot of furniture in the room yet, as I just moved in.

Flat was refurbished last month. Squeaky new bathroom!

name: Cosy 65sqm 2-room Apt in the heart of Berlin
description:
The sunny, cosy and full furnished 2 room apt with balcony located in the heart of Berlin - Friedrichshain! Central but quite! It is on the 2. Floor with great neighbors, high speed wifi, queen-size double bed with fresh bedding and towels!

My bedroom is facing away from the street, so it is very quiet and peaceful. 1 Queen bed + 1 sofa couch. Comfortable for 3 people, tight for 4.

Subway U2 and Tram only minutes away. Dive in and feel like a local in Berlin.

name: 87sqm flat 1st occupancy, near centre & PrenzlBerg
description: 3-room flat renovated in 2022 with balcony. Fully equipped with a modern kitchen, full bath, 2 bedrooms and a spacious living/dining area with a comfortable sofa bed; suitable for 6 people, elevator. Ring train & tram connection, close to the S-Bahn station, Greifswalder Str. (Prenzlauer Berg), in 30 minutes in the city centre. The neighbouring Langhansstraße is a real gastronomic mile, there is also a cinema, organic and weekly market and a well-known tattoo studio. Lightning fast & free Wi-Fi.

name: Spacious sunny room at Savignyplatz
description: Charming, bright room in a super central 113m2 apartment that's just a short walk to Kurfürstendamm and Zoologischer Garten. The perfect home base for exploring all corners of Berlin.

name: Amazing Room in Central Berlin
description:
The apartment is located on a busy street, close to lots of restaurants and bars, 1 min away from the subway station.

My guest-room is large, 23 sqm with a super king size bed and luxury mattress.

name: Modern, sunny 130 sqm 3-level  home
description: Welcome to our very comfortable and sunny home in southwest Berlin. Our corner townhouse is spread over 130 sqm on 3 floors,  3 bedrooms, 1 full & 1 half-bath, a garden, a patio for outdoor parties and a large terrace adjacent to the top floor.

name: Cozy little room in a 2-room flat in Neukölln
description:
Hello, I offer you here one of my rooms in my lovely 2-room apartment.
******************************************************************************
On Tuesdays I am home around 22:30 (Check-In)

name: Quiet room near sunny park
description:
A quiet room near a big sunny park, perfect location, quiet neighbourhood with a wonderful loft bed.

The room is in a shared flat with two other rooms. There is a bathroom with a big bathtub and a much appreciated, cozy but modern kitchen. The apartment is located directly opposite Schillerpark, perfect for running, having picnics or BBQs and taking long walks... There is a bus (Glasgowerstrasse) and u-bahn station (Seestrasse/ Rehberge) close by.

name: Klein aber Oho!
description:
Cozy little apartment in the Lichtenberger Kiez.
Very nice neighbors.
Super connections to the public
Transportation by bus, subway, public transport and
Tram.
In Weitlingstraße there are many shops, nice restaurants and also some bars.
Not even a five-minute walk away, there is an Edeka, which is also on Sonn and
Public holidays until 10 pm.
You have the whole place to yourself. I will not be in the apartment, always available for questions.
Enjoy your stay! :)

name: Big Room in Berlin-Kreuzberg, sunny
description: Between "Görlitzer Park" and U-Bahn " Schlesisches Tor". The apartment is on the fifth floor. Twoo young friendly dancers living here, speaking good spain,  english, some french,  germain . The apartment is  nice and cosy. Good beds, big bath, Bars.

name: Private room in a penthouse in the heart of PBerg.
description:
Private room in a penthouse in the heart of PBerg.

- 1min walking distance to train station / U-Bahn & Straßenbahn.
- Dozens of restaurants, food stalls, bakeries, and bars within 5min walking distance.
- Mauerpark 5min walking distance.
- New apartment with sophisticated sound isolation.
- Shared flat with entrepreneurs and investors from the Berlin startup ecosystem, very international and open-minded.
- Private room, shared kitchen, and open office (two-floor apartment).

name: Pure Motion Studio, 47 qm
description:
The light-filled studio apartments offer the comfort of a private home. The loggia for sundowners or breakfast coffee and the floor-to-ceiling corner window with all-round views of the countryside and the vibrant Invalidenstraße are other advantages of these studios. The spacious, open-plan living and sleeping area, elegant bathroom and full-fledged kitchen leave nothing to be desired – all in clean shapes and top-notch furnishings.

Located on the 2nd floor.

name: Mitbewohnerin gesucht ( ab 13. Dezember)
description:
It's a 45 m2 apartment in Zehlendorf, a quiet and well-kept area in Berlin.

The apartment itself is lighted. Your room has 10 m2.

name: Altbauschick im Helmholzkiez
description: The beautiful apartment is located in a modernized old building directly in the popular Helmholtzkiez. It has a bright bathroom with bathtub. In addition, the kitchen is equipped with all the essentials and has a sun balcony where we like to have breakfast. A second balcony on the bedroom side gives a view directly onto Helmholtzplatz. Shopping facilities as well as cafes,bars and restaurants are just outside the door. Very well connected to public transport.

name: Cozy and zen home in the beautiful Prenzlauer berg
description: My home is a beautifuly cozy place decorated to make anyone feel calm and instantly at home. In my apartment it gives you the chance to switch off easily and relax. But also gives you the chance to be close to the city and explore as much as you need

name: Apartment at"Castle Charlottenburg"
description: Our apartment is located in Charlottenburg, it's just 1 min to the Castle and few minuts to bus and Metro U2 station wich at Zool. Garten, Potsdammerplatz, Alexanderplatz...

name: Guest room in modern apartment/ Gästezimmer
description:
Single bedroom in a 2 bedroom apartment with its own balcony. Big windows and very bright and secure blinds for the night.
Next door is a very good Italian restaurant and across the street a bakery and a wine shop with great wines.
5 minute walk from U5 Samariterstraße metro station and 7 minute walk from Frankfurter Allee S-Bahn station.
Ein Zimmer für 2 Pers.
Eigener Balkon. Weniger als 5 min bis zur U-Bahnstation Samariterstraße (U5) und etwa 7 min bis zur S-Bahn Frankfurter Allee

name: Room "Wild wild Wedding" (+piano)
description: The room is large and so is the balkony. Large windows = lots of light. You are welcome to play the piano if you like. No complaints about or from the neigbours yet, rather the contrary (generally as well as concerning the piano). The Bed is soft.

name: Cosy Flat in the Heart of Berlin
description:
Beautiful spacious three-room apartment visavis from Helmholzplatz in the district Prenzlauer Berg.
110 square meters, three rooms plus large fully equipped kitchen, bathroom and hall for a short or longer stay in Berlin from one to four guests plus children.

name: Blick auf den Fernsehturm
description: Light-flooded room overlooks the TV tower in a central location of Friedrichshains. The apartment has a large living space with lots of plants and a simple kitchen. Adjacent to the room and living area is a terrace with views across the neighborhood. The situation is quiet and well connected.

name: Schöne Wohnung in Berlin
description:
Cozy apartment in Berlin Treptow - Köpenick in Oberschöneweide.
The apartment is in the immediate vicinity of the Volkspark Wuhlheide and thus close to the university for technology and the economy and close to the Ernst Busch Schauspielschule. The apartment has high walls with stucco.

name: Loved and cosy flat in Berlin
description:
Feel home at my cosy and heart-fully furnished one-bedroom apartment. Centrally located with easy connection to public transport. It lies within a friendly and open-minded neighborhood.
The flat is very sunny and bright, having sun rising on the bedroom side in the morning and beautiful sunset at the balcony in the evening.

If you search for a longer stay, please contact me directly about it (January+February)
license:
First name and Last name: Laura Gewalt
Contact address: Katzlerstrasse 7, 10829, Berlin , Germany
Listing address: Katzlerstrasse 7, 10829, Berlin , Germany

name: In the heart of Berlin, Tiergarten
description:
The apartment is a typical Berlin Altbau, quiet and lovely.
The place is only 2 bus stops away from Hauptbahnhof, Bundestag, Brandenburger Tor, Bellevue, Tiergarten & Spree (U-Bahn/Buses are right infront of the door)
10min by bus to Tegel airport.

name: big cosy room in Berlin Wilmersdorf
description:
Bright large room in Berlin-Wilmersdorf!
Room in a 2-persons-flat. 25m2 with big windows and a cosy couch. The bathroom and the kitchen are entirely renovated. You will find a washing machine and everything you need.
You reach everything in 5 minutes walk! The next metro station, supermarket (open 24/6), pharmacy, bank, restaurants, fastfood, bike rent. 35 min to the main station, 15min to Ku'damm. The neighborhood is green and quiet and close to Schöneberg.

name: Zimmer in Privatwohnung in der West-City
description: A cozy room with balcony in a beautiful old building apartment in a great location with nice park outside the door. The apartment has a large kitchen and a dining area. Top connection to public transport by proximity to the Ringbahn, U3 and U7 (S+U Heidelberger Platz, U Blissestr., each 5 min walk)

name: Cosy private room in Neukölln's Schillerkiez!
description: Private room in flatshare. The room is small and very cosy with a big built-in loft bed. The apartment is situated in Neukölln's hip area called Schillerkiez and surrounded by lovely cafes, restaurants, bars and supermarkets. Well-connected to the U-bahn and buses, and the S-bahn is just one stop or a 10-minute walk away.

name: Schöne und gemütliche Wohnung in Prenzlauer Berg
description: Very nice fully equipped old building apartment in Prenzlauer Berg with balcony and view of the old water tower.

name: Spacious and bright Neukölln Room in Rooftop apt.
description: Nice huge rooftop apartment in the center of Neukölln. Balcony with view to the Rathaus square. Two Subway lines right around the block but countless clubs and bars and restaurants in the neighborhood. Berlin at its best.

name: Privates Zimmer
description: This stylish home is a perfect spot for group travel.
license:
First name and Last name: Karrar Ali
Contact address: Springbornstr 176, 12487, Berlin, Deutschland
Listing address: Springbornstr 176, 12487, Berlin, Deutschland

name: Bright and cozy designer room
description: Very bright and comfortable 28m² private room in an old fashion typical "berliner" building (Altbau) in Berlin Moabit. From here you have perfect connection to the transportation network!

name: Charmante Altbauwohnung mit großer Wohnküche
description: A very charming, bright Berlin apartment on the 3rd floor is waiting for you, which is located directly on the border between Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. There are two bedrooms and a large kitchen-living room. There is an old bakery right in the backyard. There is a lot to discover, be parks in the immediate vicinity with children's playgrounds, the Mauerpark with its Sunday flea market and nice cafes throughout the neighborhood. Despite all this, the apartment is pleasantly quiet.

name: Bright room in big apartment in Pankow
description:
We rent out our beautiful room in our apartment in Pankow.
The room has its own entrance from the stairwell and is equipped with a 1.20 m bed, a desk and a large window overlooking the garden :)

We sublet one room in our apartment. It has an seperate entrance, so you can come whenever you want :)

name: 2 Bedrooms in Spacious apartment in Kreuzberg
description:
Two bedrooms in a large and beautiful apartment. With 2 toilets and 1 shower. We won’t be around much so you’ll basically have the place for yourselves :)
Location is very central, walking distance to many galleries and museums. Bus stop is in front of the building. U2, U6, and U8 metro stations are at walking distance.
We are happy to share with you advice and suggestions about the city and cultural events.

name: Studio 2&3 Pfefferberg
license:
Legal entity name and Legal form: Vermietung und Verwaltung Haus 10, Einzelunternehmen

Listing address: Christinenstr., 18-19, 10119, Berlin, Deutschland

name: Lovely apartment in wooden design at Yorck Straße
description:
Hello and welcome to Berlin,
do you look for a wonderful place to live and discover berlin in short ways? Then my apartment might be the right location for you. The flat offers you the opportunity to live in a wonderful wooden made up place in the geografic middle of Berlin. The neighbourhood of Schöneberg directly at the border to Kreuzberg is famous for beautyful parks (Gleisdreieck, Victoria) and nice scene areas like Bergmann Kiez with art shops, restaurants and bars.

name: Quiet & cozy place to relax, near subway station
description:
Calm and cozy place to relax.
Just a few steps away from the subway which takes you straight to the heart of Berlin.
Our appartment is fully equipped with many extras.
We try to provide everything, just ask.

name: Central and green
description: Our apartment is ideal for couples or young families looking for a nice and central Berlin summer location. Located between Kollwitzplatz, Kulturbrauerei and Kastanienallee there are a lot of cafés, restaurants around, the Sunday flea market at Mauerpark is just around the corner. The apartment has nice views into the surrounding trees and is quiet and cool during hot days.

name: Stylish and spacious 3-room in front of the park
description:
Best suited for couples or a small family.
Located in the quiet part of Friedrichshain in front of a park. The place is surrounded by trees and crafted with love, if you are looking for a cozy stay. Flat with 3 rooms, including 2 double beds, a fully equipped kitchen and a backyard balcony.

Explore the best local restaurants and cafés and the lively areas of Boxi and Samariter Kiez.

7 min from metro, 40 min from the airport, 5 min from supermakets, and Italian and French bakeries.

name: Dream Penthouse, Perfect for families
description: Large, beautiful, newly renovated Penthouse, fully equipped, amazing location. Luminous and specious. Suitable for up to 5 people and 2 babies.

name: 2-Raum-Wohnung zu vermieten
description:
Beautiful 2-room apartment for rent temporarily in Berlin Friedrichshagen. You can use all rooms completely. 2 rooms. Balcony. Kitchen. Kitchen. Bad (all rooms and equipement for use).

It's king size bed in bedroom A 3rd person can sleep on the couch.

Not suitable for small children, as not child-friendly.

name: Oran Apartment 7
description: Our apartments are furnished in a modern style and are located in central Berlin. They are equipped with all necessary appliances: TV, fridge, stove, dishwasher and WiFi – everything you need for a comfortable stay with the whole family. In addition, the apartments have a keyless access code for extra comfort. Looking forward to your arrival!

name: Beautiful & Calm apartment in vibrant Schöneberg
description: The apartment is located in the vibrant Schöneberg district! It's super calm and it's nice to chill inside and relax after a long day sight seeing! Very nice cafés, Italian, Lebanese and indian restaurants are accessible within walking distance, cinemas and shops as well! A lot of transports are availble in the area (Sbhan, Ubhan, buses...)

name: Welcome to an Architects Home in Central Berlin
description:
Your temporary home is a townhouse in Berlin-Mitte right at the Wall Memorial. It has an open-plan living area with kitchen and terrace on the top floor and 3 separated bedrooms.
For open-minded guests.

name: bright & quiet single person apartment
description:
•One room Apartment located in Stieglitz, good public transport connection i.e10 min walk to subway S2/ Marienfelde, or by bus with a few stops to subway U6/Alt-Mariendorf or S25/Lankwitz.
•Bright and sunny Apartment, bathroom with shower, kitchen furnished and fully equipped, one living room with single-bed +sleepingbag, table, chairs and very high clothing rack.
•Close to supermarket (10 min walk), e.g. PENNY, ALDI, Netto, ALDI, POCO.
•Ideal for new arrivals or short visit in Berlin.

name: Beautiful appartment in Neukölln. Mein Herzstück.
description: My beautiful, very bright and friendly apartment is in the center of North Neukölln on the 4th floor of an old building. It was completely renovated in 2016. The bedroom goes out to the yard and the living room with the sofa bed and dining table facing the street. The kitchen is modernly equipped with induction cooker and coffee machine. It has a table where you can have a very cozy breakfast. Bathroom is also high quality with a walk-in shower.

name: Gemütliche und sehr ruhige Wohnung in Schöneberg
description:
Cozy and very bright apartment with balcony right in the heart of Schöneberg. The apartment can accommodate two people.

The apartment is on the 2nd floor and is located in a very quiet side street with little traffic. Kurfürstendamm and KaDeWe are within walking distance. Various restaurants, bars and cafes in the immediate vicinity.

The connection to public transport is very good.

name: Cosy Bright Room in Kreuzberg
description:
Cosy, bright room right in the heart of Kreuzberg bordering Neukölln area. The apartment is located right between Gorlitzer and the Kanal, a well sort out area for both locals and tourists. It is a short walk to restaurants, bars and cafe´s in Neukölln.

Two other lovely housemates will be sharing the common areas with you and will make you feel right at home.

name: Cozy Berlin Mitte Studio
description: Comfy studio in Berlin Mitte. Quiet building close to Bernauer Strasse U-bahn and Rosenthaler u-bahn. You’ll love my place because of how easily you can get to any part of this amazing city. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

name: Beautiful 90sqm 2room apartment
description: The apartment is located in one of Berlins most requested areas of FRIEDRICHSHAIN, in a very quiet surrounding, street with trees, lovely neigbourhood, many cafés, bars, restaurants, a 24/7 supermarket in 3 mins walking distance, a swimmingpool etc.

name: Lovely City Apartment in the City Center
description: I would like to welcome you in my lovely 1 room apartmennt in Mitte. It is perfectly located in the city center of Berlin. Different public transport stations are in close proximity. A grocery shop ist just opposite my house and you can find restaurants and bars just around the corner. My apartment can host 2 persons. Everyone is welcome.

name: Lichtdurchflutetes Loft in Kreuzberg
description: Our beautiful large apartment is based in the heart of Kreuzberg one corner away from the famous Landwehrkanal. High ceilings, wooden floor, light-flooded open rooms and a large terrace make your stay in Berlin most comfortable and cozy. Perfect for families.

name: Great room with balcony in Schöneberg
description: The room is in Berlin-Friedenau at the U Walther-Schreiber-Platz in a silent street. It has a great bed, balcony, piano, TV, couch and max. space for 2-4 persons (optional sleeping couch). Bathroom, washing mashine and kitchen are available for all persons in the flat. There is also a fridge in the room, just for you! A supermarket (REWE) and the U-Bahn are only 150 meters away! The Schlosßstraßencenter is right around the corner and has a great flair for shopping (Primark, Hollister, etc...).

name: 3 rooms apartment, 2 min walk to S-Bahn Biesdorf
description:
1 min to S-bahn Biesdord.
25 min to Alexsander platz.
Underground parking.
It is a quiet, green area, perfectly suited to Families. Schlosspark Biesdorf is next door.
A lot of the kid's activities and playgrounds, as inside, as well as outside.
There is sun on the south terrace to enjoy, but it is very cool inside since the apartment holds the cool air. The apartment was built in Sept 2022, so it is new.
Big Supermarket is 200 meters.
Kauflend is 10 min walk.
Also possible 2 bikes for rent.

name: cozy and bright room in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
The flat is located in under the roof of an old building in the neighborhood of Winskiez in the middle of Prenzlauer Berg, close to Kollwitzplatz and the park Friedrichshain, only 15 mins (with publy transport) from Alexanderplatz.
You will stay in a comfortable and bright room (south side) for one or two people to stay with access to the green balcony.

name: Kudamm. City-West. Cozy Place!! :-)
description: Located in the heart of the western part of Berlin my flat provides space for up to four people. There is an extremely comfortable bed in the bedroom and a sofa bed in the other ("living/dining") room. The kitchen is fully equipped.

name: "Berlin-St.art" Aparment
description: A bright Berlin apartment in the center on Schöneberg. Desined to give you the "Berlin" feeling and a take-off time finding your own space in this city. The apartment is freshly furnished and the photos will be added soon.

name: Sunny cozy apartment in Kreuzberg
description: A beautiful cozy home on graefestrasse, one of the most charming streets in kreuzberg. The area is full of beautiful bars, restaurants and cafes. The house is fully equipped with everything that you would need to feel comfortable and right at home.

name: Schöne helle Altbau-Wohnung in Kreuzberg
description: Our cozy bright 3-room apartment with beautiful wooden floorboards can accommodate a couple, a small family (with two children) or up to three friends. The apartment is centrally located in the lively and popular Bergmannkiez with many shops, restaurants and bars as well as close to Victoria Park and the Gleisdreieck park with lots of playgrounds. Both the Tempelhofer Feld and the Landwehr Canal are within 15 min. Walking distance.

name: 85m² Apt. close to Kurfürstendamm
description:
The Appartment is very close to Kurfüstendamm street.
The Kurfürstendamm (colloquially Ku'damm) is one of the most famous avenues in Berlin. This very broad, long boulevard can be considered the Champs-Élysées of Berlin—lined with shops, houses, hotels and restaurants. In particular, many fashion designers have their shops there, as well as several car manufacturers' show rooms...
The Appartament has 2 bedrooms with a large bed for 2 people and a hall with a sofa for 2 people

name: Lovely flat close to Mauerpark
description:
We rent for a short time our beautiful apartment in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg.

Our apartment in the old building is located in a great area and is perfectly connected to the subway, subway and tram (U2, S41/42, M10). All destinations in Berlin can be easily reached by public transport.

In the direct surroundings there are many food and shopping possibilities. The Mauerpark is also within walking distance. Despite the central location it is very quiet in the evening.

name: Cozy little room in the heart of Wedding
description: You will be staying in a relaxed shared apartment that has lived together for several years in the spacious 5-room apartment with large bathroom and kitchen. We all have a regular work day and pay attention to a peaceful and cozy living together.

name: Spacious room in Neukölln
description: It is a two-room tiny but cozy apartment. You will live with me in one apartment. I like cleanliness & respect at home, so I expect you to value that too.  No smoking at home.

name: Make yourself at home
description:
Your 800 sq. feet (70 qm) home to taste the summer in Berlin.

Since we are on vacation ourselves we are offering our place giving you the chance to explore the capitol of Germany.
Baby Crib could be provided since we have a new born ourselves.

name: Cute apartment in the heart of Berlin
description:
The apartment is located right in the center of Berlin. Several famous night clubs are around the corner and two train stations (U Frankfurter Tor ,S-Storkower, ) are just 5 minutes away.
There you will find a lot of shopping areas and sightseeings like the Berlin-Wall..also great bars and restaurant. You will have a great time here :)

name: room in cool Neukölln
description:
Partly furnished (see pictures), 14 sqm in cool, central Neukölln, discount for monthwise bookings.
This is a shared student flat in its last days, so one room is already free for rent. Looking for someone trustworthy, openminded, more or less tidy.

name: Nice spacious room in Berlin Friedrichshain
description: The flat is located in the trendy district Friedrichshain. All places of interest can be reached very conveniently by public transport, various tramway-lines stop right in front of the building. You can reach the nightclubs at the riverside in 10 Minutes, a nice and huge public park is right across the street, where you can go running, play beach volleyball or go to the open air cinema in the evening. Also a lot of nice cafes, bars and restaurants are located in this district, just ask me :)

name: Moderne Unterkunft im Berliner Wedding
description: Beautiful, cozy apartment  for up to 2 people in a good location invites you to a short trip to Berlin.

name: 2 Rooms at Schlesi – Green Kreuzberg Vibes
description:
Light and green Berlin rooms!
We are renting out our two green rooms in our shared flat.
The rooms are connected, one is a bedroom (140cm bed) and the other a living room/studio equipped with a large fold out bed sofa, desk, stereo and loads of books.
If you have an allergy to dogs it might be wise to look further because we have adorable puppies.. ;)
Kitchen and Bathroom (with tub) are fully equipped and you share them with our two most likeable roommates.

name: Rustic Berlin | in our apartment | 2x2m bed
description:
If we will be on vacation, our apartment will be yours. We expect you to use everything with care, also if it's not the 4-star-season, it's our cozy rustic Berlin home ;)
Our place is a typical old Berlin apartment with old wooden floors and 3,8m high ceilings, directly at the subway station U Vinetastrasse, just 7-subway-min. away from the city center. We have tons of board games you could play with if you like and free coffee/tea. In Summer you could enjoy a wine/craft beer on our balcony.

name: Kreuzberg- super central- cosy huge room
description:
Super central - the perfect location to get to know Berlin. Bright spacious room, fully furnished - see pictures- in 77m² ground floor appartment, fully equiped kitchen (oven, stove, microwave) and spacious bathroom with bathtub and washing machine. You have your own entrance.

location:
5 min walking distance U3, U1 Prinzenstraße
7 min walking distance U7 Südstern
Landwehrkanal 1 min walking distance,
Bergmannkiez 7 min walking distance
Gräfekiez 5 min walking distance

name: Bright and comfortable room near the center
description: Beautiful bright room right on Leopoldplatz in the heart of Wedding . U-Bahn and train as well as several buses

name: Neu renovierte/möblierte Wohnung
description:
We offer a newly renovated, stylishly furnished, spacious 3-room apartment in Berlin Charlottenburg (near Ku'damm and Savignyplatz). The apartment is 98m2 with a bedroom with box spring bed, as well as a children's room with bunk bed ( + additional folding mattress). Bathroom with shower + guest toilet available.
Also, the apartment has a newly equipped large kitchen with dining room. Living room equipped with couch and 2 armchairs.
Apartment on the 4th floor with balcony and elevator.

name: Cosy bedroom in Friedrichshain
description: My room is part of a two persons shared living. The flat is having a small balcony, a kitchen you can use and a bathroom. You can reach my place from Warschauerstr. (U12) and Ostkreuz (S41....) in about 10 min.

name: Quiet and lovely in central Berlin
description: Welcome Berlin visitors! I offer my spacious and quiet and light 2-room flat right in Berlin Mitte. It is very centrally located, so you'll get anywhere very quickly - at home you'll have enough space and quietness to relax.

name: Bright 2 room apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
Very bright and comfortable apartment, well equipped with everything you usually need for living!

Great location, in a very quiet and safe neighbourhood with lots of restaurants and fancy places in a walking distance. Perfect transport connection: S-bahn, U-bahn, trams.

Ultra full HD screen with TV, Netflix and other smart apps. Fast internet. Big double bed in the sleeping room. Sofa in the living room could be fine for two people, or there is a basic floor mattress for one person.

name: Funky & spacious apartment - downtown West Berlin
description: Beautiful apartment on a quiet side-street in the center of downtown west Berlin.  Lots of light from ceiling-high windows. Designer furniture. 2 big bedrooms with blackout blinds, king and queen size beds. High-end mattresses and linens. Living/dining room. 2 bathrooms with clawfoot bathtub & shower. Fully-equipped eat-in kitchen. Great location to explore the city. Close to major transportation hub, great restaurants, cafes, galleries, venues. All amenities high-end, Nespresso machine, etc.

name: Sunny room next to boxi in lovely Friedrichshain
description: Enjoy the simple life in this quiet and centrally located accommodation.

name: Big and beautiful Room in Neukölln
Bright, home-feeling room in beautiful location
description: The room is very big, completaly furnished  and has big windows to a quiet backyard.  It has a feeling of home. It has a night area with a double bed and a day area with a big desk, office chair and small sofa.

name: Möbliertes Apartment -Top Lage
description:
2-room apartment in a top location in Berlin with completely new furniture. 2 minutes walk from the famous department store Des Westens ,the zoo and Kurfürstendamm.
Best transport connections, Wittenbergplatz subway station,U/S Zoologischer Garten, various bus

name: Cozy quiet studio in Berlin
description:
Hi! My place is nice, cozy and fully furnished. Perfect for people coming to Berlin on short business trips or holidays. There’s a Netto supermarket right across and not far off is Aldi and Rewe. The space is fully wheelchair accessible with accessible bathrooms. No parties.

Safe and family friendly area.

Our apartments impress with modern design, a central location and amenities that leave nothing to be desired. Each apartment at Homaris tells its own story - is individual. Just like you!

My house is a non-smoking house.

name: well located  2 bedrooms apt. in Frankfurter Tor

with easy access to Alexanderplatz/Mitte (U5), Prenzlauer Berg and Kreuzberg (M10), the place is ideally located for touring the city!

name: Stylish family apartment in historic GDR building

We live in this apartment normally, so everything you need will probably be here, from kids toys to coffee grinder.

Located in the heart of Berlin Mitte, our apartment is beautifully decorated in a cozy, modern style suitable for a family or a group of friends. It is a good place for tourists and business travelers.

Close to the apartment is a Netto supermarket with bakery, an ice cream shop, a lottery shop with Hermes shop

description: My place is in the heart of Neukölln or so-called Kreuzkölln a very nice and hip area of Berlin. Wrests (full of bars and restaurants) is right next to you, which is really nice, if you wanna go out and enjoy Berlin summer nights. The bedroom window is to the backyard and therefore very quiet. Parks and a canal are close by and you can walk or bike to many popular places. The metro station is 10 Min. (walking) only.

This is a bedroom, with a queen size bed, desk, a sofa, cupboard and closet. The room is part of a shared appartment with two other roommates and a dog!
The flat is located in a calm and safe neighborhood with direct public transportation connection.

Hi! We are looking forward to your visit to our cozy shared apartment, where you will live with Marula or me. If you feel like staying with us, write a few sentences to you! :)

Come visit us in our beautiful shared flat in Kreuzberg. You will share the flat either with me or Marula. Please tell us a bit about you if you're interested in staying with us! :)

description: A cozy flat in the heart of Kreuzberg. It is located close to many bars, clubs, cafes and all craziness of Kreuzberg. Just 10 minute walking from kottbussertor and Metro station.

poetic coexistence.
I am always living here and I rent the other room to you.

name: Ab durch die Mitte !
description: The apartment is in Friedrichshain 500 m from the Ostkreuz, great transport connections. Very quiet there, in a side street and in the backyard. In the area, many clubs can be reached on foot. Shopping of clothes, shoes or food .

description: August 4 is available as well. 30 sqm room in a shared flat. Equipoed with a kingsize bed, desk and couch. 30 seconds to U-Bahn and S-Bahn stations, two supermarkets and a shopping centre. Great location for bars, clubs and restaurants. Ten minutes from Alexanderplatz with U5 and ten minutes from Warschauerstraße with the tram.

name: 1 Zimmerappartment
description:
1 room apartment, balcony, separate kitchen and bathroom in Berlin Schöneberg.
The apartment is located in one of the most beautiful and popular districts of West Berlin. Right outside the house door: numerous cafes, restaurants, shopping and boutiques.

name: 120qm Altbau in Berlin Friedenau
description: Spacious old building apartment on the border between Friedenau and Schöneberg. Conveniently located. Within walking distance in 5 minutes, you can reach the U+S-Bahn station Innsbrucker Platz. Shopping as well as cafes and restaurants are very close.

name: Nice to hang out /balcony / hammock
description:
I will be travelling so you can hang out in my room. The area is really nice. Bars Clubs, U, S, and Bus Station is close. Matze my flatmate is a really nice guy. He´ll try to help you with whatever you want to know.
Just contact me
Tobi

name: Schönes Appartment in Prenzlberg
description:
I rent out my 1-room apartment in the heart of trendy Prenzlauer Berg. The apartment is quietly located in the backyard, the area with countless cafes, restaurants and neighborhood shops leaves nothing to be desired.
5 min to Kollwitzplatz, a 15-minute walk to Alexanderplatz.

The apartment (35 sqm) is very bright due to 2 large windows. Basic foods such as tea, coffee, sugar, spices included.

Two people can sleep on the loft bed. High-quality eco-latex mattress 1.40 x 2.00 meter

name: renovierte 1-Zimmerwohnung
description: I ask for a beautiful, renovated 1-room apartment. The apartment is designed for 2 people. 1 bed 1.60 x 2.00 large (new mattress, bought on 12/02/2014), coffee maker,  washing machine, all in top condition.

name: Berliner Zimmer in Neukölln
description:
Beautiful so-called "Berliner Zimmer", 25 m² large and quiet to the backyard located in the middle of the lively Neukölln neighborhood.
Cafés, bars and restaurants as well as buses and U7, U8 are in the immediate vicinity.

Nice, big and comfortable room in Berlin Neukölln. You can find restaurants, bars and café just around the corner.

name: CREATIVE & SPACIOUS ROOM IN KREUZBERG
description:
Ideal place for a couple of days or longer in Berlin!
Artistic room with a big bed 180 x 200cm and a desk to work. Big bathroom with washing machine. And kitchen with a dish washer. The area has many restaurants and bars, markets on the weekend and a park and canal close by. Hasenheide for recreation or a workout are next door :)

name: Cozy typical Berlin Apartment Neukö
description: Cozy typical apartment, with balcony in super nice, central area in Berlin Neukölln/Kreuzberg near Hermannplatz. U7 and U8 are both within 5 min walking distance. There are two bedrooms with 2 beds and a single mattress.

name: Double bedroom- Berlin (Central)
description:
I am renting out my lovely room in the heart of Berlin Neukölln.
The room is very cosy with a really comfortable double bed. It comes with high ceilings and huge window area and a french balcony, where the sun is shining through in the morning.

name: Mittenrein - Höhenflug über Berlin
description: The shared room has a cozy loft bed, from which you can relax and start a Berlin day. Well rested, it is just a stone's throw to the Mauerpark and public transport. So the Berlin experience can start!

name: Neukölln "hautnah" - comfy place in Reuterkiez
description:
Renting out a cosy room on Pannierstraße, conveniently furnished (futon bed, desk). There is a spacious living room and a kitchen to be shared with me and my girlfriend Giulia (28/34 yrs). Room is suitable for two people (bed to be shared).
Giulia has a little pug named Andrea, who is sociable and cute (in those few moments he is actually not sleeping).

name: Gemütliches Zimmer in zentraler Lage
description: Hey, I'm renting out my room at Boxhagener Platz. Since I travel quite often, I am quite flexible when renting.

name: The view
description:
- Berlin Friedrichshain surrounded by bars, restaurants, clubs & nice boutiqe stores.
- the flat itself is very quiet in the backyard with a nice view to the "stalin buildings"
- nice 10m2 balcony plus small garden
- Distance to Alexander platz by car is 6 minutes. Kreuzberg, Prenzlauerberg, Mitte is very near by.
- one big living room including eating table, kitchen and tv corner plus 1 sleeping room
- good for 2 people and 1-2 kids.
We don´t want to have party tourists as guests.

name: Sunny and clean
description: The room ist located in the trendy and beautyful area of Berlin Kreuzberg / Bergmannkiez. Numerous cultural events, as well as bars, restaurants and cafés lend this neighborhood its unique charm. Quiet in the near you gonna find the hudge an amazing

name: Cosy apartment right near Alexanderplatz
description:
We rent this cosy apartment located in the super central neighborhood of Mitte, ten minutes walk from Alexanderplatz, and with a nice view of the TV tower.
The area is very well served by public transports: Jannowitzbruecke station (U-bahn and S-bahn) is literally 1 minute away from the building door.

If you are attracted by Berlin's nightlife, you will be happy to know that all the main clubs are reachable with a little walk, or they are just a couple of train station away.

name: Flat in Berlin (Schöneberg)
description: Nice flat near the center of Berlin, but very quiet.

name: Mitten im Kiez room
description:
The room is in the middle of beautiful Berlin-Neukölln right next to the large park Hasenheide. Here you have everything you need,direct shopping,bars, etc. and only down the street, you have the connection with the U8.
The apartment is a 2 apartment,it has a large kitchen and a bathroom.

name: Beautiful Single Room in Kreuzberg
description: Single Room in beautiful Appartment directly on the famous Bergmannstraße, right in the heart of Kreuzberg surrounded by little shops,  beautiful restaurants, and a variety of bars and pubs .

name: Sunny Side of Berlin
description:
my apartment is just one minute walk to public transport subway station Yorckstrasse, a beautiful public park and Potsdamer Platz.
You will enjoy a nice person living with me and the entire community of the house.

name: Stylish & Hip Flat Room - Kreuzberg
description: Hey! You find a really nice hip but cosy flat of two musicians. The flat is next to the beautiful Görlitzer Park, surrounded by cafés, bars, secondhandshops and a hell lot of good restaurants. You will love the flat like we do! Love, M & V

name: Apartment in Berlin
description: Apartment in the center of Berlin. Only 6 minutes' walk to Ubahn Station Leopoldplatz and 5 minutes' walk Ubahn and SBahn Station Wedding. Lots of restaurants and stores make your life cozy. Only 5 minutes' walk to the famous DM and 24hs hot water。

name: Nice room in Prenzlauerberg
description: Its a nice flat in a very beautiful neighborhood in Prenzlauer Berg. My flatmate is on holidays and you will be sleeping in her room.

name: Cosy 100m² APT with balcony in trendy Schillerkiez
description: Stay in a beautiful and peaceful place on a very green and quiet street, where lively cafes and bars are just around the corner.

name: Gemütliche Wohnung im Herzen Friedrichshains
description:
Small quiet apartment in the backyard.
We rent the entire apartment and the rooms that can be seen in the pictures. Except for a small room with my PC still standing.

name: A big room in Prenzlauerberg
description:
Hi!
As I’m going to be out of the city, you have a chance to stay in my room in Prenzlauerberg.
The room is in 3-rooms apartment and my cool flat mate lives there too.
I have a big bed for two in the room and a couch to sit.
Bed sheets will be provided, as well as towels.

You can use the kitchen to cook food (pots, frying pans are there), you’ll have a shelf in the fridge.

In the bathroom we have shampoo, shower gel and toothpaste for guests.

name: Dachgeschosswohnung in Friedrichshain
description: Our beautiful, light-filled attic apartment is located in Friedrichshain and is very well connected. It consists of an open plan living area with nice kitchen and balcony, a cozy bedroom and a bathroom with bathtub. You are welcome to use our kitchen equipment and our TV and Wi-Fi.

name: Lovely apartment in the middle of Kreuzberg!
description:
A cosy and spacious apartment in a top location in Berlin! Great for couples or a work trip!

We only moved in a year ago and made this lovely flat our home.

It’s well-lit and super spacious. There’s a living room (sofa, dining corner, tv) with access to a small balcony, a fully-equipped kitchen, a bathroom (shower, washing machine), one bedroom (double-bed), one guest room (work desk, bed sofa). The flat is ideal for couples or for someone on a working trip! ;)

name: Cozy Homely 2-Room apartment, Heart of Neuköln
Lovely flat in Prenzlauer Berg
description: Sunny flat in Prenzlauer Berg near Volkspark Friedrichshain and Eberswalder Straße! It´s a 2-room-70m2 flat with balcony. It's next to public transport like M10, Ringbahn, and bus. You will find everything you need like supermarkets, bars and nightlife around the corner. Alexanderplatz can be reached in 10 min.

name: Cosy flat center of Berlin
description: Modern2 rooms apartment in central of Berlin near Gesundbrunnen and Tegel Airport.

name: Helle ruhige Altbauwohnung
description:
Quiet, large apartment in old building with connection from Osloer Straße (5 min) to U8, U9.
Tram M50, M13 in front of the door.
15 minutes to S-Bahn and Ringbahn.

name: 2-Zimmer-Wohnung in Kreuzberg
description:
Beautiful bright, fully furnished apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg - countless bars/restaurants/Spätis/Oberbaum Bridge in close proximity.
2 minutes walk from the U1 Silesian Gate.
1 minute walk away from the bus stop Schlesisches Tor.
15 minutes walk from S-Bahn Warschauer Straße.

name: Sunny roof top apartment in Berlin Lichtenberg
description:
Our apartment is approx. 140m2 big and located in Berlin Lichtenberg. You can reach the nearest metro station in 5 minutes walking and the city centre (Alexanderplatz, Friedrichstraße) in approx. 20 min by metro.
The apartment has 3 bedroom, a big living room as well as additional room where we have our working from home space. There is one big bathroom with bathtub and shower and second bathroom with the toilet.

name: Apartment zum Wohlfühlen
description:
Eat the life in the popular Sprengelkiez in this quiet and centrally located accommodation. 2 minute walk to
Boat canal and nice places. The apartment is fully equipped and exudes a cozy atmosphere. Here you can feel comfortable.

name: Zauberhaftes Zimmer in Kreuzberg
description: We are currently a 2 shared apartment and currently have one room available and would be happy to have a great guest.

name: Apartment in mitte
description: Located in the heart of Berlin! 10 minutes walk from the museum island! 3 minutes walk from the supermarket, 7 minutes walk from the metro!
